1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA 
1b2(rgyud 'grel): ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs
1b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 
1b4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma la gus de rjes gshin rje gshed nag rdo rje la/ rang 'od 
1b5(rgyud 'grel): yan lag 'dus pa bde ba rgyas pa gzhan gyi don 'jug pa/ 
2a1(rgyud 'grel): bya kya sla rgya gyu gyu 
2a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo chu skyes gri gug thod pa'i phyag/ zhal gsum
2a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i 'jigs byed la ni spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo// gshin rje gshed nag sgrub 
2a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs// rang nyid rig pa mngon 'dod pa'i// dbang la sogs pa thob pa nyid// 
2a5(rgyud 'grel): de yi 'di ni sru ba zabs rim// byis rnams bde bar rtogs phyir dang // mnyam pa dran par bya ched/ 
2a6(rgyud 'grel): dang // mchog rnams byis pa'i ngag la ni// mgu bya'i phyir ni rnam par bri// sbyin dang 
2a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims la sogs ldan// sems can don la ro gcig blo// byams sogs yon tan
2b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rdzogs// dad dang thos pas rnam par brgyan// mtho rangs snying rje'i bdag nyid can// dang por gdong sogs khrus byas nas// dben pa'i sa phyogs dur khrod sogs// bde ba'i stan la
2b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dug nas ni// brtsam bya rang snyid pad+ma ste// zla ba la blta shin tu gsal// ya yig sngon po'i 'od zer can// sems can don ni bran tshogs byas// bla ma rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// 
2b3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' ma lus khyab par bsgom// de rnams dmigs la phyag byas nas// lus sprul pa yi cho ga yis// sems ma la sogs kyis mchod nas// sdig pa bshags pa'o// lus dag 
2b4(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis sdig pa bgyis// de bzhin bgyid du stsal ba dang // mgon po rjes su yi rang gang // de gsum byas pa bshags par bgyi// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de sras 'phags// bsod 
2b5(rgyud 'grel): nams tshogs la rjes yi rang // rdzogs sangs rgyas dang dam chos bcas// tshogs kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi// yon tan rgya chen khyed cag la// bdag gis lus ni dbul bar bgyi/ 
2b6(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i chos ni thams cad dang // ston pa'i sgra mdzes gnas gyur cig/ rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sbas// sbyin sngogs las kyi ngo bo la// sku gsung ye shes thob bya'i phyir// rab tu 
2b7(rgyud 'grel): gus pas gnas par bgyi// byang chub du ni sems bskyed bgyi// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gong zhig bsod nams tshogs bsags pas// byang chub tu ni bsngo bar 
2b8(rgyud 'grel): bgyi// dpal ldan gshin rje gshed gyur nas// 'grol phan pa bdag byed cing // 'di ltar smon lam btab nas ni// de nas blo yis gshegs su gsol// snying rjes 
3a1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin bltas nas// sna tshogs stong pa'i rnam par bsgob// rang bzhin rnams dang bral ba'i phyir// rgyu yang mtshan ma med par bsgom// spyod dang bral ba nyid kyis ni// smon pa dag ni// 
3a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par spangs// oM shur+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba A ta ma ke haM/ de la sems ni brtan byas nas// aM yig las byung nyi ma las// der ni hUM yig sngon po'i mdangs// 'od zer 'phros pas kun li khyab/ 
3a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse lnga thams cad du// bsrung ba'i don du bsgom par bya// rdo rje sa gzhi lcags ri dang // rab gur dang de bzhin no// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag don// slar yang bsam gtan yang dag brtsam/ 
3a4(rgyud 'grel): de la sna tshogs chu skyes zla// sa ma las byung ba'i rdo rje las// yan lag bzang po yan lag 'byung // chos 'byung dkar po gru gsum pa// steng du gnas pa mkha' mnyam bsam// dbus su pad+ma zla ba 
3a5(rgyud 'grel): la// slar yang de dbus dkyil 'khor te// bruM yig 'khor lo las bskyed pa// rtag pa'i yan lag las byung ba// gre bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang // dra badra phyed kyis brgyan la/ 
3a6(rgyud 'grel): stegs bu lha mos legs mdzes pa// sna tshogs rtse mo rlung gis bskyod// ba dan dril bu dang ldan pa// sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par mnan// zla ba nyi ma rgyal ba'i gdan// shar ni dkar po chen po ste// lhor ni ser/ 
3a7(rgyud 'grel): po yang dag ldan// nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste// byang ni rtsod dang mtshungs pa'o// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od byed pa// dbus kyi sa gzhi rnam par bsam// phyogs kyi kha dog dbye ba 'dis// sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ 
3a8(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gur yang bsgom par bya// so so'i rtsigs pa go rims bzhin// rnam pa lnga ni bsgom byas nas// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya// dpal ldan rnam pa lnga dang bcas// rdo rje nag po 
3b1(rgyud 'grel): sel byed pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs zhes grags// de ni dbye bas bsnyad par bya// lte bar sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan// zla bar dbyangs yi gnyis rim dgod// de yi zla bar ka yig sogs/ 
3b2(rgyud 'grel): DaD+ha da d+ha ya la yang // gtsug nas de dag nyid las grub/ 'di dag 'di ltar grub pa ni// me long ye shes brjod par bya// mnyam nyid de dag gcig pa nyid// de skyes hUM ni so sor rtog/ bya ba nan tan ye shes/ 
3b3(rgyud 'grel): ni// de las skyes pa rdo rjer bsgom// nor bu me shel 'od 'dra ba// sa bon bcas pa'i 'od zer 'phros// oM badz+ra At+ma ko haM/ zhes pas bdag nyid nga rgyal bya// de skyes dkar dmar mdangs ldan pa/ 
3b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer mdzes pas 'khyud pa'i lus// khro bo sgeg gzugs bde ba yis// ra ba dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i nal// gdan la g.yon brkyang gis mnan pa// 'bar ba'i rol gri rdo rje gri gug gsor ba'o// 
3b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'dam skyes snod ni 'od zer 'phro ba yi// phyag ni g.yas dang g.yon rnams kyis// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni// ye shes rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag/ rnam pa lnga yi rang bzhin gang // rnal 'byed// 
3b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes ni mngon por brjod// ces pa ni rnal 'byor ro// 'dod chags chen pos 'dul ba ru// 'gro ba gsum po yang dag bltas// rang snying ye shes 'od zer gyis// sna tshogs sangs rgyas gzugs 
3b7(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// rang gi lus la yang dag gzhug/ de ba dam pa rnam pa'i gzugs// bdag gi longs spyod bsgom par bya// rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs// sngags mchog de nyid gsum zhes 
3b8(rgyud 'grel): so// ho dmar gnyis kyi nang du gzhug/ ji ltar skar mda' 'phro ba ltar // byang chub sems ni de bzhin gzhug/ snying rje chags pa'i sems kyis ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid zhu// byams sogs 
4a1(rgyud 'grel): sems ma sogs rnams kyi// 'khor lo'i gtso bo skal bar byed// bzhengs shig gshin rje rje btsun snying rje'i khro// khams gsum thams cad pa yi gti mug sol// de bzhin bdud
4a2(rgyud 'grel): las rgyal bar mdzod// bzhengs shig rje btsun thugs ni g.yengs gyur pas// 'jig rten mgon po stong nyid ci ste bzhugs// bzhengs shig rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams kyis// byang chub 'dod pa'i 
4a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mnyam mnan nas// tsi phyir stong pa nyid la sems shing zhugs// bskul nas de ni thim 'gyur nas// de yir ye rjes su song // glu 'di yin der byas nas// brang tshogs nyams 'dri las byung ba 
4a4(rgyud 'grel): zhu brjes pa las skyes pa// yaM sngon po las nyi dkyil 'khor// mi bzad khro bcas me dog sde ba// rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// slar rnon po 'bar ba'i rwa// rmig pa brko ba 'jigs byed pa// ma he sha/ 
4a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i rgyab gnas pa// rdo rje sngon po 'od zer bcas// sa bon 'od zer bcas pa yis// gshed nag gzugs ni de yis bya// sna tshogs bdag la yang dag gzhug/ 'jigs byed chen po 'jigs su 
4a6(rgyud 'grel): rung // ma he'i shar ni rdo rjer bsgom// dkyil 'khor dbang phyug bsgom par bya// 'jig rten gsum po bdud kyi 'khor// 'od zer rnon po 'phro bas bsreg/ mi bzad drag shul mun pa'i lus// 'od zer/ 
4a7(rgyud 'grel): ljags ni 'dril ba po// 'bar ba'i mche ba gtsigs pa'i byad// ral pa slar gyen du 'greng // g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan// nag po rnam par myos byed pa// rtsa ba'i zhal ni bung nag 'dra// g.yas 
4a8(rgyud 'grel): pa zla ba'i 'od byed pa// g.yon pa dmar po'i mdangs su bstan// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// sbom thung gsus pa 'phyang ba po// mgo ba'i phreng ba 'phyang dang ldan// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag 
4b1(rgyud 'grel): dag gis// gri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin// rang 'od shes rab yan lag sbyor// bde ba 'bab pa gzhan gyi don// lhag ma g.yas pa'i phyag dag gis// 'bar ba'i rdo rje ral gri 'dzin// g.yon 
4b2(rgyud 'grel): na 'khor lo chu skyes 'dzin// sbrul gyi dbang pos brgyan byas te// sngon po mtha' yas sbrul dag gis// ral pa btsangs pa shin tu 'jigs// dmar po 'jog po klu yis ni// ma rungs pa yis rna ba 
4b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// sna tshogs rigs ldan dpung rgyan te// dung skyong dag gi sbal nyid ni// ser po gdu bu 'dzin pa'o// pad+ma dkar po'i do shal can// ljang gu kar ko Ta yis ni// tshangs pa'i skud pa shin tu 
4b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzes// bdud rtsi'i kha dog 'dra ba yi// nor 'dzin gyis ni ska rags byas// pad+ma'i rtsa ba kha dog skya// pad+ma chen pos zhabs gdub po// thams cad puT kyi sgra byed pa// lce gnyis drag shul mche ba'i 
4b5(rgyud 'grel): phreng // 'di ni 'khor ba myang 'das gzugs// gshin rje sel bar byed pa'o// rtog pa zad pa'i tshad bsams nas// sngags kyis yang dag byin gyis brlab// oM d+harma d+hA tudz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ 
4b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni rjes su rnal 'byor ro// rang snying 'od zer lcags kyu yis// mkha' khyab rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// thams cad bkug nas zhal du bzhug/ bde bar phab nas snying gir zhu// rdo rje lam 
4b7(rgyud 'grel): byang zhu ba de// blo dang ldan pas spro bar bya// rang 'od pad+ma'i khongs su gnas// rang gi sa bon gzugs su blta// sa bon las byung 'khor lo kun// sa bon kun gyis byin gyis brlab// 'phro zhing sdud 
4b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'od zer ni// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bsgom// ya yig sngon pos dbus ma bskyed// dkyil 'khor can gyi mtshan nyid gsungs// shar du k+She las 'khor lo grub// rtag pa dkar po phyag drug 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): pa// 'khor lo ral gri g.yas pa'i phyag/ g.yon na rin chen chu skyes 'dzin// lhor ni ma yi yi ge las// rin chen las skyes rin chen 'byung // bcom gser gyi mdangs byed pa// rin 
5a2(rgyud 'grel): chen ral gri g.yas na 'dzin// g.yon na 'khor lo chu skyes so// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje can// sa bon me dang pad+ma grub// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od dang mnyam// g.yas na pad+ma ral gri'o// nor bu 'khor lo 
5a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du dgod// da dang ral gri las byung ba// ljang khro phrag dog gshin rje gshed// g.yas na ral gri 'khor lo bsnams// mdzes pa'i nor bu pad+ma g.yon// thams cad zhe sdang gshin rje gshed/ 
5a4(rgyud 'grel): khro bo gzugs kyi mtshan nyid do// de rnams kyi ni rtsa ba'i phyag/ gri gug thod pa bsgom par bya// gnyis me dag nyug ma'i shes rab dang // lus bdag med pa'i ngo bo dang // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la 
5a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa// rtag pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o// sna tshogs rdo rje rtsa bar gnas// sems can don byed bsgom par bya// shar sgor ya yig las skyes pa// thob sngon po yi ni gzugs// g.yas 
5a6(rgyud 'grel): na tho ba ral gri 'dzin// nor bu bzang po pad+ma g.yon// rdo rje thor grags gshin rje gshed// lhor ni dza dang dbyug pa las// dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dkar mdangs// dbyug pa ral gri 
5a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa na// chu skyes 'khor lo g.yon pa'o// nub tu pad+ma ga shin rje gshed// ni skyes 'dod chags mtha' 'joms gzugs// pad+ma ral gri g.yas pa na// g.yon na 'khor lo nor bu'o// 
5a8(rgyud 'grel): byang du ral gri gshin rje gshed// ra skyes phrag dog mtha' 'joms pa// ral gri 'khor lo g.yas pa na// g.yon na nor bu pad+ma ste// cung zad sngo ba'i bye brag ste// zhes pa 'jigs par byed 
5b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// sprul ni thams cad pa yi gzugs// rnam par gtsigs pa'i gang rgyangs can// skra ser gyen du 'greng ba ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan// mche ba gtsigs pa gang
5b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyangs che// gri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rje mtshams bzhi la// zla ba la gnas lha mo rnams// shar lho mtshams kyi lha mo ni// dza skyes rdo rje sems ma'o// dkar mo sgeg mo khro ba 
5b3(rgyud 'grel): che// gti mug gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs// de nas lho nub mtshams su ni// rdo rje phag mo sa las skyes// khro bo phag mo'i gdong can ma// zhe sdang gshin rje gshed dang mtshungs// byang dang 
5b4(rgyud 'grel): nub kyi mtshams su ni// rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs can ma// do skyes shin tu dmar ba'i mdog/ 'dod chags gshin rje mthar 'joms gzugs// byang shar gyi ni mtshams su ni// gau ri ljang gu 'jigs su rung // 
5b5(rgyud 'grel): ru skyes phrag dog gshin rje gshed// gzugs dang mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sngon po'i g.yas ni dkar ba dang // dkar po'i g.yas ni sngo ba dang // de gnyis kyi g.yon dmar po ste// de las gzhan pa sngo 
5b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar po// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams bzhi ru// na yo ni ra thod pa'o// grub nas rab spro blo ldan gyis// ji skad brjod pa'i rang sngags kyis// hrIHSh+Ti la sogs sngags kyi sgras// dkyil 'khor gtso bo 
5b7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bskul// sprul pa mtha' yas spros pa yis// sems can don mchog byas nas ni// rang gi lus la thams cad kyis// khro bo dpa' bo thams cad dgod// dzi na dzika ces bya ba 'dis// shar du gti 
5b8(rgyud 'grel): mug mthar byed pa// rtsibs kyi rtsa ba la gnas pa// sna tshogs chu skyes zla bar dgod// rat+na d+h+r-ika ces bya ba 'dis// lho rtsibs chu skyes nyi ma la// pra ma zhes bya drangs nas ni// cho ga bzhin du dgod par bya'o// 
6a1(rgyud 'grel): a ro l-i ka ces bya ba 'dis// 'dod chags gshin rje sel byed pa// ru brtsibs 'dam skyes nyi ma la// cho ga bzhin du rnam par bsam// pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces bya ba 'dis// phrag dog 
6a2(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje zad byed pa// byang rtsibs chu skyes nyi ma la// tshe ga bzhin du dgod par bya// mung+ga rad+h+r-i ka so bya ba yis// shar sgor chu skyes nyi ma la// tho ba'i mtha'a'i 'joms zad byed pa// blo dang ldan pas// 
6a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya// daN+Da d+h+r-ika pa'i sngags 'di yis// lho yi sgo ra yang dag gnas// dbyug pa gshin rje gdul dka' ba// sna tshogs chu skyes nyi mar dgod// pad+ma d+h+r-ika ces bya ba 'dis// pad+ma 
6a4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed 'joms pa// nub sgor chu skyer nyi ma la// gtum po stobs chen bsgom par bya// khaD+ga d+h+r-ika ces bya ba 'dis// ral gri gshin rje zad par byed// sna tshogs pad+ma nyi mar bsam// bying 
6a5(rgyud 'grel): du bdud ni 'joms pa'o// sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi la// lha mo bsgom bya de bzhin mchog/ shar lho lha mo sems ma ste// gdum mo mdzes ma'i 'od zer can// mo ha ra ti zhes sngags kyis// sna tshogs 
6a6(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes zla bar gnas// de nas lho nub rdo rje mo// phag mo rigs kyi gtso mo ste// dwe Sha ra ti de nyid 'dis// pad+ma zla bar mkhas pas dgod// de nas nub byang mtshams su ni// zla bar dbyangs can dgod par bya// 
6a7(rgyud 'grel): rA ga ra ti'i sngags 'di yis// de nas byang shar gau ri ste// badz+ra ra ti'i sngags 'di yis// zla bar oM gyis mtshan pa'o// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi ru// de nyid gsum gyi thod pa'o// 'di ltar spro bya dkyil 
6a8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas// brtan par byas nas bde ldan pa// sngon gyi 'khor lo der thim par// mnyam par gzhag pas blta bar bya// 'di ni gshin tu rnal 'byor ro// gshin rje nag po 'joms pa dang / dkyil 
6b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor pa yi rang bzhin gyis// mig dang skra sogs ngo bo la// lha rnams byin gyis brlab par bya// k+Shi las 'khor lo gti mug mdangs// cung zad khro ba mig la ni// rdo rje mig dgod blo ldan gyis// rna bar
6b2(rgyud 'grel): dzaM yig rdo rje las// rdo rje rna ba nag po'i mdangs// sA ru kham yig rin chen 'byung // pra ma zhes bsgrags dang mtshungs pa// zla bar rdo rjesna tshogs so// lce la raM zhes pad+ma las// rdo rje lde zung pad+mar 
6b3(rgyud 'grel): song // 'dod chags gshing rje mdangs ldan pa'o// kaM skyes ral gri las byung ba// rdo rje sku ste zla bar gnas// phrag dog gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs// dpral bar sku yi lus can no// lte ba'i steng / 
6b4(rgyud 'grel): dus las sres// thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin mchog/ khro bo sgeg pa'i gzugs can ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam par dgod// yan lag drug la dgod pa ni// mngon shes bsgrub pa'i don du bshad// snying / 
6b5(rgyud 'grel): gar b+h+rUM las rdo rje dbus// hUM gnas rdo rje sngon po'i mdangs// thugs kyi rdo rje gshin rje gshed// kha dog phyag mtshan yang dag ldan// mgrin par AHyig pad+ma las// slar yang pad+ma las byung ba// 
6b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags gshin rje gshed 'dra'i lus// dpal ldan gsung gi rdo rje bsam// spyi bor oM las 'khor lo ste// oM dang 'khor lo dkar po'i mdangs// sku yi rdo rje skra dbang phyug/ phyag dang kha dog
6b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma mchog/ de nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog/ rdzogs nas na mkhar gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas mchod nas sngags kyis ni// de rnams byin gyis brlab par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa 
6b8(rgyud 'grel): b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bAg+nadz+ra swab+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM// rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis// sna tshogs gnas pa'i sar sa rgyas rnams// sras 
7a1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas// mdun du bltas nas de rnams las// rnam par spros pa gang yin pa// sems ma la sogs slar yang ni// bla ma dngas bum pa bzung nas ni// de rnams 
7a2(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis tshigs bcad dang // de bzhin snyan pa glu yi sgras// dbang bskur bar ni bsam par bya// bdag dang gzhan nyid thams cad la// spyi bor gshin rje nag por ro// rdo rje can rnams bdag spyi 
7a3(rgyud 'grel): bor// rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs nas// bdag mdun bltas nas khro bos ni// bgegs bskrad nas ni bsrung ba dang // ar+g+ha zhabs bsil la sogs dbul// 
7a4(rgyud 'grel): oM mun ra ga dzaHzhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dgug go/ oM da~MN+Da hUM zhes pa 'dis gzhug go// oM pad+ma baM zhes pa 'dis bcing ngo // oM khaD+ga hoHzhes pa 'dis dbang du bya'o// rang snying sa bon 'od 
7a5(rgyud 'grel): zer gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bkug nas gzhug/ snying gar zhu bar bltas nas ni// rang snying pad+ma'i lte ba la// zla ba las byung lha mo'i tshogs// sna tshogs me tog yo byad tshogs// lag pa'i 
7a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dab mas bzung nas ni// mchod pa'i glu ni yid 'ong ba// sna tshogs gar gyi bye brag dang // bde ba chen po steng ba yi// 'gying dang bcas pas mchod par bya// sem kye kye tham gshin rje gshed nag po// srin 
7a7(rgyud 'grel): po'i gzugs kyi rang bzhini gang // nga ni khyod mthong bas 'jigs pas// bla mtho bo'i rang bzhin dong // sa steng sa bla sa 'og rnams// khyod kyis gar byas pas ni 'dar // mig sman pa dang nag khro ba'i yid/ 
7a8(rgyud 'grel): gar mdzad khyod ni ro la ngas gzugs// gnag tsang sdom pa yin tshad// rnam pa mang po'i gzugs sprul byed// rdo rje dbyangs can 'dud par byed// khyod ni gar mdzod bde bache// khyod ni hrIH 
7b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi sgras// khams gsum pa yi 'khrul pa sol// rje bdun stong rje yis ni khro// khyod ni 'gro bltas gar byed pa// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pUH badz+ra sab+hA ba At+ma koH/ zag ca dang mtshungs thams cad 
7b2(rgyud 'grel): ni// sba ma grong rnams rnam bltas nas// 'khor lo can ni de rnams kyis// de bzhin gtsabs de rnams so// gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin can// gshin rje gshed pa shin tu 'jigs// ston pa sangs rgyas 
7b3(rgyud 'grel): kun rang bzhin// rdo rje sbrul phyag 'tshal la// tha mardo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// gshin rjegashed po shin tu 'jigs// rdo rje thugs bzhin rab gsal ba// rdo rje rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod chags rdo rje 
7b4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin khyod// 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso// thams cad dbyangs mchog dam pa mchog/ rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// zag dog dngos po'i rang bzhin khyod// gshin rje gshed po'i 
7b5(rgyud 'grel): las kun byed// rdo rje sku bzhin rab gsal ba// phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu sdud// sangs rgyas kun dang mchog gi 
7b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ dkyil 'khor dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod// a yig las bskyed dag pa ni// mgo bo gsum gyi steng na gnas// pad+ma'i snod ni rab rdzogs nas// de'i mgo ma yi dkyil 'khor ni// raM las byung 
7b7(rgyud 'grel): bkru gsum mo// de 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni// yaM skyes sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs// g.yo ba'i 'phen gyis mtshan pa'o// de la ming yig dang po skyes// de ni rnam par snang mdzad sogs// da yig las skyes 
7b8(rgyud 'grel): yang dag byung // glang po la sogs lnga po rnams// hUM skyes rdo rje'i kha chod kyis// de yi kha bcad bsgom par bya'o// rlung gis bskul ba'i me yis ni// de yang zhu bar rnam par bsam// rdo rje mnyam pa'i ror 
8a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// shin tu dri med dag par bltas// der ni oM yig 'od zer gyis// sangs rgyas kun bkug ye shes gzugs// sngags kyi gzugs kyis rab tu gzhug/ bdud rtsi mchog lnga 
8a2(rgyud 'grel): bltas nas ni// de nyid gsum gyi byin gyis brlab// dkyil 'khor bdag po tshim par bya// yi ge hUM las byung ba yi// lce ni rdo rje dkar por blta// de yi 'od zer sbu gu'i gzugs// de yis yang dag 
8a3(rgyud 'grel): drangs nas ni// sna tshogs gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor pa ni de bzhin mchod// snying gar ye shes 'od zer gyis// bkod nas rtog pa thams cad spangs// thog mtha' dbus
8a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bye brag gis// 'dir yang gcig tu mi rigs so// rdul phran cha shas med pas na// du mar yang ni rigs ma yin// gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin gang // gang bral de ni de bzhin min// 
8a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul gzugs de nyid ma yin pas// gang phyir 'khrul pa gnyis la gnas// ma 'khrul rtag tu bas pa mi khyab// spro dang bsdu ba yi ni lus// sems can don la ro gcig blo// 'di las de nyid 
8a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du med// ye shes zhabs sogs mchog rnams kyis// 'di dag nyid ni gsal bar bshad// dpal ldan gsang ba'i dus pa las// gsungs pa cung zad bshad par bya// dngos 
8a7(rgyud 'grel): po med cing bsgom pa med// khams dag med cing rnam shes med// nam mkha' dang ni mthun pa'i gnas// nam mkha' bzhin du bdag med pa// chos 'di bde ba chen po yin// sa yang med cing chu yang 
8a8(rgyud 'grel): med// me dang rlung yang yod ma yin// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// skye ba 'di ni rab tu gnas// thams cad dngos po dngos med bshad// dngos po med par de yis bsgrags// rnal 
8b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor rnal 'byor par 'brel bas// chad pa ma yin rtag pa min// phyag dang zhabs dang kha dog med// mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do// dngos po thams cad bden pa min// thog ma
8b2(rgyud 'grel): bar dang mtha' spangs pa// 'di ltar dpyad na 'khor lo la// dam pa yang dag rtog pa spangs// phung po khams ni bdag med pa// bsgom bya bde ba dam pa'i gzugs// rang snying sa bon 'od
8b3(rgyud 'grel): zer gyis// 'gro ba gshin rje gshed byas nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// bkug nas de la song bar bsam// rdo rje dri ma med dang chos// ye shes lam skye dgod par bya// der ni rang 
8b4(rgyud 'grel): gi sa bon rnams// ye shes hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs dgod// bde ba dam pa'i rnam pa mthong // yang dag rtog pa thams cad spangs// spro dang bsdu ba yang dag rgyas// bdag nyid mkhas pas
8b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa brtsam// ska la sogs pa spro dang bsdu// rim dang cig car dag kyang rung // khro bo'i tshogs ni sprul la bya// 'gro ba hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sgra// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT 
8b6(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ 'di ltar cho ga 'di yis ni// bsgom nas bzlas pa thams cad bya// zas sogs bya ba thams cad ni// byed 'dod blta bar brtson pa yin// mchod bstod de bdud rtsi myang byas nas// 
8b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can don ni bya ba'i sems// de nyid gsum gyi cho ga yis// ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol// bdag la bdag gi 'khor lo ni// cho ga ji ltar gzhug par bya// rang gi bsod nams 
8b8(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bsags// mngon par byang chub yang dag bsngo// oM AHhUM muHzhes pa 'dis// gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// 'di ni rnal 'byor chen po'o// langs nas rang gi bdag po yi// 
9a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa'i nga rgyal byas nas 'gro// rnam pa thams cad dngos po kun// sngags kyi dngos po de bzhin du// gti mug gshin rje gshed po'i gzugs// bsgoms nas bcag pa dag
9a2(rgyud 'grel): tu bya// thun mtshams su ni rnal 'byor sogs// dang po rnal 'byor pas bsgom bya// cung zad ye shes rjes rnal 'byor// shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// yang dag ye shes dbang rnams 
9a3(rgyud 'grel): pas// shan tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga yis// thun gcig la ni bsam gtan 'dir// rnal 'byor pa yi spro bsdu lus// de nyid gsum bdag ye shes 
9a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs// rang nyid gshin rje gshed po yis// dbang bskur cho ga bsams pa dang // bdud rtsi lnga yi cho ga yis// zas kyi bya ba bya ba dang / gzhan yang mchod pa'i rnam rtog gis// bdag 
9a5(rgyud 'grel): dang pha rol po yang rung // cho ga bzhin du rtag tu mchod// dpal ldan gshin rje gshed gzugs su// mthong ba nyid ni byang chub che// bdag gzhan mnyam par byang chub ste// gang phyir rang gi// 
9a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag po sbyor// de ltar min na ji ltar 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yi grub pa mchog/ ji ltar rnam pa sna tshogs nyid// dngos po gcig la brtags pa ste// grol dang bde dang sdug bsngal 
9a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas// skye 'gyur las kyi bye brag las// rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid sems// bde ba dam pa mtha' yas gzugs// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid// gang phyir 'bras bu nag por 'gyur// / 
9a8(rgyud 'grel): sgrol 'dod 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skye dang 'chi bar bcas pa'i 'khor ba zab mo 'jigs// chags sdang la sogs chu srin 'khrugs pa shin tu g.yo ba lbu ba rmugs nyid sogs// dpal ldan 
9b1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed po bde ba'i rang bzhin nor chen sgrub thabs byas pa yi// tshig gi snang ba grub bcas bdag gis bsod nams thob pas 'gro kun grub thob shog/ tshig gi snang ba grub pa// 
9b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs// slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// paN+Di ta dA na kirti dang / lo ts+tsha ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur// bkra shis/ 
9b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa bzhugs so// @##// rgya gar skad du/ kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri maN+Dal
9b4(rgyud 'grel): no pi ka/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi// dpal ldan
9b5(rgyud 'grel): gshin gshed dkyil 'khor gtsor// btud de cho ga mdor dran ma// me yi dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad// dang po rnal 'byor pa 'gro ba gdon pa'i bsam pa can gyis/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la 
9b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas la rang bzhin grub par bya ba'i phyir ram// gzhan lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba 'debs pa de rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ gal te dkyil 'khor dri bar 'dod na/ rnal 'byor bzhi sngon du
9b7(rgyud 'grel): byas la// bsnyen pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed nag po'i sngags 'bum/ gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa gzhan gyi khri bzlas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes
9b8(rgyud 'grel): su gnang ba mtshan ma thob pa'am/ rang gi sems dag pa'i sgo nas bri bar bya'o// de la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang par/ dkyil 'khor gyis sbyang bar bya'o// gtor 
10a1(rgyud 'grel): ma sbyin zhing mchod pa sna tshogs nye bar byas la// rnal 'byor bzhi dang ldan pa'i grogs dang bcas pas oM b+ha khaM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis na mkha'i rang bzhin du bya'o// 
10a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM laM hUM zhes bya ba so nor 'dzin du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o// oM me dI ni badz+ra ban+d+ha trAM zhes bya bas/ de nyid du rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i gshin rje mthar byed nag po'i gzugs/ 
10a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang / dril bus brel ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa la gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis/ slob ma bzhi lag pa na rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pas/ gsol ba gdab bo// 
10a4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa// gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa// phra ma rdo rje'i/ 
10a5(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo khyod// rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa// rdo rje rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas brnyes// dbyangs mchog kun gyi gtso 
10a6(rgyud 'grel): bo'i gtso// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// phrag dog rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// gshin rje gshed po las kun pa// rdo rje sku dang rab tu mtshungs// phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs 
10a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso// dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// gshin rje 'jigs pa'i 
10a8(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'di// dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso gyur pa// sdig pa thams cad 'jigs byed pa'i// mgon po dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzod// de rnams kyis dbyangs gcig tu gsol ba 
10b1(rgyud 'grel): btab par rig nas/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas gzir bar bltas te// nyon mongs pa rnams bsal ba'i phyir// trAM badz+ra tiSh+Tha zhes bya// 
10b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags kyis/ rang gi rdo rje gsod la/ yi ge ma las mig g.yon pa zla ba Ta las mig g.yas pa nyi mar byas pas// dus dang phyogs kun bsal bar byas nas// rnal 'gyod pas
10b3(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum ma lus pa la blta zhing / rkang pa'i 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar ba bsgoms la/ rdo rje gsor ba nyid kyis/ rdo rje 'gres kyi gar dang / 'khor lo'i sa bser bar bya'o// mgu na 
10b4(rgyud 'grel): hrIHSh+T+rIH la sogs pa spogs pa'i sgras/ dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs sreg par byas la/ nyon cig lha tshogs bgegs kyi tshogs// lus ngag yid la gnas pa rnams// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin
10b5(rgyud 'grel): pa bdeg/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor ba yis// rdo rje lus ni mdangs ldan pas// lus sogs gsum skyes 'jigs par byed// gal te nga la 'gas brnyes na// 'dir ni de gzhom gzhan du
10b6(rgyud 'grel): min// rdo rje'i gnas su 'khor lo dang // rin po che dang pad+ma dang // ral gri rab tu bkod la brjod par bya'o// sa yongs su bzung ba zlas pa'i rjes la// bgegs med par zla ba'i phyir phur bus 
10b7(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya'o// de la phud pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM g+haHg+haHg+hA ta yag+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TaM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM pa TaM/ hUM hAM trUM badz+ra kI la badz+ra d+ha ra pA d+hA pa ya ti/ sarba big+h+nAM kA ya bAk+Shit+ta 
10b8(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra kI la hUM phaT/ rog dang steng dang phyogs mtshams kyi bgegs thams cad // ral grig shin rje gshed kyis phur bus gdab par bya'o// de ltar sa yongs su gzung ba byis te/ sa bgegs zhi bar byas par 
11a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong nas/ phyogs mtshams 'bar ba'i 'od kyis mtshams bcad pa byas te/ phyi rol tu sa'i lha mo mdog ser ba/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ lus kyi phyed srung ba/ phyag g.yas 
11a2(rgyud 'grel): pa khas len pa'i lag pa lta bu g.yon na bum pa 'dzin pa/ me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis mchod la sta gon du gnas par bya'o// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 
11a3(rgyud 'grel): theg pa spyod pa'i khyad par dang // sa dang pha rol phyin pa la'o// ji ltar shAkya seng ge yi// bdud kyi stobs rnams bcom pa ltar// bdag gis bdud kyi stobs bcom ste// dkyil 'khor
11a4(rgyud 'grel): chen po bri bar bya// de nas de nyid du zhugs par bsam par bya ste/ sa sta gon du gnas pa'o// de nas yang de nyid la dris nye bar blugs la/ me tog sna tshogs kyis dgram par bya'o// lha'i gnas
11a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams su tsan+dan la sogs pa'i maN+Dal bya'o// de nyid du snying gar ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis// 'khor lo ba kug la mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa bya'o// mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / bdud 
11a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi myang ba la sogs pa yang bya'o// de nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i pus mo sa la btsugs la/ lag pa g.yas par spos snod thogs te/ 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gsol ba 
11a7(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya'o// bcom ldan gshin gshed bden rdo rje// rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod// dkyil 'khor snying rje'i bdag nyid can// mgon po bdag nyid bri bar 'tshal// 
11a8(rgyud 'grel): slob ma la ni brtse phyir dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bdag ni bcom ldan khyed la gus// dgyes par mdzad pa'i 'os lags so// sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la 
11b1(rgyud 'grel): dgongs// 'gro ba'i 'khor lo bya ba'i phyir// 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang // gzhan yang gsang sngags lha nyid dang // 'jig rten skyong dang 'byung po dang // rdzogs
11b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyis rjes bstan pa// bstan la dga' ba'i sems can dang // gang dag rdo rje'i mig can rnams// rdo rje 'chang chen bdag ming 'di// gau shin rje gshing nag dkyil 
11b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni/ 'gro ba dag phyir bre bar bgyi// ji ltar nus pa'i nyer sbed kyis// rjes su brtse ba nye bar stsol// bdag dang slob mar bcas pa dang // dkyil 'khor pa yi grogs 
11b4(rgyud 'grel): kun la// nye bar mdzad par 'os pa lags/ de ltar len gsum gyi bar du byas nas// 'khor lo de yang dag par mchod de// nam mkha' la dgod par bya'o// de nas rnal 'byor pa 
11b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma dang zla ba'i mig can yi ge dza las dbyung ba gti mug rdo rje gshin rjegashed la sogs pa'i sa bon las byung ba/ de'i kha dog can nyi shu rtsa lngar dbye bar byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nyis
11b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur tsam bya ste/ sgo'i nyi shu ra dri zhim pa lngas rnam par byugs pa'o// skud pa 'khal ba ral grigashin rje gshed dang lhan cig skud pa bsgrim par bya'o// 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyis lpags 
11b7(rgyud 'grel): klus bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bcug laM/ aM dI p+ta dr-iSh+Ta a kra she dzaHzhes bya ba'i sngags 'di dang / aM aHpr-i yats+tsha mauh+ma kA lA re sU tsakra su tra na ya d+hU zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ 
11b8(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang dus kyi dgral gsol ba gdab pa/ oM AHa n+yon+ta nu ga te sarba d+harmAHpar s+pha rA nu ga ta sarba d+har+m+mo a dran+t+ra nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmA dA zhes brjod de/ thig skud 'dzin pas yi ge dza dza dza 
12a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes rang gis bskul zhing gton la/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis lte ba'i steng du thig skad bzung ste/ nub du 'dug la shar du mngon par phyogs pa dang / shar du 'dug ste rub 
12a2(rgyud 'grel): du mngon par phyogs pa dang / lhan cig na mkha'i thig gdab par bya'o// yang 'og gi thig gdab par bri ste/ oM bidz+ra sa ma ya su tra mA taM kra ma hAM/ sems can rnams kyi don du khyod 
12a3(rgyud 'grel): yang ri dus 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes bya ba dang / thig skud kyi sgras na mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul lo/ shar deng nub tu tshangs thig gdab par bya'o// 
12a4(rgyud 'grel): bung du mngon par phyogs pa dang / lhor mngon par phyogs pas/ lho dang byang gi tshangs thig gdab par bya'o// mer 'dug la gnod sbyin du bltas pa dang / dbang ldan du 'dug la yi dgas 
12a5(rgyud 'grel): su bltas te/ shar gyi rtsa ba'i thig gdab po// rlung gi phyogs su 'dug la yi dgas su bltas pa dang / bden bral du 'dug la gnod sbyin du bltas te/ nub phyogs kyi rtsa ba'i thig gdab 
12a6(rgyud 'grel): po/ mer 'dug la klu phyogs su bltas pa dang / bder bral du 'dug ste/ dbang por bltas pas/ lho phyogs kyi rtse ba'i thig gdab pa// rlung gi phyogs su 'dug la dbang por 
12a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs pa dang / dbang ldan du 'dug la klu phyogs su bltas pas/ byung phyogs kyi rtsa ba'i thig gdab bo// cho ga 'di nyid kyis tshangs thig gi phyogs gnyis kar thig bdun bdun gdabag/ 
12a8(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol gyi 'gram du/ thig drug gi rgyab la ni rta babs ci rigs pa'i thig go/ mtshams kyi thig gnyis kyang ngo // thig de nyis bltab du byas pas dbang ldan mtshams nas
12b1(rgyud 'grel): brtsams la// skor phyogs su 'khor lo'i rnam par rdo rje'i phreng ba'i thig gnyis gdab po// phyogs kun kyang mnyam par mos par bya'o// 'dir mtshan ma ngan mthong mi 'grub bo// 
12b2(rgyud 'grel): thig skud chad na bla ma 'chi// phyogs rmongs 'khrul na slob ma'o// lhag chad las nad 'byung bar 'gyur// gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bzhis brgyan pa// thig bzhi dang mnyam 
12b3(rgyud 'grel): par ldan pa// do shal dang so mo do dang / dar dpyangs kyis brgyan pa/ mtshams dang sgo khyud dang / 'gram rnams la rdo rje rin chen gyis mdzes par byas pa'o// de lta bu ni phyi
12b4(rgyud 'grel): rol gyi dkyil 'khor ro// yang nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi byed kyi cha gru bzhi pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la/ rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o// de nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i sgo'i bar du'o// 
12b5(rgyud 'grel): blo dang ldan pas rtse mo lnga rnam par bsams la/ yi ge d+hIHlas khro bo lta'o// sgo ni dkyil 'khor brgyad na ru// bdag nyid chen pos shes par bya// kha khyer chen po ma gtogs par/ 
12b6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mdzes pa yid 'ong ba'o// sgo khyud sgo dang 'drar shes bya// de bzhin lha yi snam bu ste// rdo rje'i lha mor yang dag ldan// glu dang rol mo la sogs gar// kha khyer sgo yi
12b7(rgyud 'grel): byed yin te// sgo khyud la sogs dra ba dang // dra phyed nyi ma zla ba dang // me tog dag gi phreng ba yang // tshon rtsi'i snam bu de yi byed// rtse ba'i thig gi phyi rol lo// rin chen ka ba sogs 
12b8(rgyud 'grel): snam bu// mnyam pa'i sa la tshon rtsi sbyin// rta babs sgo yi su ma gyur te// ba dan dril bur ldan pa rnams// dril bur bcas pa rlung bskyod pa'o// ba dan phyi yi mtshams nyid du// gzhan
13a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'khor lo'i rjes mthun par// ji ltar mdzes par rab tu brtag/ khru gang nyid ni mnyam sbyin zhing // ji srid khru ni stong gi bar// de bzhin du ni rim pa 'dis// snga ma bzhin 
13a2(rgyud 'grel): du mnyam par thig btab nas// rim pa snga ma bzhin du rdul tshon gyi cha dag bteg cing bzung la 'bar ba'i lta stongs kyis mngon par bsngags te/ oM badz+ra tsa tra sa ma ya hUM zhes bya bas so// 
13a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i gshin rje mthar byed nag po'i rnal 'byor pa/ kun tu rtog pa ma lus pa spangs pa/ 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas shing / dbang ldan gyi mtshams su brten
13a4(rgyud 'grel): nas lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bri bar bu ste/ dkar po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu ste/ nag po ni nang nyid du'o// sgo'i nyi shu cha ni tshon rtsi ste/ kun kyang sbom po la sogs 
13a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skyon dang bral bar bri bar bya'o// de la sbom po bris na nad 'byung ngo // phras na ni nor nyams so// ya yos 'khon 'byung ngo // chad na ni 'chi'o// tshen rtsi rnams kyi bar ni nas tsam gyis 
13a6(rgyud 'grel): chod da par bri'o// shar phyogs su ni dkar po che// lho phyogs ser po dang ldan pa// nub kyi cha ni dmar po'o// byang phyogs ljang dang ldan pa'o// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od ldan pa// dbus kyi cha ni
13a7(rgyud 'grel): mnyan par bri// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas su// lha'i gnas thams cad du sna tshogs pad+ma'o// dkyil du nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa 'byis pa'o// shar phyogs kyi rtse mo'i rtsub 
13a8(rgyud 'grel): la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'o// lho phyogs kyi rtsibs kyi rtsa ba la// nyi ma la gnas pa'i rin po che cha dgu pa'o// nub kyi phyogs kyi rtsibs kyi rtsa ba la// nyi ma la gnas pa'i pad+ma dmar po 
13b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma brgyad pa'o// byang gi phyogs kyi rtsibs kyi rtsa ba la ral gri ljang gu'o// sna tshogs rdo rje'i me mtshams su 'khor lo'o// bden bral mtshams su rdo rje'o// rlung gi mtshams su
13b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'o// dbang ldan mtshams su ral gri'o// shar skor ni rdo rje tho ba rtsibs nyi shu pa'o// lho sgor ni dbyig pa dkar po'o// nub sgor ni pad+ma dmar po'o// byang sgor ral gri'o// dkyil 
13b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi mtshams bzhir ni/ pad+ma'i snod bzhi bri bar bya ste/ rdul tshon dgye ba'o// de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la bltas la/ sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na
13b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rang dang mtshungs pa'i yan lag dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag po nyid du gnas te/ de'i sems kyis na mkha'i khams khyab par dkyil 'khor sgrub 
13b5(rgyud 'grel): cing spros la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de// mig la sogs pa dang / lus la sogs pa byin gyis brlab cing / bdag nyid dbang bskur ba'i cho gas dbang bskur bar bya'o// ye shes 
13b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la ar+g+ha la sogs pa dbul zhing khro bo rnams dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la mchod pa dang bstod pa dang / bdud rtsi myang ba yang bya'o// 
13b7(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa dang bsgom pa dang mnyes pa yang bya'o// phyogs skyong ba rnams la yang gtor ma dang mchod pa dbul te/ bdag nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bskor zhing phyag kyang bya ste/ 'di lta bu ni 
13b8(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs so// de nas bum pa bco brgyad gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor du bzhag/ pad+ma'i snod bzhi yang gzhag go// las thams cad kyi mtshan ma gdab/ mgrin pa gos kyis 
14a1(rgyud 'grel): dkri/ tsA ta la sogs pa'i kha rgyan dang ldan par bya// rin po che lnga dang sman lnga dang / 'bru lnga dang ldan pa de dag kyang / sngags las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par bltas/ 
14a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ de rnams su ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang zhing / ar+g+ha la sogs pa phul te/ dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang dbang du byas la mchod pa la sogs pa dbul lo// me tog gi phreng ba 
14a3(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa'i rdo rje steng rnams su bzhag la/ sngags pa de srid 'dod kyi bar du dus gsum du pazla zhing / 'khor lo de chu de nyid kyi rnam par mthong bar bya'o// de lta bu ni bum pa sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga'o// 
14a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas mtshang ba la sogs pa'i skyon zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang / yon padag gi bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin sreg bya'o// de la zhi ba'i thab khung bzhin du las thams cad pa'i thab khung 
14a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ khru gang gi tshad tsam la/ zabs su khru byed bsgos pa ma gtogs pargya dang / 'phang du song bzhi pa'i kha khyer pad+ma rgyas pa'i rnam pa lta bus bskor ba'o// de'i phyi rol du khakhyer song gnyis pas gru 
14a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhir bskor bar bya'o// de'i mtshams la zlab byed pa'i steng du rdo rje rtse gsum pa'o// thab khung gi dkyil du sor brgyad kyi tshad la rtse mo rnams la song re re yod pa'i zhe sdang rdo rje rtse lnga pa bri'o// shar dang ste 
14a7(rgyud 'grel): dang nub dang byang du 'khor lo dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri sor drug gi tshad tsam bri'o// tshon rtsi dkar pos steng du bri'o// de nas rnal 'byor pa kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ bsreg pa'i rdzas 
14a8(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa g.yas ngos su gzhag la/ bsang gtor gyi chu'i snod la sogs pa g.yon phyogs su bzhag go/ bram ze'i khrim mam/ dge 'dun gyi g.yos khang nas me blangs la/ 'o ma can gyi shing rab tu 
14b1(rgyud 'grel): spar bar bya ste/ srog chags la gnod pa spang bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yongs su gyur pa sngon du song ba'i sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du raM las byung ba'i me lha skra mdog dkar po zhal gsum pa gzhug 
14b2(rgyud 'grel): mar gnas pa'i rig pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i skra phyag g.yas na spyi blugs bsnams pa/ gnyis pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ g.yon na dbyig gu rtse gsum pa bsdams pa/ gnyis pa na phreng ba 
14b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa/ gzhan dag na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa/ g.yaso brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa/ khro bo'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bsgoms la/ snying ga na gnas pa'i sa bon las ye shes kyi
14b4(rgyud 'grel): me dgug ste/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaHzhes bya ba'i sngags kyis ku sha'i chun pos bsang gtor la sogs pa dbul zhing / dam tshig 'jug pa dang / mchod pa la sogs bya ste/ de'i zhal du yi ge raM bkod 
14b5(rgyud 'grel): la sreg rdzas byur bu dbul lo// blugs gzar dang dgang gzar gyi mchu dang / mchul yang rim pa bzhin bsgoms te/ sreg rdzas thams cad dbul lo// phyis de'i snying gar gshin rje mthar byed kyi 
14b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsams te/ mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang ba la sogs pa byas la/ mchod pa la 
14b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dbul te/ de'i zhal du yi ge raM bsgoms la/ oM ag+na ye swA hA zhes bya bas/ mar gyis bkang ba'i sreg thugs dbul lo// oM sarba pA pa da ha na badz+rA ya sarba pA pa ni da ha swA hA/ zhes bya 
14b8(rgyud 'grel): bas ni dur ba'o// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA zhes bya bas ni 'bras mgod pa'o// oM sarba sa~M ba de swAhA zhes bya bas ni zho'o// oM a pra ti ta ta badz+rA ya swA hA zhes bya bas ni ku sha'o// oM bo d+ha 
15a1(rgyud 'grel): pra k+Sha ya swAhA zhes bya bas ni a shwang+ka'o// oM badz+ra ku be rA ya swAhA/ zhes bya bas ni n+ya gro d+ha'o// oM badz+ra ya dz+nyA ya sA hA zhes bya bas ni u dum+ba ra'o// oM sa ta ka rA ya swA hA zhes bya bas/ 
15a2(rgyud 'grel): ni a mra'o// shing las byung ba ma yin pa'i sreg rdzas gzhan dag ni/ rang gi 'dod pa'i lha sngags kyi phan ngag ji lta ba bzhin du bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan pas/ bdud rtsi'i ngo bor bsgrubs la bsreg 
15a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de nas 'thor 'thung dang / zhabs bsil dang / me tog dri zhim po la sogs pa dang / na bza' dang / so rtsi dang bshos rnams phul nas/ 'dod pa'i dngos po blangs la/ yi ge muH'i
15a4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' can gyi yi ge gsum gyis gshegs su gsol lo// rdzas lhag ma rnams kyang sngar gyi tshogs me la sregs la gshegs su gsol lo// sbyin sreg gi dgang gzar khru gang gi tshad la rtsa ba rdo rje 
15a5(rgyud 'grel): rin po che dang ldan pa sor bzhi pa sor gnyis brkos pa rdo rje dang ldan pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu 'byung ba'i sbubs/ mthe'u chung gi tshad tsam dang bcas pa'o// blugs gzar ni sor gnyis tsam la sor gcig 
15a6(rgyud 'grel): brkos pa/ rdo rje dang ldan pa/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu ste/ dgang gzar dang / blugs gzar ro// de nas rab gnas kyi sa gzhi gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs dang / rol mo'i 
15a7(rgyud 'grel): sgra sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang / slob dpon yang ji ltar tshogs kyis rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan la/ sku gzugs sam/ ri mo 'am glegs bam mdun du bzhag ste/ bsang gtor dang / yon chab dang 
15a8(rgyud 'grel): 'thor 'thung phul la/ khu tshur g.yon pa 'am/ gzhan du yungs kar blangs te/ sku gzugs la sogs pa mdun du g.yon pa'am/ gzhan gyi sa lan gsum gyi bar du bskor te/ me'i nang du blugs la 
15b1(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba pA pe da ha na badz+ra ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i kham por gsum gyis bskor zhing g.yabs la bskur ro// de nas snyim pas chu blangs la me de nyid du blugs/ de nas na mkha' 
15b2(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nye bar spyod pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod de/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang zhing spos snod bzung la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sta gon du 
15b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i phyir/ dam tshig can khyod kyis bdag la dam tshig stsol cig ces lan gsum du brjod de/ ji ltar yang dag rdzogs sangs kun// dga' ldan gnas su bzhugs nas ni// lha mo sgyu ma'i 
15b4(rgyud 'grel): mngal 'jug pa// de bzhin 'dir yang bzhugs su gsol// mgon po 'dir ni rtag bzhug nas// me tog la sogs 'di bzhes la// mi 'di'i don ni gzung phyir dang // byang chub sems ni brtan
15b5(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod// de nas gti mug rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bstod pa bya'o// lha sta gon du gnas nas tho rangs kyis// sku gzugs gos ser pos g.yogs la// kha shar phyogs su bstan te khrus 
15b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de la rim pa ni 'di yin te/ ba'i rnam pa lnga la/ oM hUM dr-i hrIHaHzhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis/ mngon par bsngags pas bskus la/ de nas dri zhim po'i snum la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho 
15b7(rgyud 'grel): d+ha ni swA hA zhes bya bas sngags te/ ngur ba'i chang bus byug par bya'o// de nas shun pa lnga khar ba'i snod du bzhag la snum phyi'o// de'i rjes la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nas brtsams te/ bum pa so so'i 
15b8(rgyud 'grel): chus khrus gsol lo// ji ltar bltams ma thag tu yang // de bzhin gshegs kun sgrub bus ltar// lha rdzas chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka 
16a1(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya shri ye hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so// de'i rjes la na mkha' la gnas pa'i tsa ra tsi ka la sogs pa/ rig pa'i tshogs rnams bkug nas/ ye shes bdud rtsi chus gang 
16a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa de rnams kyis/ de mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas gos kyis rlan med par phyis la/ dang po'i gnas su bzhag go/ ras bris sam glegs bam mam/ mchod 
16a3(rgyud 'grel): rten chen po rnams ni me long la snga ma bzhin du skra khrus gsol bar bya'o// de lta bu khrus gsol ba'i rim pa'o// de nas mig la sogs pa dang / lus la sogs pa byin gyis brlab cing // bdag 
16a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid dbang bskur la/ rigs kyi gtso bor cod pan nyid du bzhag cing / na mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par dmigs la/ yon chab la sogs/ 
16a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dbul zhing dam tshigs la gzhug par bya'o// glegs bam la ni yi ge'i gzugs nyid 'gyur ba la ni bza' dbul te/ oM badz+ra bsta ye swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so// de nas me tog la 
16a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dbul te/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ chu dang thang la skyes pa yi/ me tog gtso bo mchog 'di dag/ gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul nen/ ji ltar bde bas bzhes su gsol// lhan cig 
16a7(rgyud 'grel): skyes dang sbyar ba yi// gdug pa'i dri yi mchog 'di dag/ gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na// ji ltar bde bas bzhes su gsol// zhun mar 'bru mar snang ba 'di// lha rdzas 'od 'bar mun/ 
16a8(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jig/ bdag nyid dang bas 'bul lags na/ mi shes pa kun gsal du gsol// bza' bca' kun dang bcas pa yi// kha dog dri dang ror ldan pa// bshos gtsang dam pa bdag 'bul na/ 
16b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag thams cad bzhes su gsol// de ltar mngon par bsngags pa'i me tog la sogs pa dbul lo// phyi nas sku gzugs kyi spyan dbye ste// dngul gyi snod na yod pa'i mar dang // sbrang rtsi 
16b2(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi thur mas blangs la/ oM badz+ra tsak+ShA sa man+ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni swAt+ma/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so// de nas lag pa g.yas pas rdo rje gsor zhing g.yon pas dril bu dkrol la// gti mug
16b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// ces bya ba la sogs pa'i bstod pa bya ste/ de lta bu ni rab gnas kyi cho ga'o// gang gi tshe snying rje mchog gi dbang du gyur cing dbang bskur la sogs pas slob ma bsdu bar 'dod 
16b4(rgyud 'grel): na/ de'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyi gnas kyi phyi rol du/ rigs dang gzugs dang lang tshe dang / dad pa dang / thos pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa/ don du gnyer ba'i slob ma lag du me tog thogs te/ 
16b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la phyag byas pa dang / gzhan yon tan med pa yang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas pa chos bshad pas spro ba bskyed 
16b6(rgyud 'grel): do// rjes su gnang ba bzhi po 'am// rang gi bslab pa ldan pa'i 'khor// theg pa chen po'i blo can la// sangs rgyas yang dag cho ga gsungs// sngags kyi dngos grub mtshan ma 'am// 'ga'
16b7(rgyud 'grel): zhig zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dang // de bzhin bsod nams 'dod la gzhan// 'jig rten phyi ma theg mchog dang // mang du 'jig rten pha rol don// byas nas dang ldan blo dag byed// 'jig rten 'di yi/ 
16b8(rgyud 'grel): 'bras spangs nas/ 'jig rten phyi ma'i 'bras 'dod la// gang phyir 'di la phan mang ba// 'di med 'jig rten pha rol pa// de phyir 'jig rten gzhan grub phyir// khyed kyi bstan pa yid kyis 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): bgyis// de ltar smras nas zhi bar 'jug pas rdo rje dang pad+ma dag par byas pa la gsol ba gdab bo// bdag gi ston pa dga' chen khyod// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// 
17a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub chen po'i lam bstan pa// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon/ 
17a3(rgyud 'grel): pos bdag ni gzhug par gsol zhes lan gsum brjod de// gus pa dang ldan pa'i bla ma la 'di ltar gtsor byas la brjod do// sngags spyod tshul gyi cho ga yis// theg chen 'di ni bu khyod shog/ 
17a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni theg pa chen po'i snod// khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// dus gsum 'byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// rdo rje gsang sngags mthu nyid kyis// ye shes 
17a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa med pa brnyes// shAkya seng ge sogs mchog gis// gsang sngags sgo ba mnyam med pas// gang gis sngobs chen bdud kyi sde// shin tu 'jigs pa chen bcom nas// 'jig
17a6(rgyud 'grel): rten rjes 'jug bkod pa yis// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de phyir bu khyod blo yis 'dir// thams cad mkhyen nyid thob par gyis// zhes gsol ba 'debs pa la smras nas// byang
17a7(rgyud 'grel): chub tu sems ma bskyed pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir dang // skyes pa rnams yang dag par sbyor bar bya ba'i phyir/ de dag shin tu 'dod par byas la/ de'i snying gar yi ge hUM las rdo rje/ mgrin par yi 
17a8(rgyud 'grel): ge AHlas pad+ma// spyi bor yi ge oM las 'khor lo// de rnams mus bon dgod pa 'od hUM AHoM zhes brjod la/ dri zhim por bcas pa'i chu rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis gzung nas mgrin par bsdu'o// 
17a9(rgyud 'grel): nga pa nga ma ma lam ya ba ya lamam pa yang mabasamamamathams pa tha mas pa mtshas pa mam mas tham ma ma ma ya sa bam mamasamams mas ma sa yang ma ma mamamamatsham ma ma mamamam mas mas mas mams mamamam thamams sa sa mas ma pa ma la 
17b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas de dag gi mgo la me tog sbyin no// dri dang byug pa ni mdun du'o// mar me mdun du'o// thams cad la las thams cad pa'i sngags bzla'o// de nas chags pa la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral 
17b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i so shing rtse mo me tog can sbyin no// des kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ bca' zhing ba lang gi pags pa tsam gyis phyogs pa lang gi lci bas byugs par dor ro// de nas de lhung ba dang zhi ba 
17b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa grub pa'i mtshan mo de la bstan par bya'o// de nas chu khyor ba gsum gyis kha ba shal te// oM hrIHbi shud+d+haHsarba d+harma pA pa nI tsA s+ya sho d+ha ya sarba bi ka la pa a pa na hUM zhes bya ba'i 
17b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis so// stan dang sngags su ku sha gding ngo // de'i tshad sum 'gyur gyi skud pas bcings te/ las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas pas bsrung ngo // de nas thams cad mkhyen 
17b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'jig rten du// brgya la 'byung ngam mi 'byung 'gyur// u dum ba ra'i me tog kyang // res 'ga' res 'ga' 'byung ba srid// gsang sngags tshul la gnas pa yang // de bas kyang ni rnyed
17b6(rgyud 'grel): par dka'// gang gis sems can dpag med don// nus par mdzad las 'das pa dang // bskal pa du ma dpag med du// gang gis sdig pa sngon byas pa// dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong 
17b7(rgyud 'grel): bas ni// de dag thams cad zad 'gyur bas// sngags spyod tshul la gnas pa dang // mnyam par gyur pas gzhan ci yod// tshe 'di nyid la sngags bzlas pas// bla med gnas su 'gro
17b8(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te// sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung ba yi// ngan 'gro'i gnas ni de dag spangs// de dag thams cad zad 'gyur bas// de dag spyod pa mchog 'di la// blo gros shin du brtan gyur nas// 
18a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni de ring rnyed pa mchog/ bdag nyid chen po rnyed par 'gyur// gang gis rgyal ba thams cad ni// sras dang bcas pas bstan pa 'di// khyod kyi kun gyis yongs 
18a2(rgyud 'grel): bzung ste// gnas nas bdag nyid chen po la// gang gis khyod ni theg chen las// 'dir ni 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin// lam 'di mchog ste dpal dang ldan// theg pa chen po snang ba che// 
18a3(rgyud 'grel): gang gis khyod ni 'gro 'gyur bas// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bstan nas// ku sha bting ba la bzhag la rmi lam cung zhig mthong na'ang nga la tho rangs khyod kyis zlos shig 
18a4(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ste/ 'di ni slob ma sta gon du gnas pa'o// gal te mi dge ba'i mtshan ma zlos na de'i tshe/ las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis brdeg par bya'o// yang des bsrungs la sdom pa 'dzin
18a5(rgyud 'grel): du bcug ste/ dkyil 'khor phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang // gsal ba mgon pos bdag la stsol// dkyil 'khor lha dag bstod pa dang // slob dpon gyi ni las dag dang // sangs rgyas 
18a6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba'i sdom pa bla med rnams// slob dpon gyis ni bdag la stsol// rtag tu sems can don bgyid do// zhes brjod nas/ bdag dang slob ma 'jug 
18a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga yin te/ dang po slob dpon dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing // dbang thams cad rdzogs par bya ste/ rjes su gnang ba thob nas/ yol ba'i phyi rol tu yon phul ba'i slob ma dbang 
18a8(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba'i snod du gyur pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su dmigs la/ oMHkhaM bI ra hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzla zhing me tog gi phreng ba bzung ste/ mig gnyis bkab pa las thams cad pa'i 
18a9(rgyud 'grel): la mas pas mam sa ma tha masasam sa pa mamamams sa pa ma sa yas sa sa mapa ma mams pa mamam sams ma sa pa sas mam sa sa mas pa mamasasamam ma mas sa ma las pas ya mthas mas pa la sa ma sa pa mams ras pa ma gagasams pams par 
18b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis btab pa'i chus bsangs te/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i phyir khyod gang la dga' ba yin zhes dri'o// des kyang skal bzang bdag ni bde ba chen po la'o// zhes brjod do// de ma
18b2(rgyud 'grel): thag tu oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta ut+pA da ya mi zhes bya bas rnal 'byor gyi sems bskyed par bya'o// de nas me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar bzhag la// oM su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho tiSh+Tha badz+ra ya 
18b3(rgyud 'grel): thA su khaM zhes bya'o// de nas sngar bstan pa'i yi ge lnga brjod cing / yol ba'i nang du bkug la 'di skad ces brjod do// de ring khyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ de bas
18b4(rgyud 'grel): na ye shes rdo rje de ngas bskyed par bya'o// ye shes gang gis de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyang 'thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams
18b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas de'i spyi bor rdo rje bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod do// 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste// gal te khyod kyis 'di 'ga' la// smras 
18b6(rgyud 'grel): na mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid ni// de ring khyod kyi snying la gnas// gal te tshul 'di sbas na ni// de yi mod la bkas nas gshegs// zhes bya ba 'dis mna' 
18b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgag go/ tsan+dan dang gur kum bsres pa'i chu la oM badz+ra u da ka thaHzhes lan bdun gyi bar du bzlas la// 'di ni dmyal ba'i chu yin te// dam tshig nyams na bsregs par byed// dam tshig 
18b8(rgyud 'grel): srungs na 'grub 'gyur ba'i// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs shig/ ces brjod la blud do// de nas 'di skad brjod de// de ring phan chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis// ngas gang smras pa de 
19a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod skyes thab med// ngal brnas par bzad cig/ mang bas spangs pang 'a ba dum thung das// dmyal byung byung bar babyung cag ya badz+ra da // danas dpa' 
19a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pathams cad kyi byud gyis parlabyas nas/ rnas pa sad pa'abadag la dbyang dugasapa// nab byed do// dab pa ma ga palas zung ba'i rnam pas ze ba 'a ba 
19a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor zlum pa dkyil du ba'o// snying gar la las drung ba'i dbang chen gyi la 'kha bar bgrubal/ rgya gzung bar bya mas su bachen pa d+hu // lhubang ra las byu 
19a4(rgyud 'grel): ma dkyil 'a khyer thugasam pa dbang ba shin du rnga zhing ma bdil ma'o// drang po'i rag tu ma la mazung badru ga dkyil 'dza mad pa gan pa pa thun mthe'i ba dang byed pas mdzan pa 
19a5(rgyud 'grel): ga lta 'i nga sa par sum sa gas kyi ste/ dgas 
19a6(rgyud 'grel): byu ba hA// dus da kyilal du sa sa ga na la/ da nga ga nga/ dang 
19a7(rgyud 'grel): 'thab pa ma thung byu nag pan/ zag g.yas pa ma rdzog pa ga/ gas pa pardul bu'ikhri gyi/ 'babs pa 'jug sa thos papaste/ sas pral / 
19a8(rgyud 'grel): de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM hrI lib rtenan tu thub za pa ze mA pa~M sha ya swa tra ye rangang la hrIHhUM pab ces byabs myung du zabs par 'gyur ra// den pa'i dad chags ga sa 
19b1(rgyud 'grel): gshed du de ma thag tu dmigs la/ de'i lce la yi ge AHdmar po bsams te/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra zhes brjod de/ rdo rje chos ni mgon po che// 'od dpag med ni bde ba che// smros shig 'dod 
19b2(rgyud 'grel): chags chos chen po// dge dang mi dge ba de 'dri// babs na dge dang mi dge de// ngag gi brtan brjod par byed// sems ni brtan nas khams gsum dag/ shes shing lus ni brtan 
19b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas// na mkha' la yang 'gro bar 'gyur// gal te ring du 'gro 'gyur na// mgo bo'i gtsug tu lam las byung ba'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rdo rjes kun nas mnan par
19b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms la de rengs par bya'o// de lta bu ni dbab pa'o// de nas thogs pa'i me tog de dkyil 'khor du dbul zhing pratIts+tsha badz+ra ho zhes brjod do// de ltar lha gang gi gnas mtshan ma dang nye bar 
19b5(rgyud 'grel): bab par gyur na// de'i rigs yin par de la bstan par bya'o// gnas mchog du bab na dngos grub mchog 'grub po// gnas dkyil du ni dngos grub 'bring ngo // gnas smad kyi las dngos
19b6(rgyud 'grel): grub tha pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du baban dngos grub med do// gal te dkyil 'khor du ma baban de yang 'phang ngo // lan gsum 'phang sna kyang de nyid dum baban de gzung bar mi brag// 
19b7(rgyud 'grel): daMni ma tog dor ba'o// 'phangs pa'i phreng bde blangs te de'i mgol bcings la/ sems can stobs po che 'di long zhig ces brjod do// de nas oM rdo rje sems dpa' dang nyid ni// de ring khyed 
19b8(rgyud 'grel): tho mig 'byed mdzad// de ltang mig ni thal pa cad 'byed// rdo rje mig ni tha med pa// zhes brjod nas gdong galags dbye'// den pa dkyil 'khar gyi la ma ma'i bang bstan pa sdad du 'gribs/ 
20a1(rgyud 'grel): byang phyogs kyi sgo nas brtsams te/ gtso bo'i bar du bstan par bya'o// de ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas chos chen po// rdo rje sems dpas 
20a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ltar// bdag kyang mgon pos dbang bskur zhing // nyid kyi mchog kyang stsal du gsol// zhes bya bas gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma bzung la// rdo rje tsang ci 
20a3(rgyud 'grel): ka la sogs pas bum pas dbang bskur ro// rdo rje chen pos dbang bskur ba// khams gsum po yis phyag byas pa// gsang gsum pa yi gnas byung ba'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis/ 
20a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin par bya// zhes brjod cing // las tham sa cad pa bzlas pa'i bum po'i chu rdo rje khu tshur gyis kun nas gtor zhing / oM badz+ra a b+hi Shany+dzi zhes brjod de/ slob ma 'khor lo sgyur ba bzhin du dbang 
20a5(rgyud 'grel): bskur ro// chu'i dbang bskur ba'o// de nas gser ram gos las bsgrubs pa'i cod pan ji lta ba'i sngags kyis mgo'i steng du bzhag la na mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'i rang gi rigs kyi gzugs 
20a6(rgyud 'grel): su tsid pan la bzhugs su gsol te sbyin pa ni cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba'o// de'i rjes la rdo rje byin la// sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang bskur bas// de reng khyod ni dbang bskur bya// 'di de sangs 
20a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje long zhig rab 'grub 'gyur// zhes brjod cing rdo rje snying ga la sogs par reg la lag pa g.yas par sbyin pa ni rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'o// de nas lag pa g.yom 
20a8(rgyud 'grel): par dril bu byin la// rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i lag pa dag gis 'khrud pa ltar byas te/ oM badz+ra a d+hi pa ti tA oM b+hiShish+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma~M ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la sbyin te/ de ni dril bu'i dbang bskur 
20a9(rgyud 'grel): mas pa ya ma sa mas mams ma las ma man masasam cam mams mam sa ma sa ma mams pams ma mamams ca sa sa thasasam ma sa sa la pas sa sa ma tha sa gapa ma san par masapa sa gas sa thas mams pa mams pa 
20b1(rgyud 'grel): ma thams ma mas sa kya mag ma thamam ma kya las yams pa na thamam gam ma 'a ma mang tham nag sa ma ma sa ma mab pa sem ma sa das ma la mamams ma pa thar tha sa ma mas 
20b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// de nyid la bdag po'i dbang zhes kyang bu'o// de nas rdo rje dril bu spyi bor bzung la/ oM badz+ra sad taM a b+hi Shany+tsi mi badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kye dpal che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya ba/ 
20b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas/ rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i ming gdags so// dbang 'od dag gis sngags dang rgyud bshad pa dang / gsang sngags bsgrub pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni
20b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang lnga pa ste/ rtsa ba'i dbang yin no// rtsa ba'i dbang thams cad la yang tsar tsi ka la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad yin pa nyid do// de nas rtsa ba'i dbang mnos pas slob dpon sdom pa 
20b5(rgyud 'grel): can// kye snying rje'i gter bdag dang gzhan gyi don nus pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang de khyod kyi sku drin gyis sul du zhes gsol ba gdab pa ldan pas dkyil 'khor dang nye bar rdul tshon dmar 
20b6(rgyud 'grel): po las byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du gong stan la bzhag ste/ rdo rje tsar tsi ka la sogs pas dbang bskur zhing dam tshig gsum bzung ngo // de la dam tshig gsum ni 'di yin te// 
20b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM las rdo rje bsgoms la// khams gsum pa yi ral gri che// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/ 'di ni las kyi ral gri mchog/ dgra rnams las rgyal bu phyir zung zhes bya bas de kho na 
20b8(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi rdo rje gzung ngo // 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig go/ de nas AHlas zung ba'i dril bul shes rab dang / thabs kyi ngo ba nyid rdo rje dang dril bu 'dis 'grub par 'gyur gyis zung zhog/ bu 
20b9(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis slob ma la yang zung zhig ces byas la/ de'i lag par byin te/ srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas// sems can rang bzhin rtag tu dag/ srid pa'i mchog ni 
21a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yin zhes bya bas de la gdams par bya ste/ 'di ni dril bu'i dam tshig go/ de nas phyag rgya'i dam tshig bstan te/ yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa nyid// phyag rgya yin par 
21a2(rgyud 'grel): rab grags te// 'di yis rang gi 'dod lha ni// bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por gnas// zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i dam tshig go// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang lha'i de kho na nyid dang slob dpon gyi las dang / 
21a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang / slob dpon 'jug pa'i bya ba bstan par bya'o// de la sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyal ba yin pa bdag de kho na nyid du mnyam pas gru bzhi pa'o// lus dang 
21a4(rgyud 'grel): tshor ba dang sems dang / chos rnams gcig dang du ma dang bral bas gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa nyid la/ dad pa rnam par dag pa ni shar phyogs kyi sgo'o// skyes pa dang ma skyes pa'i mi dge 
21a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chos spang ba dang / mi skyed pa dang skyes pa dang ma skyes pa'i dge ba'i chos 'phel zhing rgyas par bya ba dang / bskyed pa'i phyir rtsom pa'i las dang / rtog pa'i bdag nyid kyis brtson 'grus bzhi
21a6(rgyud 'grel): po rnam par dag pa ni lho'i sgo'o// 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus dang sems dang / dpyod pa zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / gang dran pa rnam par dag pa ni nub kyi sgo'o// dad pa dang 
21a7(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab ces bya ba dbang po lnga'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa ni byang gi sgo'o// rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang / bde ba dang 
21a8(rgyud 'grel): sems rtse gcig pa zhes bya ba bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / rtog pa dang dpyod pa spangs pa bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / dga' ba yang spangs shing btang snyoms dang / dran pa dang ldan/ 
21b1(rgyud 'grel): pas bsam gtan gsum pa dang / btang snyoms dang dran pa dag pa dang / sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor babasam gtan bzhi pa rnam par dag pa ni/ rta babs bzhi'o// 
21b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / na mkha' mdzod dang / dri ma med pa dang / seng+ge rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi po rnam par dag pa ni kha khyer bzhi'o// don dang gzhung dang / nges tshig dang 
21b3(rgyud 'grel): spobs pa bzhi dang / gzungs bzhi rnam par dag pa ni kha khyer la gnas pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs so// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs pas ni rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs so// mdo dang dbyangs// 
21b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / cheng du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang rmad du byung ba gsung rab yan lag/ 
21b5(rgyud 'grel): dgu gdul bya'i skye bo la bstan pa rnam par dag pa ni dril bu dang g.yer ga'i sgra dang ba dan no// dran pa dang chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / brtson 'grus dang dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang // 
21b6(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms zhes bya ba byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par dag pa ni/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang / me long dang me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga yab 'bar ba'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du/ 
21b7(rgyud 'grel): shes kyis phyi rol gyi gzugs stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par mthong ba zhes bya ba rnam par thar pa dang po dang / phyi rol gyi gzugs med pa'i 'du shes kyis nang 
21b8(rgyud 'grel): gi gzugs de bzhin du mthong ba zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dang / nang dang phyi rol gyi gzugs med pa'i 'du shes kyis gzugs rnams mngon sum du nye bar rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa zhes bya ba gsum 
22a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la stobs par 'jug pa bzhi pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa lnga pa dang / ci yang med pa'i skye 
22a2(rgyud 'grel): mched la snyoms par 'jug pa drug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa bdun pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni brgyad pa ste/ 'di dag/ 
22a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams dag pa ni/ sna tshogs rdo rje'i zur bzhi dang logs bzhi'o// rdo rje'i theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i steng gi rim pa dang / 'brel pa'i rdo rje'i theg dang yang 
22a4(rgyud 'grel): dag par lda pa'o// 'bras bu dbyibs 'jig chags la lta ba'i ra'i rtsem shin du mtho ba'i bye brag gis sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse ma'i shu'o// rten dang brten pa'i dbyabs sa ldan ngas rnams dang stu/ 
22a5(rgyud 'grel): ngo // gos pa med pa'i chos gcig dang / du ma ji ltar rigs pa rab tu ston pa ni/ lha'i gnas kyi sna tshogs pad+ma'o// byang chub kyi sems yongs su smin par byed pas nyi ma'i gdan dang ldan pa'o// / 
22a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi sems kyi myu gu 'phel bar byed pas zla ba'i gdan dang ldan pa'o// snying rje'i bdud rtsis yongs su gang bas bum pa brgyad do// chos kyi 'od kyi sngon ma'i grags pa ni dri zhim po'o// 
22a7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi zas ni bshos gtsang ste/ de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do// lha'i de kho na nyid brjod par bya'o// de la rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang / zhe sdang chen po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang 
22a8(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das so// 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyan mongs pa bsdus pas gnag pa ni nag po'o// brtags pa'i yongs su bya ngan las 'das pa nyid gshin rje mthar
22b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i phyir gshin rje gshed do// shin tu gdug pa can drag po zhi bas mi 'dul la khro bo chen po'o// rnam thar sgo gsum rnam par dag bzhal gsum mo// pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs 
22b2(rgyud 'grel): su rdzogs pas phyag drug go/ ser sna la sogs pa 'jig par mdzad pas rdo rje la sogs pa drug phyag na bsdams pa'o// zhe sdang gi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'jig pas sbrul gyis brgyan pa'o// 
22b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pas rang dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes la 'khyud pa'o// rtag tu sems can gyi don mdzad pas lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo'o// chos kyi sku nyid kyi phyir 
22b4(rgyud 'grel): longs spyad rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku mdzad pa'o// gzugs kyi phung po dang gti bug chen po rnam par dag pa dang // me long lta bu'i ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das gti mug gshin rje 
22b5(rgyud 'grel): gshed do// gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no// gti mug gi tsha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i bra ma chen po dang / tshor ba'i phung po rnam par dag pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das thar
22b6(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed do// lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no// nga rgyal gyi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang // 'dod chags chen po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po rnam par dag pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni/ bcom ldan 
22b7(rgyud 'grel): 'das 'dod chags gshin rje gshed do// 'dod chags kyi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / phrag dog chen po dang 'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pa dang / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das phrag dog 
22b8(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed do// phrag dog gi cha'i nyon mongs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / phung po'i bdud la dad pa rnam par dag pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das tho ba ga shin rje gshed do// 
23a1(rgyud 'grel): mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang / 'dod pa'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud la brtson 'grus rnam 
23a2(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das dbyig pa gshin rje gshed do// mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su mthun par nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang // las kyi sgrib pa dang / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / 'chi bdag 
23a3(rgyud 'grel): gi bdud la dran pa rnam par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gshin rje gshed do// mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul 
23a4(rgyud 'grel): zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / lha'i bu rnam par g.yeng byed bdud la ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das ral gri gshin rje gshed do// sa'i khams dang thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 
23a5(rgyud 'grel): byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid rdo rje car tsi ka'o// chu'i khams dang smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / snying rje chen po'i ngo bo ni rdo rje phag mo'o// me'i khams dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dga'/ 
23a6(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po'i ngo bo rdo rje dbyangs can ma'o// rlung gi khams dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / btang snyoms chen po'i ngo bo ni rdo rje gau ri ma'o// phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa dag pa ni thod pa bzhi'o// 
23a7(rgyud 'grel): nang dri zhim pos kyang bkang ba ni// chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro'o// pha rol tu byin pa sa dang sbyar ba yang brtag par bya'o// stobs dang ma 'dres pa la sogs pa ma bris pa ni gzhung mangs kyi dog 
23a8(rgyud 'grel): pas 'jigs pas so// de lta bu ni lha'i de khor nyid do// de nas slob dpon gyi las te bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang / bza' ba'i dam tshig bslab pa rgyud de dang de dag bstan pa'o// bdag bsrung ba ni 
23b1(rgyud 'grel): so sor 'brang ma'i dkyil 'khor dang sgrub thabs bstan pas so// slob dpon 'jug pa ni gtor ma byin te/ de la rnal 'byor bzhi dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / btung ba 
23b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bldag pa la sogs pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ba dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rdul mtshan dang dril bu la sogs pa'i sgra chen po kun rdzob du rdzogs pa 
23b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i gtor ma shing rta bkang ba'am/ ma 'byor na nas kyi khur ba'am/ 'bras char nyung shas tsam dang bcas pa'i chu khyor ba gsum tsam yang rung ngo // de nas khro bzhags pa dang lcags
23b4(rgyud 'grel): thul sogs pa thogs pa spos te phyogs spong ba rnams snying gnas lcags kyus bzung zhing / mgrin pa zhags pas bcings nas drangs par bas pa po// de la oM Sh+T+r-iSh+T+rIHl-i gr-i d+han da d+hu d+hu phaT paH/ 
23b5(rgyud 'grel): sarba duShArbAs pa ri b+hA ra mA kaR+Sha ya dzaHzhes bya bas dbang po mig stong pa bdag dmar ser glang po che'i steng na 'dug pa/ lag pa g.yas dang g.yon rdo rje dang sdigs mi dzub byas pa bkug la bzhag 
23b6(rgyud 'grel): go/ sngags de nyid kyis nye dbang na mkha' lding la zhon pa/ rin pa che'i cod pan can/ g.yas da bsrubs shing dang / 'khor lo ga yon na dung dang nor bu ka tu ba thogs pa/ de'i g.yon du ha cang mi ring bar 
23b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhag go/ gshin rje sngon po ma he la zhon pa skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba/ lag par dbyig pa dang / sdigs mdzub can gshin rje'i phyogs su'o// chub dag dkar po zang 'grol zhon pa/ lag na glu 
23b8(rgyud 'grel): zhags thogs pa/ nub phyogs su'o// ku ber nor gyi steng na 'jug pa ser po sa bor gyi grong khyer dang / ne'u le lag na thogs pa byang phyogs su'o// de nyid dug+na can dkar po byi ba la zhon pa lag ba ga yas 
24a1(rgyud 'grel): na phreng ba dang / sta re/ g.yon na la phug dngal du thogs pa'o// dbang ldan dkar po glang la zhon pa ral pa can/ mig gsum brtse gsum dang / bod pa thogs pa lag pa gnyis kyis 
24a2(rgyud 'grel): go ra la 'khrud pa dbang ldan phyogs su'o// me lha dmar por skyes la zhon pa/ lag na phreng ba dang spyi blugs thogs pa/ me'i phyogs su'o// srin po rol zhon pa gri gug dang / thod pa lag na thogs pa khro zhing 
24a3(rgyud 'grel): rngam pa sngon po bden bral du'o// rlung lnga du ba'i mdog can ri dgas la zhon pa lag pa gnyis kyis gos thogs pa/ rlung gi phyogs su'o// zla ba dkar po ku mu ta'i steng na 'dug pa ku mu ta lag na thogs pa steng du'o// 
24a4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma dmang po lag na pad+ma thogs pa/ rta mchog bdun la zhor pa steng du'o// tshangs pa dmar po gdong gsum pa la gan thal ba'i sod dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / dbyig pa dang / phreng ba thogs pa can 
24a5(rgyud 'grel): dang pa la zhon pa yang steng du'o// sa'i lha mo ser mo pad+ma la gnas pa g.yon na bum pa thogs pa/ g.yas pa khas len pa'i lag pa can 'og du'o// thags bzangs ris sngon po shin rta la zhon pa/ lag pas ral 
24a6(rgyud 'grel): gri dang sdigs mdzub can de nyid du dgod do// de dag thams cad dgug pa'i sngags la sogs pa ni snga ma de nyid do// de nas yang rang gi snying ga nas khro bo'i phur bus mgrin pa nas bzung nas/ thogs pa'i khro bo 
24a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams rnam par spros la/ de dag gi snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / mgo dang / rkang pa'i bar du gdab bo// sngags ni yau hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM trUM phaT phaT sarba duSh+Tan+na di sa pa ri kA ra Na kI la ya hUM phaT ces bya'o// 
24a8(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la grub pa'i bcud kyis ler grub pa bzhin du kun kyang // gshin rje gshed kyi rnam par bsgrub pa'am/ byang chub kyi sems khu ba'i ngo bor bsgrub po// gal te khu bo'i ngo bo nyid yin na de'i tshe sa bon dang phyag 
24b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gyi rim pas bskyed par bya'o// de la oM dang rdo rje las byung ba'i dbang po dmar ser rin po che'i cod pan can phyag dang po gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa/ lhags bzhin rdo rje dang ral gri dang / pad+ma dang 'khor lo bskams pa/ 
24b2(rgyud 'grel): rabong can la bzhugs pa'o// hrIHdang dbyig pa las gshin rje sngon po g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal dkar po dang dmar po g.yas rnams ni gri gug dang dbyig pa dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon rnams na thod pa dang / 
24b3(rgyud 'grel): sna ba pa ga/ ma la gsas sa/ / u pa la ya / gyu pa da/ das pag gak+Sha/ 
24b4(rgyud 'grel): zhags dang / ral gri/ phyag g.yon na thod pa dang pad+ma dang / 'khor lo rin po che'i cod pan can bla ba la bzhugs pa'o// wi dang sa bon gyi grong khyer las ku be re ser po g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zham 
24b5(rgyud 'grel): sngon po dang / dkar po gri gug dang / sa bon gyi khong khyer dang / ral gri phyag g.yor na thod pa dang / pad+ma dang / 'khor lo 'tsho ba rin po ci'i cod par can ri bong can la bzhugs pa'o// kr-i dang rtse gsum pa las dbang / 
24b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan dkar po zhal g.yas dang g.yon sngon po dang / dmar po// g.yas na gri gug dang / rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri dang / phyag g.yon na thod pa dang / nor bu dang / 'khor lo go ri la 'khyud pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba
24b7(rgyud 'grel): can ri bong can la bzhugs pa'o// ta dang thal snod las me lha dmar po zhal g.yas dang g.yon sngon po dang dkar po// g.yas na gri gug dang thal snod dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon na thod pa dang pad+ma dang nor bu/ 
24b8(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// A dang rtse gsum las bden bral sngon po khro bo'i gzugs dang / zhal g.yas dang g.yon dkar po dang / dmar po dang / g.yas na gri gug dang dbyig pa dang ral gri/ gyag 
25a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na thod pa dang pad+ma dang 'khor lo// nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// na dang gos las rlung lha du ba'i mdog can/ zhal g.yas dang g.yon dkar po dang dmar po/ phyag g.yas/ 
25a2(rgyud 'grel): na gri gug dang ba dan dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon na thod pa dang nor bu dang pad+ma dang zla ba la bzhugs pa'o// na dang ku mu ta las zla ba mdog dkar po zhal g.yas dang g.yon sngon po dang dmar po/ g.yas gri gug
25a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ku mu ta dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon na thod pa dang / nor bu dang 'khor lo'o// hUM dang pad+ma las nyi ma dmar po zhal g.yas dang / g.yon sngon po dang dkar po// g.yas na gri gug dang / pad+ma dang ral gri/ phyag
25a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na thod pa dang nor bu dang 'khor lo// hUM dang phreng ba las/ tshangs pa dmar po zhal g.yas dang / g.yon dkar mo dang dmar po/ phyag g.yas na gri gug dang phreng ba dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon na thod 
25a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang nor bu dang / pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs pa'o// phaT dang pad+ma las/ sa'i lha mo ser ba/ zhal g.yas dang g.yon sngon po dang dkar ba/ g.yas na gri gug dang bum pa dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon na thod pa 
25a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / nor bu dang / pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs pa'o// phaT dang ral gri las thag bzangs ris sngon po/ zhal g.yas dang g.yon dkar po dang dmar po/ g.yas na gri gug dang / ral gri dang rdo rje dang phyag 
25a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na thod pa dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma nyi ma la bzhugs pa'o// sA dang dung las khyab 'jug sngon po/ zhal g.yas dang g.yon dkar po dang dmar po/ g.yas gri gug dang dung dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon na 
25a8(rgyud 'grel): thod pa dang / 'khor lo dang / pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs pa'o// hA dang dgra sta las sna can dkar po/ zhal g.yas dang g.yon sngon po dang dmar po// g.yas na gri gug dang dgra sta dang / ral gri phyag g.yon 
25b1(rgyud 'grel): na thod pa dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma/ ri bong can la bzhugs pa'o// de dag thams cad kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab ni sku dang gnyis su med par gyur pa/ phyag dang po gnyis na thod pa thogs pa 'khyud pa'i 
25b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis 'dzin pa/ g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa/ sgrub pa po'i bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad pa/ de lta bur bsams la/ de dag gi mig la sogs pa la/ ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje mig la 
25b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bskyed de/ lus la sogs pa la sku rdo rje la sogs pa dang / ji skad bshad pas dbang bskur la/ cod pan la gshin rje mthar byed bsams te/ yon chab dang zhabs bsil dang / bsang 
25b4(rgyud 'grel): gtor dbul lo// de nas gtor ma thams cad bstab par bya ste/ bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i thabs kyis bsgrubs la/ de nyid gsum gyis bsngags te/ de'i lce'i sbyor ba rnam par bsams la/ bdud rtsi 
25b5(rgyud 'grel): dbul lo// sngags 'di yin te/ oM an+d+ri ya hriHya ma yaSh+Ti bu bu nA ya wi/ ku be rA ya kr-i/ I shA na ya ta/ at+pa ye A/ nai ri ta ye na/ bA ya be na/ tsan+d+ra yaM hUM/ ar+k+ka ya hUM/ brah+ma Ne pa Ta/ ba su 
25b6(rgyud 'grel): d+ha re yai phaT/ be ma tsi tra Ne s+tha/ sarba b+hu te b+h+yo hA / hi hi hUM tAM po pe baT swA hA// de nas me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / dri dang bshos gtsang la sogs pa bul la/ de dag gis kyang sgrub pa po
