25b7(rgyud 'grel): mngon par dga' ba'i myang ba la sogs pa nye bar longs spyod par gyur to// de nas de dag la bstod pa ste/ rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol nas/ gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod ces bya ba la sogs pas bstod 
25b8(rgyud 'grel): nas/ mngon par 'dod pa blangs la gshegs su gsol te/ oM aHhUM muHzhes bya bas so// sgrub pa po de ji ltar 'dod pa de dang / de sgrub cing mdun du rgyal bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i 'gro ba'i don 
26a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad do// 'di ni gtor ma'i de kho na nyid do// de'i rjes la slob ma gshin rje 'dul ba'i gzugs su dmigs la rjes su gnang ba sbyin te/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// 'jig 
26a2(rgyud 'grel): rten kun la thams cad du// ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogasal// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis// chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang // rin po che dang pad+ma dang // las kyi sgra bcug pa'i rim pa'i tshigs su bcad
26a3(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga ni rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa'o// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de// rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na gnas// phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung // zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sbyin 
26a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha tA d+ha ra yA mi badz+ra satwa hI hI hI hI hUM zhes slob ma la brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o// 'di ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o// de nas bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi 
26a5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su bsams la/ lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis chos gos snying gar bzung ba'i tshul dang / g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa byas la// oM e Sho hAM bya ka ra mau tA/ badz+ra satwa ta thA ga ta/ b+ha ba durga ta ti bud+d+he 
26a6(rgyud 'grel): h+ye/ at+pan+ta b+ha ba sid+d+ha ye// kye che ge mo zhes bya ba taM thA ga ta sid+d+hiHsa ma ya s+t+waM b+har+b+bam+ba sAHzhes tshig 'di dang phyag rgya 'dis lung bstan pa byas pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du mgrin gcig
26a7(rgyud 'grel): gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston te/ mngon par mtho ba'i phyag rgya 'di'i mthu dang sngags 'di yi stobs la dad par gyis shig/ ces bya ba slob ma la brjod de 'di ni lung bstan pa'o// / 
26a8(rgyud 'grel): de nas gsang ba brjod par bya ba ste/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig/ gzhan ni khams gsum na med de// des na rtag tu khyod kyis ni// 'dod chags bral bar mi bya'o// dam tshig sbyin pa ni hUM phaT gsang ba 
26b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis/ sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// de ring khyod ni gnas par gyur// khyod ni yang yang mi mchi bas// de phyir bde chen theg pa 
26b2(rgyud 'grel): mthong // srid pa'i sdug bsngal las 'das pa'i// srid pa khyod kyis shin tu 'grub// rdo rje phyag rgya zhes bya gang // gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid 'thob the tshom med// byang chub sems ni 
26b3(rgyud 'grel): btang mi bya// gang phyir rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i phyir// dam pa'i chos ni smad mi bgyi// nam yang spang bar mi bya'o// ma rig ba'am gti mug gis// rtag tu skur pa mi gdab po// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// nam yang/ 
26b4(rgyud 'grel): btang bar mi bya'o// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya ste// de ni sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// rang gi bdag nyid mi spang ste// dka' thub kyis kyang gdung mi bya// ji ltar bde bas bde ba gzung // 'di ni ma 'ongs 
26b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nyid// de ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis// khyod kyi sngags dang rgyud kyang zung // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // lha rnams kyis kyang 'dod pa yin// sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir// 
26b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin du khyod kyis ni// 'bad pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// sgrub pa pos ni rgud la sbyar// zhes bya ba ni dbugs dbyung ba'o// 'di dang rjes su gnas pa bzhi po ni// dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs sam dbang bzhi 
26b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rjes thogs su yang sbyin par bya'o// slob dpon gyi dbang nyid la phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang zhes kyang bya ste/ 'di ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'o// da ni gos kyi yol ba la sogs pas dben par byas pa'i phyogs 
26b8(rgyud 'grel): cig tu slob mar zin pa mdzes pa gzugs la sogs pa yon tan dang ldan pa dam tshig gi sdom pa can sbyor ba bzhi la mkhas pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bla ma la gsang ba'i dbang gi don du dbul lo// de nas byang chub
27a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes sangs rgyas rnams// ji ltar mchod chen stsol mdzad pa// bdag la'ang bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir// na mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol// zhes bya ba 'am/ gzhan gyis kyang gsol ba gdab po// 
27a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas tha mas sbyor ba bzhi mngon du byas la chos nyid kyi pad+ma'i nang na rdo rje zhugs pa'i mtha' bskyod pas/ rang rig pa'i mthar phyin pa srin lag dang mthe bos blangs te slob ma'i kha ru bcug nas/ btung ba 
27a3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'di de ni// rdo rje lus su rab sgrub byed// bu khyod rtag tu shes gyis la// yid las byung ba'i chu 'di 'thung // zhes bya bas sbyin no// des kyang e ma bde ba chen po// zhes brjod cing mid par 
27a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// des kyang rang gi pad+ma'i lhag ma yang der gzhug par bya ste/ 'di ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo // de'i rdo rje la de nyid dam gzhan yang rung // rang rig pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sngar bstan pa'i
27a5(rgyud 'grel): tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab pa'i slob ma'i lag par de'i lag pa gtad la/ mdzes pa 'di ni gzung ba dang / bstod bya sangs rgyas rnams kyi brtags// 'khor lo rjes chags sbyor ba yis// de 
27a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir bde ba dam pa myang // thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas min// 'gro gsum 'di dag dag pa ste// de phyir 'khor ba spong ba ni// khyod ni nam yang ma byed cig/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i 
27a7(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs bla na med// glen pa gang zhig 'das gyur na// dngos grub mchog ni de la med// ces brjod la sbyin no// de yang gur kum la sogs pas byugs la dri zhim po'i me tog gi phreng bas brgyan te// 
27a8(rgyud 'grel): gos dang bral bas chu skyes rab tu rgyas par gsal bar ston cing // slob ma la 'di skad brjod do// bu khyod dga' ba gang la yin// dri chen dri chu la sogs zas// de bzhin khrag dang shukra dang // sha dang bud 
27b1(rgyud 'grel): med gus dang gzhan// de bzhin b+ha ga'i pad+ma la// 'o byed smros shig bde ba can// zhes brjod par bya'o// des kyang / lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro// dri chen dri chu khu sogs 'tshal// bud med la yang rtag 
27b2(rgyud 'grel): dad bgyid// b+ha ga la yang 'o bgyid do zhes brjod do// de nas des/ e ma'o bdag gi pad+ma 'di// bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan// gang dag tshogs bsten byed pa// bdag ni de yi mdun na gnas/ 
27b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mnyes pa la sogs pa// ji lta ba bzhin pad+mar byas// bde chen rgyal po rang nyid kyang // 'di nyid na ni rtag tu bzhugs// kye thar pa bsten cig ces brjod nas// des kyang bla ma'i man ngag gis// 
27b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mar// dmigs pa bstan pa'i cho ga'i bye brag gis// rnal 'byor pas ni ji srid du// byang chub sems ni 'thung 'gyur ba// de srid rgyun mi 'chad 'thob pa// dga' ba'i bde las 
27b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ci yod// dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur te// byang chub sems ni 'bab gyur pas// phung po'i rnam shes rgyal gyur pa// smad pas dngos grub ga la yod// rdo rje nam mkha'i khams sbyong bas// der 
27b6(rgyud 'grel): reg pa las ngo mtshar che'i// bde ba gang gang de las bskyed// mchog tu dga' ba byed pa'o// dga' bral gyi ni dbus dag tu// ltos la bstan pa mtshon par gyis// pad+ma'i rdo rje la rdo rje'i bar ta kas mnan
27b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas su rdo rje skyil krung gis// sems nor bu'i nang du song bas bltas la/ gang gi tshe ye shes skyes pa de'i tshe/ de'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min// dbus kyang
27b8(rgyud 'grel): dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor gang tshe shes mig gis// zad med pa de la gnas pa ni// thun nam yang na nyin mtshan nam// zla byed zla gcig lo dang ni// bskal pa'am bskal pa stong dag du// 
28a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mngon par sbyor bas gnas// de ltar brtags nas nus pa ji lta ba bzhin sems pa btang ste/ bcud kyis len gyis rtogs pa bzung la chu skyes kyis mtha' de nyid du mthong ba'i byang // 
28a2(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi sems blangs nas// ro mnyam par gyur pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o// gal te 'dir dbang lnga dang // shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ma gsungs par// dang po rtsa ba'i dbang yin te// 
28a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis par ral gri sbyin par bya// gsum pa rdo rje dril bu ste// bzhi pa zla ba bza' ba'o// bzhi po de ni dbang chen ste// nag po'i zhal nas byung ba yin// zhes rgyud las gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na/ 
28a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang lnga po de nyid rtsa ba'i dbang zhes bya ste/ thams cad du rdo rje car cig la sogs pa rtsa ba'i dbang gi byed par ldan pa'i phyir dang // 'dis thams cad du las rang dbang du gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro// 
28a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dam tshig sbyin pa ni ral gri'i dbang ste/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bstan pa nyid kyis rdo rje dang // dril bu spyi bor bzhag pas rgyud las thun mong / 
28a6(rgyud 'grel): du gsungs pa'i brtul zhugs dang / lung bstan pa dang dbugs dbyung ba bstan pa'o// shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs su bsgom nas/ btsun mo thams cad blang bar bya'o// de 
28a7(rgyud 'grel): nas btsun mos rdo rje blta/ der ni 'o ma bsgrub par bya// rtse gcig sems kyis 'o ma bsgoms// phyag rgya chen por rab bsgrub pas zhes bya bas bsgrubs pa nyid ni bla na med pa'i 'gro ba'i don ma lus 
28a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ bsgrub pa brtags pa'i ngo bo dang bral bas yang rang gis rig pa dang / tha mi dad pa thub pa'i 'khor lo'i bdag nyid/ yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i 'od 'gro ba bstan pa'i rang bzhin slob ma la 
28b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin na// zhes bya ba 'di yang sbyin pa'o// slob ma de la phan yon gyis spro bar bya ste/ mthong dang reg pas mchog nyid kyi// snying po mchog gi dkyil 'khar ni// sdig pa kun las rnam grol ba// de ring khyod na 
28b2(rgyud 'grel): logs par gnas// khyad la yang yang 'chi ba med// bde ba chen po'i theg pa 'di// kun tu bzang po yin pas na// gang yang ma 'jigs khyod ral cig/ khyod ni srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgal// srid pa shin 
28b3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i phyir// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i mchog gi mchog/ 'di ni rtag tu bsrung bar gyis// dngos grub dam tshig sdom pas yin// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par gsungs// bka' 'di rtag pa mchog
28b4(rgyud 'grel): yin no// slob dpor la ni brnyas mi bya// bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya// de bzhin khros nas spun zla yi// skyon rnams bsgrags par mi bya'o// sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems// 
28b5(rgyud 'grel): nam yang btang bar mi bya'o// byang chub sems kyang spang mi bya// rang gzhan chos la spad mi bya// sems can yongs su ma srin la// gsang ba nyid ni bsgrag mi bya// bdag nyid smad par mi bya'o// rang gi 
28b6(rgyud 'grel): chos la spang mi bya// / gdug pa byams pas rtag tu spang // chos la tshad bzung bar mi bgyi// sems can dang pa can mi bslu// rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bye// shes rab rang bzhin bud med rnams// skyon 
28b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di zhes kyang smad mi bgyi// rnal 'byor slong mos mi 'khor zhi// rnal 'byor nyid ni spang mi bya// rtag par rgyun tu gsang sngags bzla// dam tshig la sogs rtag tu bsten// de bzhin bla ma'i dam tshig 
28b8(rgyud 'grel): la// gnod na dkyil 'khor bris byas la// bde gshegs rnams la sdig pa bshags// de ring skye ba 'bras bur bcas// de phyir 'di ni legs par mnos// mi nyam pa yi lha rnams dang // mnyam 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'gyur bar the tshom med// sangs rgyas rdo rjer bcas kun gyis// tshe dang ldan khyod deng dbang bskur// khams gsum rgyal po chen po ste// de ring bdag por rab du brtan// de ring bdud/ 
29a2(rgyud 'grel): las rnam par rgyal// grong khyer mchog du rab du zhugs// de ring sangs rgyas nyid thob par// gyur pa 'di la the tshom med// ces bya bas rang gi rdo rje dam tshig mi zad pa'i bde ba byin la// bsten cig 'gro ba myur 
29a3(rgyud 'grel): ba yi// rdo rje sems dpa' bde bas dang // rab tu mtshungs par rtag tu gyur// bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// slob ma gus pa gsal ba yi// gsungs shig de bzhin bdag gis bgyi// gtso bos 
29a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bka' stsal bzhin// gal te yod par gyur na de'i lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo thams cad kyis blangs la sbyin sreg gis zhi bar bya'o// sreg rdzas gcig gam gnyis sam/ bdun gyi bar gyis so// des
29a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang mgu ba'i yid kyis ji ltar 'byor pa'i sa gzhi dang / glang po dang / rta dang / gser dang / rgyan dang / bu dang chung ma la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i dngos po 'am// bdag nyid kyang dngos grub la sogs pa
29a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i phyir dbul lo// yon bza' ba dang / rang dang gzhan gyi 'khor los mchod par bya'o// sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma bzung la// mchog sna tshogs kyis de dag tshim par byas te/ gshegs 
29a7(rgyud 'grel): su gsol lo// de nas mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / 'dud rtsi myang ba byas la gsol ba btab ste/ brtan pos lha'i nga rgyal bya'o// chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med 
29a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'o zhes brjod do// rdo rje rtse mos 'khor lo gshegs su gsol lo// de nas 'dod pa la rdul tshon cung zad byin la/ chu chen por gshegs su gsol lo// snying po grong du gang bcug dang / byig sreg 'khor/ 
29b1(rgyud 'grel): lo'i nor gang yin// de dag thams cad slob dpon ni// rdo rje 'chang mchog bskur bar bya// bzang po zhabs sogs kyis mdzad pa// gsang ba 'dus pa'i cho gar gsal// 'dir ni gsang ba'i rlabs 'khor lo// 
29b2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga la 'bad nyid kyis ngal// de phyir dbang po mchog rnams ni// skye bo bzang la bzod par gsol// gang phyir rang nyid dran pa'i phyir// dpal ldan gshin gshed dkyil 'khor gyi// cho ga sems can don bsgrub byas// 
29b3(rgyud 'grel): de las dge ba gang thob pa// rang gi shes las gzhan min pa'i// las 'joms shes rab dang ldan pa// spyod yul mi shes mun kun sel// srid pa mi 'jigs sad byed pa'i// legs pa'i tshogs gang thob pa 
29b4(rgyud 'grel): des// bdag dang 'gro ba blo ster shog/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs// slob dpon mkhas pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dAn kIrti dang // 
29b5(rgyud 'grel): lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @// rgya gar skad du// badz+ra sa ra swatI stotra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa/ rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag 
29b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// shes rab mnga' bdag rdo rje dbyangs can ma// yang dag lam ston bla ma rje btsun la// dad cing mos la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros spel phyir bstod pa cung zad bri// dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs 
29b7(rgyud 'grel): can ma// rang don grub nas gzhan don ni// mchog tu gzhol mdzad rje btsun ma// dbyangs can de la spyi bo yis// kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal bstod// zhal gsum rnam thar gsum gyi dngos// phyag 
29b8(rgyud 'grel): drug pha rol phyin drug rdzogs// zhabs gnyis bden gnyis don rtogs ma// rje btsun ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rjes 'gro ba smin mdzad pas// rtag tu pad ma rA ga'i mdog/ dbyangs can de la spyi 
30a1(rgyud 'grel): bo yis// kun nas drang bas phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis mgos pas// rtag tu chu skyes steng ngan bzhugs// dbyangs can de la spyi bo yis// kun nas dang 
30a2(rgyud 'grel): bas phyag 'tshal bstod// rtsa ba'i zhal ni pad ma rA ga' mdog/ 'dod chags rnam dag gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yas kyi zhal na in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ zhe sdang rnam dgazugs la phyag 'tshal 
30a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod// g.yon gyi zhal ni kun bzla ba'i mdog/ gti mug rnam dag stsal phyag 'tshal bstod// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po pad ma bsnams// mchags 'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// bar pa ma rig 
30a4(rgyud 'grel): gcod mdzad ral gri bsnams// shes rab rnam gsum gsol la phyag 'tshal bstod// za ma rnam rtog gcod mdzad gri gug bsdams// rtog ma ting 'dzin gsol la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyag drag g.yon gyi 
30a5(rgyud 'grel): dang po ban+d+ha bsnams// bdag med don rtogs mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod// bar pa dbul ba gcod mdzad rin chen bsdams// 'gro kun re 'dod skong la phyag 'tshal bstod// tha ma 'khor ba gcod mdzad 'khor/ 
30a6(rgyud 'grel): lo bsnams// 'khor brtsad na sa gcod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mtshan dang dpe byad sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// ka la biD+ga'i gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// shes bya kun mkhyen thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// 
30a7(rgyud 'grel): ma rig pun sel khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / pa nA~M ta su ma ti kAni dang / lo tsa ba mar ngo chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o// 
30a8(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje dgra'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog gshin rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// // rgyag skad du/ las a ri maN+Dal na paM ka ya sAn+ta kod ya shA ma/ bodagang du/ gshin rje dal 
30b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje khrag 'thung la phyag 'tshal lo// rab tu mdzes pa'i sku 'bar thub dbang 'od tshogs can// rang 'od gnyis med 'khril cing dpe bral bde bas gang / 
30b2(rgyud 'grel): rab chags mdzes pas lha dang khro bas 'khrugs lta la// blo mnyam 'jug mdzad gshin rje gshed der mngon phyogs te// rgyud rgyal yon tan mang ldan mkhas pa'i spyod yul ba/ gshin rje dgra yi don la bdag 
30b3(rgyud 'grel): blo blan gyur kyang // zhal gyi pad ma las rnyed de yi rjes 'brangs nas// dbang bskur sgrub bcas lo 'dab rtse tsam bya bar 'dod// de la dang por sngags pa ni// rang lus 'jig na'ang gzhan don 'dod// 
30b4(rgyud 'grel): rnyed dang bkur stil ma chags// rgyud 'dir gsang sogs dbang bskur bas// ri bo'i phyogs sogs 'byor pa yod// ljon shing gis klubs yid du 'ong // skye bo 'dus nas rnam bral zhing // dris 
30b5(rgyud 'grel): byugs me tog legs bkram par// dang por gdong sogs dag byas la// spro bas bde ba'i stan 'du gnas// snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// ya sngon 'od dang ldan pa bsam// de 'od las byung
30b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs tshegs kyis// bla ma rdzogs sangs rgyas bkug nas// rnam thar gyis sgo dag byas te// dag par gyur pas mngon sum blta// gshin rje gshed bor sgrub pa yang // bsod nams med par mi 
30b7(rgyud 'grel): 'grub la// sbyin sogs bsod nams bya ba yang // dbul phyir bdag gis mi nus pas// tshe rabs sngon nas tshangs spyod bzhi// 'bras bu yid bzhin nor bu ltar// 'gro ba kun gyi don byed pa'i// ya 
30b8(rgyud 'grel): nyid rab tu dran par bya// de las bdag nyid mAM sprul te// lan gsum bskor zhing phyag 'tshal bsam// de sprul rig mi'i tshogs rnams kyis// ma lus mchod pas mnyes par bya// lus ngag yid 
31a1(rgyud 'grel): / kyis sdig bgyis dang / bgyid du sbal dang yi rang gang // sbrum sbrum la sogs bzhin// thugs rje can rnams mdun du 'chags// sngon byas ma lus bshags nas ni// byin chad de la mi 'jug 
31a2(rgyud 'grel): cing // byang chub snying por gnas kyi bar// mi dge kun las ldog par bgyid// sangs rgyas de sras 'phags rnams dang // srid pa mthar phyin dam pa'i chos// skyabs kyi dam pa de gsum la// deng nyid gus pas
31a3(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su mchi// rnam rtog rgya mos rab bcings shing // 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa kun// bsgral phyir bde gshegs nyid thob par// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sras bcas 'phags
31a4(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo// kun gyi dge ba kun bsdus la// sel med rab tu yi rang zhing // legs so zhes kyang bsngags par bya// dus gsum bde gshegs sras bcas kun// gshegs shing gshegs dang gshegs 
31a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i// sbyin sogs lam gyi rang bzhin gang // ci yod stobs kyis yang dag bsten// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan rnams la// bdag nyid bdag gis dbul lags kyis// thugs rje mnga' ba khyed rnams kyis// 
31a6(rgyud 'grel): so sor nang 'khor spyod du bzhes// gang zhig mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa// ji srid 'khor ba gnas bar du// de srid mya ngan mi 'da' bar// thugs rje can la gsol ba 'debs// byang chub shing la gzigs rnams la//

31b3(rgyud 'grel): yin phyir lus ngag yid// oM AHhUM yig gsum byas la// 'od 'bar ho gnyis par gnas pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni// nam mkha' la gnas bsam par bya// de las aHchad byung nyi ma//

31b8(rgyud 'grel): aHmthar thugs phreng gnyis// de las zla ba de yis brgyan// ka sogs dpe byad 'od ldan pa// zung gcig las byung gnyis pa ste// dbus su 'dod chags yi ge raM// des bzhu 'od kyis gong bu 
32a1(rgyud 'grel): las// dkar dmar hUM ni rab du bsam// de mdog rdo rje de yis brgyan// badz+ro ta ko haM nga rgyal bskyed// rdo rje 'chang mchog 'od tshogs can// zhal gsum sngo 
32a2(rgyud 'grel): dkar dmar ba la// rdo rje la gre ga yas gnyis na// gzhadu gnyis 'khor la pad ma 'ching // gri gug pan das dang 'od 'khyud// bde bas gang babasam par bya// rnam pa lnga la rang bzhin gang // de ni sengs 
32a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gzugs brnyan no// rnal 'byor ro// 'dod chags chen pos 'dul ba yis// snod du 'jig rten mthong nas su// rang snyeng las byung 'od zer gyis// khyab ste sna tshogs sangs rgyas byas// bkug nas
32a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la zhugs pa yi// bde ba chen po nyid du gyur// mkha' la gnas pa'i yig 'bru lnga// ji ltar skar mda' 'pho ba ltar// khar thim khu bar rab 'phros pas// rig dang bcas pa'i kun bzang zhu//

32b8(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// be con 'dzin pa dkar ba ste// be con ral gri 'khor lo pad// lho yi sgo ru bsam par bya// pad ma d+h+r-i ka gis rub sgo ru// pad ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba// pad ma ral gri rdo rje dang // rin chen

34a1(rgyud 'grel): / byin brlabs bdud rtsi bcu phyed blugs// d+hIHSh+T+rIHwa kr-i'i sngags bzlas la// ku sha'i bam pos dang po'i chu// bzed zhal dang por lan gsum gtor // gnyis pa chu dang me/ 
34a2(rgyud 'grel): tog bcas// bzung ste de yi snod nyid la// lan gsum nye reg sbyin par bya// gsum pa bdud rtsi dang ldan pas// gnyis par mched yon chu yang sbyin// de nas me tog gzung byas la// zhabs
34a3(rgyud 'grel): bsil phyag rgya dang ldan pas// de yi snod la zhabs bsil sprin// rang snying 'od kyis tho ba bskul// mung+ga ra dzaHzhes brjod nas dgug/ de bzhin be con bskul ba yis// daN+Da hUM zhes brjod 
34a4(rgyud 'grel): nas gzhug/ snying pos pad ma bskul nas su// pad ma pa mo zhes brjod nas bcing // de bzhin ral gri 'dzin bskul te// khaD+ga ho zhes brjod mnyes bya// rang snying ye shes 'od zer gyis// 
34a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' khyab sangs rgyas kun bkug nas// khar thim lus kyi bcud gyur te// rdo rje lam byung shes rab kyis// pad ma'i snying por rab 'gros las// lha mo'i tshigs ni mdzes gyur te// ba spu'i bug las 
34a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bros nas// me tog sna tshogs mdzes rnams kyis// sdong bu lag pas legs bzung nas// sgeg dang bcas pas mchod byas ste// rab snyan yid 'phrog glu dang ni// sna tshogs mdzes pa'i gar gyis su/ 
34a7(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po rab tu ster// kye kye gshin rje dgra nag po// bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin// bdag gis khyod mthong rnam par 'jigs// khro bo'i rang bzhin nyid spongs te// bdag po yis ni 
34a8(rgyud 'grel): gar byas pas// mtho ris mi yul sa 'og 'dir// nag po khro bo yid kyis 'jigs// gar byed khyod ni 'jigs pa che// nag por mi thung gshin dgras gnag/ gzugs ni rnam pa sna tshogs 
34b1(rgyud 'grel): sprul// rdo rje dpyangs can mas zhus pa// gar byed khyod ni bde ba che// hrIHSh+T+rIH'i sngags kyis gar byed gyod// gnas gsub kun gyi the tshom spongs// rje btsun gshin rje khro bo khyod// 'gro ba kun gyis gar 
34b2(rgyud 'grel): byed mthong // oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza badz+ra swab+hA ba At+ma ka~M ti/ sku yul thams cad zag ca dang // 'dra bar rab tu blta byas te// rang nyid lhag pa'i sgrar gnas la// yon tan kan ni sgrogs par bsam// gti mug 
34b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// gshin dgra nag po rab tu 'jigs// ston pa sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ mi 'jigs sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal bstod// ser sna rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// gshin dgra nag po shin tu 
34b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs// thugs kyi rdo rje rabasnyung ba// rin rten rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin kyang // gtso ba'adang chags chos 'thung ba// dbyangs kun gyin mchog gi mchog/ gsang gi 
34b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod// thag dag rdo rje'i rang bzhin med// thams cad las kun gshin rje'i dgra// las kyi rdo rje rabasang bya// ral ze'i brag la phyug 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod// 
34b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor ba dag la phyag 'tshal bstod// yaM las byung ba sngon po la// gzhu 'dra'i ba dan mtshan pa ste// yaM gyis byin 
34b7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs rlung dkyil 'khor// g.yo med steng na me nyid ni// dmar po gru gsum re las byung // de steng a las ba dan ni// mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa'o// de nang bdud rtsi rnam lnga ni// gshin rje lnga yi 
34b8(rgyud 'grel): yi ge las// lugs kyu lnga ni de nyid kyi// ming gi thog ma'i yi ge las// bruM dkar las byung rdo rje yis// de la kha ni bkab par bsam// mtho gang spags pa'i bar snang la// zla ba'i steng du oM dkar 
35a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam// kha bkab rdo rje'i lte ba yis// hUM las 'od 'phros ba dan bskul// de yis rlung bskyod des me bskul// rdzas kun zhu zhing khol ba la// rdo rjes 'khrug cing zhu gyur pas// shin tu1// 
35a2(rgyud 'grel): dri med bdag mthong nas// oM las 'od byung ye shes kyi// bdad rtsi bsdus nas der thim pas// gangs chu 'dra bar bsil gyur te// yi ge gsum brjod bsrungs la bzhag/ gshin rje gshed kyi lha rnams kyi// 
35a3(rgyud 'grel): ljags la rdo rje dkar po re// bsams ted las 'od zer ni// sbu gur gyur pa rab 'phros te// bdud rtsir zug la rang rang sngags// brjod pas sbu gus brngubs nas tshim// snying 'od 'phros pas phyogs 
35a4(rgyud 'grel): bcur khyab// dngos kun gshin rje dgrar byas nas// bsdus te baMdag la thim gyur pas// bdag nyid yar zi mthig ler gyur// thig ler 'khor lo rdzogs par bskyed// de yi 'od kyi phreng ba yis// bdag
35a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs lha rnams gsal byas te// snying gar dkyil 'khor phra gnas pas// brtan par gyur nas spro dang bsdu// las dang chos dang chen po dang // gsang gsum dam tshig phyag rgya ste// thugs gsung sku yi 
35a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje la// rang rang sa bon thugs kar bsam// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka ru// hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs gsang sngags bsam// gsang sngags bzlas pas gnas bzhi nas// khro bo'i rgyun 
35a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams spro bsdu ba// rim pa'am lhan cig bya bar 'dod// dbugs dbyung 'phro bar bsam bya ste// dbugs bsdu sngags kyang bsdu bar bya// bgrang phreng dung chen la sogs la// bdud rtsi lnga sogs// 
35a8(rgyud 'grel): mchod byas nas// gshin rje dgra yi skur bsams te// mthe bo lcags kyus drang zhing bzlas// rang snying de bzhin dmigs nyid pas// sems la nyams su chung 'gyur zhing // bzlas pas skyon lag 
35b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyis// bsgrims te rdo rje gsod nas kyang // g.yon pas rdo rje dril gsil zhing // rdo rje glu tshul sna tshogs dang // mchod pa sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod// dkyil 'khor bzhengs la yang 
35b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas so// bdag nyid gtong bar 'dod gur na// 'gro ba'i don la 'gro bsams te// mchod bsted bdud rtsi myang byas la// yig gsum mtha ru muHbzhag pa'i// sngags kyis ye shes gshegs 
35b3(rgyud 'grel): par bskul// ting nge 'dzin gyi lha rnams na// oM AHtrAM muHbdag la bsdu// bdag nyid ye shes sems dpa' la// ye shes sems dpa' phyag rgya ste// de yang yi ge de stong bsam// bzod pa 
35b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol dang gsol ba gdab// sngo dang smon lam gdab par bya// 'di ni rnal 'byor chen po'o// / rang gi lha yi rgyal gyis// yang dag langs la spyod lam kun// gshin rje dgra yi ngo bor 
35b5(rgyud 'grel): byas// zab cing rgya che'i rang bzhin no// kha zas ci za bdud rtsir brlab// kha li ci khung sreg khang du// lha rnams tshim bya sreg rdzas rnams// lag pa'i gzar bus bstab par bya// phyi yi khrus rnams 
35b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa na// 'gro ba rang bzhin dag bsam la// dbang bskur ba yi cho ga bzhin// lha mo'i bum chus bkrus par bsam// byi thun la yang de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'i bar du bya// bza' ba zos 
35b7(rgyud 'grel): nas nyal ba'i tshe// shes rab snying rjer ldan pas nyal// ldan pa'i dus na dpal ldan pa'i// lha mo'i dbyangs kyis bskul bar bsam// 'di ltar 'di las dang po pa'i// rnal 'byor pa yis bya ba yin// / 
35b8(rgyud 'grel): ye shes 'ga' sogs rnal 'byor pas// sbyor ba rnam gsum rim bzhin bya// spyod lam dag gi tshe na yang // lus ngag yid kyi bya ba kun// phyag rgya sngags kyi bdag nyid du// bsams te bya ba 
36a1(rgyud 'grel): kun bya'o// dpa' min gcig cig mthong ba la// bde sdug rnam par grol 'gyur ba// sems nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir// rtog med sems gnag ga la 'gyur// sngon du bsnyen pa bya// / 
36a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i cho ga'o// // bsnyen pas bgegs kyi tshogs bcom la// gzhan gyi don la brtson bya ba'ang // mtshan ma brtan po yang dang yang // mthong zhing gnang ba thob nas bya// yid dga' ba yi sa phyogs ni// 
36a3(rgyud 'grel): shar dang byang gi cha nyid do// dbus mtho shar dang byang gzhol bar// bgegs bskrad phur btab gtor ma sbyin// gsol gdab rnal 'byor gsum byas nas// sangs rgyas la yang gsol ba gdab// 
36a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon zhal bsil phul nas su// sbyin sreg gis kyang rab tshim bya// de nas mkha' la bkod nas su// bgegs med sa ni legs bsgos nas// slar yang sa yis rab tu dgang // sngon du dus
36a5(rgyud 'grel): ring bsnyen byas pa'i// gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ldan pas// dkyil 'khor sa ni rdzogs byas te// oM b+ha khaM zhes sngags kyis ni// mkha' la ri nI bskyed par bya// hUM laM d+hU zhes rdo rje'i bdag 
36a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid dus byas de byin brlab// oM me 'di ni badz+ri b+hA ba badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM// sngon bzhin lha yi ting 'dzin ni// sa yi dbus su rnal 'byor bzhi// rim bzhin byas nas rdzogs pa dang // sangs rgyas kun

36a8(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// / 
36b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos mchog yang dag byung // ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po 
36b2(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med// kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du 
36b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol// de nas gshin rje gshed langs te// ma dang Ta yi yi ge las// g.yas dang g.yon gyi mig gnyis su// nyi ma dang ni zla ba bsam// blo can 'gro ba kun bltas nas// dkyil 'khor sa la 
36b4(rgyud 'grel): stang stabs bskor// rkang zil a las rdo rjer bsgom// g.yas pas rdo rje gsor byed cing // g.yon pas dril bsil 'gying ba gdu// gnas te mche gtsigs b+hu brjod do// lha dang lha min la sogs pa/

36b7(rgyud 'grel): bgegs med bya phyir pur bus gdab// phur ba stod ni khro bo la// smad ni rdo rje rtse gcig pa// phur pa'i gsang sngags bzlas pa lnga// mtshams dang dbus su gdab par bya// 'od zer rnon po rab 'phros 
36b8(rgyud 'grel): pas// phyogs bcur yang dag gnas pa yis// bgegs kyi phung po kun gzhom mo// shin tu bgegs med rab mthong nas// mtshams bcad phyogs bcing sngon bzhin du// blo yis byas nas sa 
37a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs nas// sta gon gnas pa'i rim bzhin bya// baM ser las byung lha mo ni// 'od dang bcas pa bkug nas su// mchod pa phul nas gsol ba gdab// skyob pa sangs 
37a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi// sa dang pha rol byin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang btsugs te// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa// de ltar bdag

37a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhag la lag pas gzung // rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gtso la sogs// sngags bzlas nas ni mchod yon 'bul// me tog dbus dang spos sogs mchod// dri sogs pad ma'i snod legs bzhag/ 
37a7(rgyud 'grel): nyin dang mtshan mo thun gsum du// gtor ma sbyin zhing de bzhin bzla// de dag dkyil 'khor phyi rol la// gnas nas rgyal ba gtso bo yis// de nas g.yon gyi snod la chu// blugs nas de yis gtor 
37a8(rgyud 'grel): ba sa na// bdag dang slob ma thams cad kyis// chu yis dbang bskur gyur pa yin// de nas rang gi lce brlabs la// g.yas pas spos phor bteg nas su// pus mo btsugs nas blo ldan pas// 
37b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gtso dang sangs rgyas zhu// mgon po zhe sdang gshin rje yi// rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal ba stod// bdag gis gshin rje'i dkyil 'khor ni// mgon po bri bar 'dod pa ste/ 
37b2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma rnams la phan phyir dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// de bas bcom ldan gus ldan la// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad par gsol// sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs// 
37b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba 'khor ba'i don byed rnams// 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang // gsang sngags kyi ni lha gzhan dang // 'jig rten skyong pa'i lha rnams dang // 'byung po yang dag rdzogs pa yi//

37b5(rgyud 'grel): bri bar bya// slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni// thugs rjes nye bar gzung nas su// thams cad dkyil 'khor la bcug nas// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol// de ltar stan gsanal na gsum

37b7(rgyud 'grel): theg pa mchog la mngon dga' ba'o// de las bzlog pa'i slob ma ni// dman pas sta gan gnas mi bya// tshe 'dir 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// phyi ma'i chol mi 'byung ngo // skyes bu tshe phyi mar 'dod pas/ 
37b8(rgyud 'grel): 'dir yang 'bras bu rgyas par 'gyur// de ltar slob ma la smras nas// blo ldan rang gi nang du 'gro// yon tan de ldan slob ma yis// sgo nas gsol ba gdab par bya// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// 
38a1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag la stsol// de nyid dam tshig bdag la stsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// 
38a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyid// de ltar lan gsum brjod nus pa'i// slob ma rab

39a1(rgyud 'grel): an+yo nA nA ga ta sarba d+harmAHpa ra swa rA nu pra biny+dza sarba d+har+m+ma d+han+d+ha nu rba biSh+Ta sarba d+harmAHmtha' ma dkar ldan lag pa yi// gzung la sngags 'di bzlas par bya// sa ma ya sudza mA ti kra ma d+hu/ 
39a2(rgyud 'grel): ring thung dkyil 'khor nyes gyur la// sbom phra sgo yi nyi shu che// dri zhim bdud rtsi lnga yis ni// byugs nas bsrungs la snod gtsang gzhag/ de la mchod pa rnams kyis mchod// de nas skud pa sngags byas 
39a3(rgyud 'grel): lha// dzA yig gsum gyis btang bar bya// des kyang dz+dza yig gsum gyis drangs// lte bar khu tshur g.yon gyis gzung // nub tu gnas nas shar bltas te// mkhas pas nam mkhar thig gdab bo// 
39a4(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra sa ma ya su tha mA ti kra ma hUM/ sems can don byed dus dag du// mkha' khyab pa yi de bzhin gshegs// 'dir gshegs pa yi don gyi phyir// thig skud sgra yis bskul bar bsam// lho nas byang du/ 
39a5(rgyud 'grel): kha bltas te// shar gyi thig ni rab tu gdab// de bzhin byang nas lhor bltas te// nub kyi phyogs kyi skud pa brtag/ de nas shar du drangs pa yis// byang phyogs kyi ni ngos gdab po// shar nas bden bral 
39a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bltas te// lho yi thig ni gdab par bya// de nas me yi mtshams gnas te// rlung gi mtshams su gdab par bya// bden bral mtshams nas dbang ldan du// drangs te grwa yi thig gdab po// de nas 
39a7(rgyud 'grel): thig rnams ci rigs par// lhag chad med pa nyid du gdab// de nas dbus su pur btab ste// de la brtod pa'i srad bu ni// dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur dag gis so// rdo rje rabal sogs 
39a8(rgyud 'grel): bskor// 'di yi phyi yi 'khor lo ni// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rab tu mdzes// khakhyer bzhi dang ldan pa la// rdo rje dril bu la sogs brgyan// sgo yi mtshams dang gra bzhir// 
39b1(rgyud 'grel): zla phyed rdo rje mdzes par bya// de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni// sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs pa ste// rdo rje phreng bas rab mdzes pa'i// kun nas yongs su bskor bar bya// hi las nyi ma zla ba dag/ mig tu bsams 
39b2(rgyud 'grel): te khro bo yi// lta bar bcas pas kun bltas nas// sgo rnams dag ni legs bya ba// sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad char bya// sgo khyud chen po spangs pa yin// sgo yi tshad du khyams bya ste// de bzhin lha yi snum 
39b3(rgyud 'grel): bu'o// kha khyer sgo yi byed du ste// 'gram dang gshog pa de yi tshad// dra ba dra phyed nyi zla dang // rnga dang rdung dkrol la sogs rgyan// de phyed tshon sna lnga yis// rdo rje ra ba'ang de'i tshad// rta babs sgo yi sum 
39b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur la// ba dan dril bu la sogs rgyan// rin chen kun dang lcags rnams dang // 'byung khung dag gi phyi ma la// yi ge lnga bkod byin brlabs bya// 'bar bar gyur dang gsang sngags bzlas// 
39b5(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra tsitra sa ma ya hUM// sems can khams rnams grol mdzad cing // de ni chos dbyings ro yin no// de ltar dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i tshe// rlung la sogs pa byung gyur na// khro bo'i sbyor dang ldan pa 
39b6(rgyud 'grel): yis// rlung sogs bcing ba tshul bzhin bya// gshin rje gshed po rgyal kun gtso// dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor gyur pa// skyon kun las ni rnam grol ba// de yi dbus su legs gnas te// dbang 
39b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan mtshams nas mnyam po ru// bla mas g.yon gyi khu tshur gyis// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang gu sngon po de bzhin no// mnyam dang g.yas skor tshad ldan par// dkyil 'khor ri mo bri
39b8(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// mnyam po bri bar ri mo ni// sgo yi nyi shu cha yin te// de bas sboms na nad 'byung la// pras na nor rnams zad par 'gyur// kyag kyog byung na 'thab mo 'byung // chad na slob ma bla ma 'chi// 
40a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas skor du ni ma bris na// rdul mtshon gyi ni dngos grub nyams// rdo rje rtse mo dkar po'i ngos// gzhan ser ba yi mdog yin te// gzhan ni parma rAga'i ngos// de bzhin ma raka ta/ 
40a2(rgyud 'grel): ste// nang du sngon por shes par bya// de ni rdul tshon rim par bshad// shar gyi phyogs su dkar po ste// lho yi phyogs su ser po yin// nub phyogs dmar po bya ba ste// byang phyogs ljang gu dag 
40a3(rgyud 'grel): tu 'dod// dbus ma'i sa yi cha nyid ni// in+d+ra nI la rab tu 'bar/ rtag tu shes rab thabs ldan pas// shin tu mnyam gzhag yang dag bri// zla ba nyi ma'i gdan dag la// rdo rje'i 'od kyis kun 
40a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khrigs pa'i// rdo rje dbus su yang dag bri// 'khor lo 'od 'bar rab 'jigs pa'i// 'khor lo shar gyi rwal bri// rin chen 'od 'bar rab 'khrigs pa'i// rin chen lho yi phyogs su bri// nub tu 
40a5(rgyud 'grel): pad ma'i sprin 'khrigs pa'i// pad+ma dmar po sdong bur bcas// ral gri'i 'od kyis rab 'khrigs pa'i// ral gri byang gi rwal bri// thob 'bar 'od gsal ba ni// shar gyi sgo ru bri bar bya// 
40a6(rgyud 'grel): btsan 'ab 'ad 'khrigs pa y-i/ \u0f7fnam+b+ha yai na ra~M d+ha god// bad+ma 'bar bar nga 'jigs pa'i// 'di dang ldan pa nab bri// rala'i 'bang ba'i sprin ldan pa// brang gi b+hI bA bya// 
40a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshams la sogs grwa bzhi ru// go rims bzhin du 'khor lo dang // rdo rje pad+ma ut+pa la// 'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya// phyi yi me mtshams la sogs par// zla bas gang ba'i snod bzhi bri// de ltar
40a8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rdzogs pa dang // mkha' la bkod pa phab byas la// de nas sngon bzhin shes rab dang // sbyor byas 'khor lo bskyed nas gdon// de la spyan sogs byin brlabs dang // thugs gsung sku yi/ 
40b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang // dbang bskur la sogs bya ba yin// de nas sngon bzhin ye shes kyi// 'khor lo dgug dang bgegs bskrad sogs// byas la sgo bzhi'i khro bo yi// sngags la dzaHsogs mthar ldan
40b2(rgyud 'grel): pas// dgug gzhug bcing dang dbang bya dang // ra ba dra ba la sogs bya// de nas lha mos sngon bzhin mchod// bstid dang bdud rtsi myang ba dang // rdul yab sbrang yab bsil yab dang // khyams dang 
40b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes mos tshal dag dang // gzims mal dang ni gdan khri dang // myur 'gro rta dang glang po dang // yi bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing // rta babs dang ni bla re sogs// bza' btung bro mchog sna tshogs
40b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // glu gar la sogs mtha' yas mchod// de nas ci 'byor gzhan dag la// bzlas pa byas te mnyes par bya// bdud rtsi dang ldan dri chu yis// maN+Dal legs par byas nas su// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-ita/ 
40b5(rgyud 'grel): nan hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad ang ku sha ya dzaHaM dz+dzaHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hwe hUM paT phaT swA hA/ 'byung ba 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kI la ya hUM phaT/ dgug dang 
40b6(rgyud 'grel): phur bus gdab pa ste// de ltar byas pas 'od nyid du// grur las rang rang yi ge ste// de las mtshan ma de las skur// hrIHSh+TIHwi kr-i rnam bzhi ni// dbang po gshin rje chu lus ngan// 'byung po me lha 
40b7(rgyud 'grel): srin po rlung // ta An na las byung ba'o// trAM hUM phaT dang yi ge gsum// nyi ma zla ba tshangs pa'o// paT dang swa ste yi ge gnyis// sa bdag dang ni lha ma yin// hA ni khyab 'jug la sogs so// 
40b8(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zhal gsum nyis 'gyur phyag/ dang po rang rang phyag mtshan la// lhag ma bde bar gshegs dang mthun// zhal mdog rigs kyi gtso bo 'dra// mig sogs brlab dang lus ngag yid// 
41a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba yang 'dra byas nas// gtor ma bdud rtsi bzhin brlabs la// lce yang brlabs te sbubs kyis su// rang sngags brjod pas brngub par bya// oM in+d+ra ya hrIHya ma yaSh+TAHba 
41a2(rgyud 'grel): rurANA ya wi/ ku be rA ya kr-i/ I shA nA ya ta/ ag+na ya yA ni ri t+ya ya na/ bA ya be na/ tsan+d+rA ya hUM arbA ya hUM/ brah+ma NA ya phaT/ ba sud+hA ra ya phaT/ be ma tsi trA ya sA/ sar+b+ba pU te b+ho hA/ ha ha haM ha hUM/ hi hi hi hiM hUM/ 
41a3(rgyud 'grel): de yis phyogs skyong tshim byas nas// 'thor 'thung byas la nang du 'gro/ de nas dkyil 'khor zhal ba sro'i phyir// sbyin sreg gis ni tshim bya ste// sprin sreg las las 'byung ba ltar// zhi dang rgyas pa bya bar
41a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod// de nas slob ma rnams gzhug phyir// dang por bdag nyid 'jug par bya// bdag nyid sku sogs byin brlab cing // snang ba thob par gyur pa yis// slob ma gzhug pa'i don du 
41a5(rgyud 'grel): ni// de nyid rab tu brjod par bya// oM nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpar der grub mdzod// 
41a6(rgyud 'grel): kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod// nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod// 'dod chags 
41a7(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rjes chags pa// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod// shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po
41a8(rgyud 'grel): kun bdag nyid// byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog/ grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa// rdo rje snyems bdag
41b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag mdzod cig/ de nas bden pa'i byin brlabs brjod// sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing // sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs// sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid// 'dod chags 
41b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig mchog gyur pA'i// mgon po bden pa 'di yis ni// bdag la khyed kyis 'dod rdzogs shog/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gamal la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// chu dang las/ 
41b3(rgyud 'grel): las kun tu byung // de nyid de nyid bskyed pa ni// de dag bden pas dkyil 'khor la// gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob mini// sdig med par ni thams cad mthong // thun mong sdom bzung slob ma ni// 
41b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin sku sogs 'od gsal ba// yol bas bar du bcad nas su// kun byed bum pa'i chu yis su// bkrus pa'i dar ras dmar po yis// bu sdug de yis ngo bkab la// khyod su zhes

41b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ra man dang // yongs su dge ni ma li ka/ kar ni ka yi phreng ba ni// legs par mnos te bus zung zhing // oM AHhUM bla ma slob dpon mgon rjes mu// 'bad pa chen pos dbang gi don// ji ltar/ 
41b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas chos chen pos// rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur ltar// de bzhin bdag kyang dbang bskur te// bdag la don mchog stsal du gsol// gtso la yon sogs rab tu dbul// gtong sems/ 
41b8(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bskyed par bya// de yi snying gar rdo rje ni// me tog bcas pa'i snying por gzhag/ oM sarbe yo ga tsit+ta/ ut+pA da yA mi su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho sid+d+hi badz+ra ya thA su khaM/ de ring khyod la de bzhin 
42a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i gsang chen 'di// dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la smra 
42a2(rgyud 'grel): bar mi bya'o// dad pa med pa la yang mi rung ngo // zhes brjod par bya'o// tho sogs sngags kyis drang bya zhing // yi ge gsum gyis gzhug par bya// nang du sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug/ de nas tshig 
42a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di brjod par bya// de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la rab tu chud do// de bas bdag gis khyod kyi rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya'o// ye shes gang gis khyod la de bzhin

42a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas yig gsum 'bar ba yi// bdud rtsi lnga ni 'thung bcug ste// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu

43a1(rgyud 'grel): grub phyir// rdo rje dril bu 'khyud byas nas// bdag po'i dbang yang bskur bar bya// oM badz+ra ad+hi pa ti traM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// spyi bor gdab tshul ming dbang bskur// tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ 
43a2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra satwa tre a b+hi Shiny+tsA maM/ badz+ra nA pa a b+hi She kata/ slob dpon gang dang gang dag gi/ lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gi/ de nas de yi mtshan dag ni// dpal dang kye yis mdzes par bya// rig pa'i dang

43b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs par gyur gyi tshe// de srid mtshungs med sems can non// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// bsod nams byin brlabs kyis bsgrubs la// dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed//

43b4(rgyud 'grel): tshigs bcas glu sgra dang // rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis// skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du// til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i// rgyal bas bum pa bzung nas su// de nyid la ni dbang bskur bas// dkyil

43b8(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du sgo bzhi'o// bsam gtan bzhi ni rta babs te// ting nge 'dzin bzhi kha khyer yin// de rten gzungs kyi rang bzhin no// 'gro kun gdul phyir phyogs sgo na// rlung gis bskyod pa'i dri la sgra sgrogs// 
44a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub yan lag rnam dag phyir// dra ba dra phyed la sogs spras// rnam thar brgyad ldan ka ba ste// rgyan bkod bkra bas mdzes pa ni// bsam pa thams cad yongs bskor 
44a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir// sna tshogs las kyi mthar zug phyir// pho brang sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar// theg chen 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir// rdo rje'i phreng bas yongs su bskor// sems can sems ni dgrol bya'i phyir// 
44a3(rgyud 'grel): tshon rnams ye shes lnga yin no// dam pa'i tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i phyir// byang chub sems gang ka pA la// bdug pa me tog mar me dang // bshos dang byug pa la sogs ni// stan grags byang 
44a4(rgyud 'grel): chub yan lag dang // dga' dang chos zas lus bde yin// ngo tsha khrel yod sdom pa yis// bde bskyed dbyangs dang gar sogs yin// sangs rgyas bzhugs phyir gzhal yas khang // snying po/ 
44a5(rgyud 'grel): len phyir dkyil 'khor ro// lha yi de nyid bstan bya ba// dad dang brtson 'grus dran ting 'dzin// stobs rnams dag bsgor gnas bzhi// byams sogs tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi// tsa ra tsi ka

44b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes shing nu ma rgyas pa zhig/ rang gi bul sbyin par bya// mgo bor lag bzhag gsang ba gtad// de yi gzungs la legs sbyangs mo// de dang bde ba myong bar bya// de nas slob dpon shes rab 
44b2(rgyud 'grel): dang // bcas pas dkyil 'khor lha de nyid// slob dpon las rnams brtan par bya// ji ltar dbang bskur la sogs 'dis// sangs rgyas sogs kun thob pa bzhini// byang chub spyod sogs 
44b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag dang // 'dul sogs dge bas de bzhin min// de ba sa dam tshig pus srungs shig/ rtag tu sdom pa yang bsrung ngo // sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga bza' ste// de las gzhan pa'i dam tshig bsrungs// 
44b4(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gnod pa gsang bya ste// bud med kun kyang spad par bya// pha rol nor yang blangs nas su// rtag tu brdzun gyi tshig kyang sme// rnal 'byor rgyud las gang gsungs pa// de ni cho ga bzhin du/

50a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi nyi dkyil dag la bsam// A ro lika gis 'dod chags gtso// zhal gsum phyag drug pad+ma 'dra// lag na pad+ma thogs pa dbyung // 'dod chags chen po'i don byas te// gtso bo'i rgyab tu bsam par

50a5(rgyud 'grel): d+hi ka gis tho ba drag/ mdog gnag phyag drug tho ba bsnams// drag po chen pos don byas nas// shar gyi sgrol bsam par bya// daN Sha d+h+rika gis be con can// gser mdog lag na be con thogs// khro ba 
50a6(rgyud 'grel): chen pos don byas nas// lho yi nyi dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs// pad+ma d+hika gis pad+mo ste// mdog dmar zhal gsum phyag drug pa// pad+ma thogs pas don byas te// nub kyi sgor ni bsam par bya// kha D+ga
50a7(rgyud 'grel): d+hi ka gis ral gri dpung // zhal gsum phyag drug ljang gu'o// phyag na ral gri thogs pa ste// byang gi sgor ni bsam par bya// dwe Sha ra ti sa tsar tsi dbyung // 'khor lo lag 'dzin dkar mo ste// byams pa chen 
50a8(rgyud 'grel): pos don byas te// me yi zla dkyil bsam par bya// mo ha ra tis phag mo dpung // rdo rje lag 'dzin nag mo ste// snying rjes don byas slar bsdus la// lce nub zla dkyil bsam par bya// rA ga ra tis dbyangs can 
50b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyung // dmar mo lag na pad+ma bsnams// dga' ba chen pos don byas nas// nub byang zla dkyil bsam par bya// badz+ra ra tis mdzod ldan dbyung // ljang gu lag na ral gri 'dzin// btang snyoms chen
50b2(rgyud 'grel): pos don byas nas// byang shar zla dkyil bsam par bya// bdag po'i phyag mtshan 'dra ba la// rang rtags gang yin dang por spyad// zhal mdog rigs kyis shes par bya// yang dag don gyi 'od du zhu// 
50b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi gong bur de nyid gyur// tsa ra tsi ka sogs legs pa'i glas// 'od kyi gong bu sad par byed// kye rje btsun snying rjes khro bo zhengs la// gnas gsum kun gyi gti mug sbyongs// bdud bzhi rnams
50b4(rgyud 'grel): las gtso bo rgyal// kye/ 'khrugs pa'i sems kyis gtso bo bzhings// stong gnas 'jig rten mgron gnyer ci// 'jig rten sku mchog rje btsun bzhengs// kye/ stong par bsams nas ci ste 
50b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// byang chub rang bzhin 'jig rten bzhengs// dngos rnams sgyu mar bsams nas ni// 'od las yi ge hUM du bzhengs// de las gtum po khro bo'i gzugs// 'jigs gsus po che ba yi// 
50b6(rgyud 'grel): gshani rje nag po'i gzugs su gyur// zhal gsum phyag drug gong dang mthun// gyen du skra 'bar 'jigs pa che// dum dang dum bur rnam par brgyan// shin tu khros pa'i skur bsams te// pa spu'i bu ka
50b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams las ni// rang gi khro bo 'phro bar bsam// 'jigs pa'i mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// ha ha 'byin pas za bar byed// bskal pa me 'bar lta bu ste// bdag nyid de ltar bsam par bya// dkyil
50b8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gsal bar bsams nas ni// mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab// rdo rje gsum ni gnasags pa bsgom// so so'i thugs las 'od byung ste// spyan drangs mchod pa yang dag spro// so so'i rig 
51a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ma pa dang // sngags thugs kyi sngags brjod bya// oM T+Ta bAkaSh+TathAs ba sab+hA ba stA r+thakaH/ oM sarba twA thAg thas thAbasad+hagaH/ san tuthA ga / 
51a2(rgyud 'grel): thA ga sAr+tha kaH/ ye shes sems dpa' steng bsams te// de yi snying gar nyi ma bsam// de la sangs rgyas kyi ru ka/ dbang bskur gshin gshed dbul bsam// yang / de las 'od zer 'phros pas 
51a3(rgyud 'grel): bairgal// thob la sogs can pa yis// dgrag dang gzhug dang btsang ba dang // dbang dubyas te mgu par bya'o// grwa banyim chu dang san// dzi ni nang sa'i 'khor bar gnas// de la dpa' bo 'bru ljang 
51a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de steng zla las rdo rje bas ma// oM gyes byin brlabs bdud rtsi bsgom// de nyid gsum ni mngon par bzlas// sku dag pas ni btung bar bya// de nas 'dod pa'i lha mo bsdu// gshin rje 
51a5(rgyud 'grel): gshed de 'jigs cag/ ston pa sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ bdag gis bkra'i thug las// mchod pa spos te bdag nyid mchod// de nas 'khor rnams mchod par bya'o// oM sarbata thA ga ta 
51a6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra sa thA ba at+ma ko te/ chos rnams kun gyis de la bstod// gti mug na rje'i rang bzhin khyod// gshin rjegashed de 'jigs pa po// ston pa sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag/ mgon po 'jigs byed byag 
51a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod// ser snan rje'i rang bzhin khyod// gshin rje'i dgrar grags 'jigs papo// thugs kyi rdo rjer rab sbyang ba// rin chen rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin byed// ma 
51a8(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'dod chags las byung ba// dbyangs kun gyi ni mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// zag dog rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// gshin rje gshed de las kun mdzad// su yi rdo rjer rab snang ba/ 
51b1(rgyud 'grel): ral gri'i phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod// sangs rgyas rnams ni kun bsdus pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni mchog gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor ba dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 
51b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom// rnal 'byor 'di la rtag gnas bya// bsam gtan mi nus bzlas pa ste// bzlas pa bzhi la rab 'bad bya// zla ba drug gis mtshan ma 'byung // de nas sgrub pa chen po brtsam/ 
51b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor tshul sogs gzhung bzhin bya// sa so'i dus la gtad b+ha ste// zhag bzhir bsgrubs na 'dod pa 'thug/ oMd+d+hi Sh+T+r-i l-i ban+dand dzA hUM baT paT+Ta swAH/ ma marnam mde la can rA rdza sa da d+ha/ 
51b4(rgyud 'grel): nirA/ oM ya ma rA dza sa daM ma ya/ ya me da ru NA ya da ya/ yad ya~M naM/ ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She ya tsA ni rA ma ya/ drag po'i gsang sngags man ga bzhin// so so'i las dang spel bar bya// 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma 
51b5(rgyud 'grel): btang // dang po gshin rje'i dgral dbul// de nas so so'i 'khor la sbyin// sngags chen 'di yis dbul bar bru// oM en+d+ra ye d+d+he/ ya ma yeSh+Ti ba ra NA ya wi/ kr-i be rA ya kra/ I shUn+tu yata/ ag+na ye A/ 
51b6(rgyud 'grel): nai reta len/ bA ya ben/ tsan+ta yaSh+Te/ sAr+ya trUM prang+ga N+DA ya phaT/ ba sud+ha~M rA ya phaT/ be ma tsi tra ye swA/ sarba b+h+yaHb+h+yoH/ haSh+Tha/ d+d+he/ d+hAd+b+ha pa~M pheM swAt+ma/ sgrub pa chen po'i dus sunA~M// ske gzugs mdun du 
51b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhag par bya// mchog gi sha la sogs pa dbyul// med me che yang rtag tu btang // mchod pa'i mchog rnams dpral bar bya// mi yangs pa yi sems kyis dbul// 'jigs pa'i sems nam yin no// 
51b8(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas dpa' bos mchod par bya// spyod lam byed na 'di ltar bsgom// dngos po thams cad gshin rjer bsam// yang na rang rang dag par bya// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom// las kyi mthar 
52a1(rgyud 'grel): thug 'jam dpal mchog/ rtsod pa'i dus su byung ba 'di// bstan pa bsrung ba'i dgos pa dang // las kyi bye brag bsgrub pa dang // blo dmar rnams la phan pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor bzhi yi 
52a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bris// blod mar dam tshig la gnas pas// rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya// rgyud kyi dor mchog bsdus pa yi// gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs byas// 'di las ngal ba'i dge ba gang // kun gyi 'jam 
52a3(rgyud 'grel): dpal mchog thob shog/ gshir rngag shed dag pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob po na nyin bor byed pa'i grags pas badzad pa rdzogs so// 'chen gyi lo tsa ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis/ rgya gar gyi dpe bye mo dang 
52a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ kr-iSh+Na ya bA re sA d+ha naM/ bod gad du/ gshin rjeg shed dag pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs// bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pa la phyag 'tshal lo//

52a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i bla ma dang ldan pas dur khrod la sogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi gnas sam// gnas la la ra tsan+dan la sogs pasaM b+hagasal// 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can 
52a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams// bsod nams kyi tshogs dang mi ldan pas 'khor ba las bsgral bar mi nus pas na// dang por bsod nams kyi tshogs bsag par bya ba'i phyir bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste/ rang gi snying gar sna tshogs 
52a8(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du/ ya sngon po 'od zer dang bcas pa bltas la// de'i 'od zer gyis sems can thams cad gshin rje gshed du byas nas yang 'od zer des bla ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa mdun du 
52b1(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs te/ de dag la mngon par phyag byas la sa bon gyi 'od zer las byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs sgeg mo la sogs pa dang / me tog la sogs pa'i zhen pa dang bral bas yang dag par mchod do// 
52b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas sdig pa bshags shing bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o// de ma thag pa'i zhing la tshad med pa bzhi bsgom mo// de nas rten muH 
52b3(rgyud 'grel): yis gshegs so// de nas ye shes kyi tshogs la nan tan bya ste/ sna tshogs stong pa nyid du bsgom zhing / oM shAr+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes brjod la/ de nas stong pa'i bdag nyid las/ aM las

52b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa dkar po'i nang du/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la paM yongs su gyur pa las/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yaM yig las rdo rje sngon po 'od zer bcas 
52b6(rgyud 'grel): pabasams te/ de'i 'od kyis thog ma med pa nas grub pa'i gshin rje gshed gsal bar byas nas/ slar bkug ste/ de dag yongs su gyur pa las gshin rje gshed du bsgom par bya'o// de yang sku mdog
52b7(rgyud 'grel): nag po g.yas dkar zhing // g.yon dmar ba/ rdo rje dang ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang / gri gug dang thod pa bsdams pa'i phyag drug pa/ ma he'i steng na g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ sbrul gyi rgyan 
52b8(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan pa/ mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba'i'aphyang ba/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dbu skra dang smar ser po gyen du langs pa/ zhal mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa yams 
53a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ de nas spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang snying ga rnams su oM AHtrAM zhes bya ba'i yi ge rnams bsam par bya'o// de nas mig la sogs pa skye mched byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ mig tuSh+Ti 
53a2(rgyud 'grel): ngo// rna ba dag tu dzaM ngo // snal khaM ngo // dpral bar ni kaM ngo // lte bar ni saM ngo // de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bskul bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa rdo rje tsa ra tsi ka la sogs pa sa bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga yis

53a7(rgyud 'grel): ma tsi tra ye swA/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yo hA/ ha hA hi hI/ hUM b+h+rUM pheM pheM swA hA/ de nas zas za ba'i tshe na bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga ya si sbyangs la/ de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te/ lce rdo rje'i sbyor ba sa bza'

53b1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon g+ho Sha badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// // bal po'i mkhan po su ma ti tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga na sa dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba ban+de tshogs chag chung bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

53b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang 'khor lor bcas par bshad// byang chub kyi sems gnyis shin tu brtan pa'i sngags pas tho rangs langs te/ lus kyi bya ba ma lus par byas la/ stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ bla ma dang dkon mchog

53b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas yud tsam gyis ma he'i steng du pad+ma dang nyi ma bltas te/ de yi dbus su hU~M ngaM l-i gyi sa bon gyur pa las rdo rje'o// de gyur pa las gshin rje 'joms bar bdag nyid bsam pa ni/ zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa mi
53b7(rgyud 'grel): bzad pa'i khro bo sku mdog mthing zhal g.yas g.yon dkar ba dang dmar ba/ phyag g.yas g.yon na rdo rje dang / ral gri dang gri gug dang 'khor lo dang / pad ma dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon brkyang ba'i

54a1(rgyud 'grel): pad ma dang / gsang ba'i gnas rnams ni tho ba gshen rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi'o// zhes mos par bya'o// de nas ye shes sems dpa' bstim la/ yan lag drag

54a8(rgyud 'grel): tu spyad par bya'o// 'di ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i rim pa mdor bstan pa'o// de ltar bsnyen par gyur pa'i sngags pa 'khrul 'khor bsgrub par 'dod pas/ 'di ltar lta ste/ dang po kho nar 'di la 
54b1(rgyud 'grel): mngon spyod bya bar rigs sam/ ci ste ma yin zhes gzhi gtan la dbab par bya'o// // de nas bya bar rigs pa zhig yin na/ 'di ltar bdag ni dmyal bar song yang bla'i/ 'di dmyal bar mi 'gro/ 
54b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya zhing de'i rgyur 'di myur du gsad pas/ 'di'i sdig pa mang du mi 'phel bar bya'o snyam du yang dag par snying rje bcos ma ma yin pa bskyed pa yang dang yang bya bas byang chub kyi sems gtan la dbab
