54b6(rgyud 'grel): bshos su bya ba dang / me tog nag po'am sngon po dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / khrag chen po dang / rnga dang gling bu dang / dung la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad dang / gshin rje'i gzugs kyi rgyud dang / ling ga'i 
54b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang / snag tsha dang smyu gu dang / dur khrod kyi ras dang / thod pa dang skud pa nag po la sogs pa yo byad thams cad dang ldan par byas te/ 'di ni rdzas btan la dbab pa'o// // de nas 'khor lo bri bar 
54b8(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ gtor ma byin la mchod pa 'jigs su rung ba'i tshogs kyang dbul te/ maN+Dal rab tu 'thas pa lci bas byugs pa byas la/ sngags pa kha lhor bltas te/ bdag khro bor gsal bas rtsa ba'i 
55a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags zlos shing thod le kor gyis 'khor lo bri bar bya ste/ gnas skabs 'dir yang 'khor lo bri ba dang / ling ga bca' ba dang / ga'ur gzhug pa dang / ka'u ba tho ba dang / gshin 
55a2(rgyud 'grel): rjel gtad pa dang / nang gi rnal 'byor dang / 'khor lo bca' ba dang / rjes kyi rnal 'byor dang / slar dbyung ba'i cho ga bya ste/ rnam pa dgus bsgrub par bya'o// de la 'khor lo bri ba ni/ ri mo lnga bskor ba las 
55a3(rgyud 'grel): snam bu bzhi dang / lte ba ste lngar bya'o// lte ba le'u tshe dgu pa'o// snam bu dang po le'u tshe bcu gnyis pa/ gnyis pa bcu drug pa/ gsum pa dang bzhi pa phyal ba'am/ sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// 
55a4(rgyud 'grel): de la lnga dang bcu gnyis la rtsa ba'i sngags dgod// bzhi mtshams la skul tshig/ bcu drug la yang skul tshig/ phyal ba nang ngos la A li/ phyi ngos la kA li/ yang re'u mig dang 'dra bar yi ge sum cu 
55a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa gnyis gnyis te/ A lis nyis 'gyur dang ka li lang nya spang bar bya bas so// yi ge dag ri mo la ma reg par bya'o// 'di gshin rje'i lto bar bri'o// de nas phyi'i 'khor lo la dpe byas te/ nang gi 'khor la 
55a6(rgyud 'grel): roras la dkar rtsi sa byugs la/ dug dang khrag bsres pa'i snag tsha bya rog gi sgo spug gis blangs shing rtsa ba'i sngags zlos pas kha lhor bltas pas bris te/ gcig g.yas su bskor ro// gcig 
55a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du bskor ro// zin pa dang phyi'i 'khor lo nang gi 'khor lo la thim par bsams la dbyi'o// 'di ni 'khor lo bri'o// de nas rjes kyi sa dang / chu 'gram gyi sa dang / dug dang khrag dang dgra'i bshad
55a8(rgyud 'grel): tsi byas pa'i sa dang / spra tshil rnams bsres la ling gsor bzhi par bya/ de'i snying gar las kyi sngags kyi mjug la ming rus mA ra ya dang bcas par gzhug ga/ 'di ni ling ga bca' ba'o// de nas 
55b1(rgyud 'grel): rabs chad kyi thod pa 'am/ chu 'gram gyi sa dang / dug dang khrag dang / dgra'i bshang gci byas pa'i sa dang / spra tshil rnams bsres la ling ga sor bzhi par bya/ ka pur gnyis la gong mal me 'bar ba bri/ 
55b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su phaT che ge mo mA ra ya phaT ces pa bri'o// 'og ma la rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sngags snga ma ltar bri/ ga'u steng ma'i rgyab tu ri rab la dbang chen gyi dbus su rdo rje rgya gram ser po bri/ de nas 
55b3(rgyud 'grel): ga'u gong ma la bu ga smyug ma 'bring po shong ba cig gdod do// de nas 'khor lo g.yon du bskor ba 'og/ g.yas su bskor ba steng / de'i dbus su ling ga bcug la legs par dril nas skud pa nag pos 
55b4(rgyud 'grel): bcings te ga'u kha sbyar du bcug la ga'u skud pa nag pos dkris te/ ga'u'i bu ga nas dug sna tshogs pa'i phye ma dang / khrag bsres pa blugs pas gang bar bya'o// 'di ni gzur gzhug par bya'o// de nas rdo 
55b5(rgyud 'grel): bzur rngom pa zur gsum du 'dug pa'i skyed bu gsum gyi khar ga'u bzhag la/ dug gi me tog 'og nas spor la dros pa tsam du sros shig/ 'di ni ga'u bsro ba'o// de nas chu 'gram gyi sa 'am spra tshil 
55b6(rgyud 'grel): las gshin rje'i rgyal po gzugs khru gang ba/ rab tu sdom pa mi'u zur 'dra ba gsus pa che ba/ mche ba 'chang ba mdog gnag pa/ mche ba bzhi pa/ blo gnyer can/ sgra kham pa 'dzings shing yegs la 
55b7(rgyud 'grel): 'phyar ba/ lag pa g.yas na dbyug pa lcags las byas pa thogs pa/ g.yon na bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba la zhags pa bkal ba zhig byas la/ de'i lto bar ga'u de bcug la snga ste/ 'di ni 
55b8(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje la gtad pa'o// da ni nang gi rnal 'byor bya ste/ gzugs de kha lhor bstan rnal 'byor pa kha lhor bltas te/ rus sbal gyi 'dug stangs su gnas pas/ ling ga de de nyid du bsam/ 'khor lo 
56a1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje'i grong khyer du'o// de la rnam shes bkug cing bstims la/ bcings te ye shes kyi lha dang dpral ba dang / kho'i nyes pa brtse ba dang / rang gi dge ba'i ltangs brtsi ba byas 
56a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ de nas rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas/ khro bo srin po'adra bgrangs med pa thung ba dang / de dag gis sprul cing bskul ba'i bya rgod dang byi dang spang ki dang / ya ma pu ru rnams kyis degs cing pags pa 
56a3(rgyud 'grel): bshub dang / rgyum 'dzin pa dang / lus 'grub pa dang / mig 'brub dang / klad pa 'a thag pa la makris pa k+ta/ NAnas 'byung ba ltar bas pa 'ang / gsang sngags m+b+ha rA ya da du bcas par bzlas pa 
56a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de yang rang gi sems tshod dang rtags dang / bsnyen pa'i tshul las nyi ma gcig nas bdun gyi bar du bsgrims te bya/ khyad par du ni nyi gung mtshan gung la bya ste/ 'di ni nang gi rnal 'byor ro// 
56a5(rgyud 'grel): nas 'a \u0f7fste/ gnas d+hA ra / skye ba la/ drod zla gsam pa zab rings rlob la byur thug pa ci// thus la/ ga rdo gzugs kle/ sgrub lam ga sbyor bas/ ke bzhag 
56a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'byung ba thams cad la de nyid du drag pa'i bra'i byin la las btsal dbang gzugs so// de nas dem thag tub thub bya la ma'i grong khyer na ya ma rnams kyis bzung steg sod par bsams / 
56a7(rgyud 'grel): ya ma rA dzal bskul ba bya ste/ bdag shin tu thos shing ltar gsal bas 'di skad skul lo// 'di nas lho yi phyogs rol na// dpag tshad brgyad khri'i pha rol na// thod pa lpags kyi grong byer// / 
56a8(rgyud 'grel): dgas kun gyi de dpon po// ma mo kun gyi tshogs rje'o// gson gshin kun gyi za ma kha ba// gson po bskol la 'debs pa po// shi ba rnams kyi gshin bu rje// dge ba can gyi stangs 'dzin pa// sdig/ 
56b1(rgyud 'grel): pa can gyi chad pa mkhan// nyes legs chos bzhin gcod pa po// chos rgyal gshin rje zhes bya ba// mngon shes rdzu 'phrul mthu rlabs can// 'khor bcas der 'dir bdag la dgongs// bdag ni 
56b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i thugs kyi sras// gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa// rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir// bsam pa byang chub sems kyis brlan// rgyar/ 
56b3(rgyud 'grel): ni ye shes rdo rje 'chang // gzi byin sku gsung thugs kyis bskyed// don ni 'gro ba yongs kyi don// las ni sangs rgyas kun gyi las// bka' ni dkon mchog gsum gyi bka'// rgyal po 'khor dang 
56b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa la// drag po'i las 'di gtad par 'dod// che ge zhes bya'i gdug pa 'di// gson na 'gro ba yongs la gnod// dkon mchog gsum la rnam par 'tshe// dmigs kyis rnal 'byor yongs la
56b5(rgyud 'grel): sdang // 'di dag myur du bsgral ba'i phyir// rgyal po 'khor bcas spyad 'dren na// dam tshig dbang gis gshegs su gsol// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na ra hUM hUM phaT ya ma rA dza sa pa ri bA ra a kaR+Sha ya dzaH
56b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas rang gi snying ga nas 'od zer lcags kyu 'dra ba byung bas/ ya ma rA dza 'khor dang bcas pa gnas der 'ongs par bas ma/ de'i tshe phyag rgya sbyar ba ni lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te/ 
56b7(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong dang du bcug nas mdzub mo chung zad pakyed de/ gdengs thabs su 'phangs bstod pa ni btsan gyi phyag tu ste de sbyar ro// ya ma rA dzan dzi ltar gzugs su byas pa de 'dra bal ma he zhod pa de rus 
56b8(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang bcas pa/ 'khor ma mo dang ya ma'i skyes bu mang pos bskor ba'o// de nas phyag rgya bstan la/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM phaT ya ma rA dza sa pa ri bA ra sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas/ de dag 
57a1(rgyud 'grel): gis bdag la glags tshol mi nus par bsams te/ phyag rgya rdo rje bsdams pa las srin lag gnyis brkyang nas gshibs te bsgreng ba'o// de nas dong gi ya ma'i gzugs la 
57a2(rgyud 'grel): me tog nag po gtor la/ ya ma rA dza 'khor bcas pa// dam tshig dbang gis 'dir brtan bzhugs// mchod pa tshul bzhin bzhes nas kyang // 'phrin las mdzad phyir ji srid du// las grub bar du 
57a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs su gsol// ya ma rA dza sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod do// de nas lag pa g.yas pas be con gyi mu dra ba cing / g.yon pa sa rak+ta dang chang bsres pas bkang ba'i ban+d+ha thogs la ar+g+ha dbul te/ ya 
57a4(rgyud 'grel): ma rA dza 'khor dang bcas pa la/ ar+g+ha gsol bas dmar gyi ar+g+ha zhag gi me tog rgya mtsho ltar mi zad pa 'byung bar gyur cig/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA nan hUM phaT ya ma rA dza sa pa ri bA ra ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho zhes pas 
57a5(rgyud 'grel): so// phyag rgya de nyid la gnas pas/ g.yon gyi me tog blangs te ya ma rA dza 'khor dang bcas pa la me tog phul bas me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa tog dang / kha ba da du ldan pa ka ba brgyad zug pa/ me tog 
57a6(rgyud 'grel): gi bla re dang gdug dang / phreng bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rang bzhin can 'byung bar gyur cig/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM phaT badz+ra puSh+pa pu dza sa ma ye hUM zhes pas so// phyag rgya de nyid la gnas pas/ g.yon
57a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis bdug pa blangs la/ ya ma rA dza 'khor dang bcas pa la bdug pa sna tshogs phul bas gzhal yas khang gi mgul du bdug pa'i sprin bai DUr+ya'i mdog lta bu rin chen brtsegs pa 'dra ba 'byung bar gyur cig/ 
57a8(rgyud 'grel): oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA nan hUM phaT badz+ra rU pa bu dza sa ma ye hUM zhes pas so// de bzhin du g.yon pa sa mar me blangs la/ ya ma rA dza 'khor dang bcas pa la mar me phul bas/ gzhal yas khang gi phyogs mtshams 
57b1(rgyud 'grel): sam sa sa mas ya sams pa grasas ma da thams cad bag pa gas lam kham sa ma ma sa cad ma ma pa sa pa sa ma'am ya mas pas g.yang rang ya mas pa nga ba pag pa masas tha sa kras ma la ma la gas 
57b2(rgyud 'grel): su mun pa 'joms pa nor bu'i 'od la sogs pa'i snang ba 'byung bar gyur cig/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM phaT badz+ra dI pa pU dza sa ma ye hUM zhes pas so// de bzhin du g.yon pas byug pa blangasA la/ ya ma rA 
57b3(rgyud 'grel): dza 'khor dang bcas pa la byug pa phul bas lu sa dang gnas kyi dri ma thams cad dag ste/ reg na bde ba'i reg bya dang dri ba snam bzod pa dang ldan pas tshim par gyur cig/ oM hrIHhrIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM phaT 
57b4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra gan+d+ha pU dza sa ma ye hUM zhes pas so// de bzhin du g.yon pas bshos bteg la/ ya ma rA dza 'khor dang bcas pa la bshos phul bas kha zas dri dang ro dang kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang / 
57b5(rgyud 'grel): bdud dz+haiM dkar po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang sngon po dang bcas pa/ kham gyi zas la gnas pa rnams tshim par byed pa'i mthu dang ldan pa rnams 'byung bar gyur cig/ oM hrIHd+hIHwi kra tAn na hUM phaT 
57b6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra ne wi N+ye pU dza sa ma ye hUM zhes pas so// de bzhin du g.yon pas ba liM bteg la 'das ma thag pa'i tshig rjes la/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM phaT ma ha ba liM pU dza sa ma ye hUM zhes pa sa ba liM dbul lo// 
57b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas sil snyan sna tshogs bsgrags la nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags brjod do// de nas lag pa g.yas pa de bzhin du gnas pa las g.yon pa'i khu tshur thod pa'i tshul du byas la/ tshigs su bcad
57b8(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di rnams kyis bskul bar bya'o// bcom ldan gshin rje gshed po'i bka'// chos kyi rgyal po dgongs su gsol// de ring drag po'i 'phrin las 'di// khyed dkyilas su 'os pa yin// lha dang 
57b9(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// legs nyes chos bzhin gcod pa khyod// gshin rje gshed kyi bka' 'khor na// bka' nyan dam tshig bsrung ba khyod// las dang rkyen gyis 'chi ba la// srog la dbang byed// 
58a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag po khyod// de phyir las 'di khyod la gtad// khyod kyi 'khor 'di mi bsrun te// tha ma la sems can nyes med cing // gzhan gyis bskul bar ma byas par// glo bur phrad pa 
58a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin byed na// nga yis gtad pa'i las 'di rnams// 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i bka' bzhin du// dam tshig phyag rgya mig la bstan// dam tshig snying po rnam par ba spags// rdo rje tha tshig snying la 
58a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhag/ dam rdzas mchod pa phul nas kyang // dam tshig phrin las gnyer du gtad// las 'di mngon dub grub pa'i rigs// khyod kyis las 'di ma bsrubs na// dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' 
58a4(rgyud 'grel): yang bcag/ gshin rje gshed po'i dam yang dral// rang gi tha tshig rang gis bslus// dam tshig grogs po bdag cag gi/ re ba'i bsam pa gting nas bcad// de bas las 'di grub par gyis// 
58a5(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na// ya ma dU ti zhes bya ba// lag na lcags kyu nag po thogs// gang zhig gzung bar 'dod pa de// byugs pa tsam gyis 'dzin par byed// khyod la gnyer du gtad pa ni/ 
58a6(rgyud 'grel): che ge zhes bya'i yul khams na// che ge mo zhes bya ba'i ming // rus ni che ge mo zhes bya// 'di dag 'khor dang bcas pa kun// khyod kyis de ring gzung bar gyis// gzhan yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na// 
58a7(rgyud 'grel): kA la pA sha zhes bya ba// lag na dus kyi zhags pa thogs// gang zhig 'dzin par 'dod pa de// btab pa tsam gyis 'dzin par byed// lhag ma snga ma bzhin yin no// gzhan yang 'khor gyi dkyil 
58a8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor na// ya ma daMSh+NI zhes bya ba// lag na be con nag po thogs// gang zhig bsad par 'dod pa kun// bya rab tsam gyis 'chi bar byed// lhag ma snga ma bzhin yin no// gzhan yang 'khor 
58b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi dkyil 'khor na// ya ma daMSh+NI zhes bya ba// za byed ma che ba 'bar ba can// gang zhig za bar 'dod pa de// gtsigs pa tsam gyis za bar byed// lhag ma snga ma bzhin yin no// gzhan yang 'khor gyi dkyil 
58b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor na// kA la rA tri la sogs pa'i// gsod pa mo dang nag mo dang // naM gru sha ka li la sogs// bud med tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// la la las kyi me long can// la la nad kyi rgyal ba can// 
58b3(rgyud 'grel): la la mtshon gyi gru bu can// la la bdud kyi bram ba ma can// la la shod rde'u dkar nag can// la la lcags kyi dre'u rta can// la la bong bu ga pa zhon// la la rlung nag tshub ma zhon// la la chu bya nag mo 
58b4(rgyud 'grel): zhon// la la nam gyi gur la rgyu// la la chu bo'i gzhung la rgyu// la la nyi ma'i zer la rgyu// kun kyang gzhan srog 'phrog pa ste// khyed la gnyer du gtad pa ni// lhag ma snga ma bzhin yin no// gzhan 
58b5(rgyud 'grel): yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na// ya ba ti dang b+ha sangs dang // rmig pa ral pa dgu la sogs// la la rgyal po'i tshul du gnas// la la blon po'i tshul du gnas// kha cig dag ni sde dpon tshul// 
58b6(rgyud 'grel): lagan be son 'tsha mo dang // gsal shing la sogs mtshan zugs// sa so'i bri dpon ma ngag pa dang // ze 'i phyag banan bcas pal// 'phrin las myur drug ta pa naM// che nas rgya 
58b7(rgyud 'grel): yul khams na// che ge mo zhes bya ba'i ming // rus ni che ge mo zhes bya// 'di dag 'khor dang bcas pa kun// khyod kyis deng 'dir gzung bar gyis// zhes bskul zhing dmar gyi ar+g+ha lan 
58b8(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsum spe bzhing // gong gi ar+g+ha'i sngags brjod do// de nas mna' chu blud par bya ste// dri chab kyi nang du bdud rtsi lnga blugs la nang du rdo rje bcug la// oM badz+ra u da ka hUM tha zhes ci ran// 
59a1(rgyud 'grel): cig bzlas nas// de nas ya ma'i gzugs kyi khar rdo rje bzhag ste// steng nas dri chab thugs la// ya ma rA dza 'khor bcas kyi// snying khar ye shes kyi rdo rje 'od 'bar ba re rer/ 
59a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur par bsams te// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dis 'grub// gal te dam tshig 'das gyur na// 
59a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal rdo rje khros nas kyang // snying ga nas ni gsheg par 'gyur// oM badz+re da ka hUM ThaHsngon gyi tha tshig dran bya'i phyir// rdo rje'i tha tshig 'di bsnan pas// mi phyed rdo rje'i dam tshig ni// khyod kyi 
59a4(rgyud 'grel): snying la gnas par 'gyur// oM badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha zhes brjod de// rdo rje ya ma'i snying gar gtug go/ de nas gzugs de sad rab tu dam par sbas la// sus kyang sbas par mi shes pa de ltar nan tan byas 
59a5(rgyud 'grel): la// de'i steng du khro bo tshang ngam gyi stang stabs byas la// rang gi gnas su 'gro ste// 'di ni 'khor lo sba ba'i tshul lo// gang zhig ting 'dzin thob pa'am// bzlas pa'i mthu khyad par can yod pa des ni// ga'u 
59a6(rgyud 'grel): bsro ba dang / gshin rje la gtad pa dang / 'khor lo sba ba dag la 'bad pa de snyed mi bya ste/ 'khor lo bris pa la nang gi rnal 'byor dang bzlas pa byas la/ thod par bcug pa de nyid sbas pas tshig gi las 
59a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi gshin rjel ched cher gtad pa de dag bya mi dgos so// de nas rjes kyi rnal 'byor ni// 'khor lo sbas pa'i rting la rang gnas su gsang sngags rjes su bskul zhing ma mo dang ging dang / ya ma'i skyes 
59a8(rgyud 'grel): bu rnams la yang gtor ma bzang po byin la drag tu bskul/ rang gis bsten cing gnyen pa'i 'jig rten pa yod na de'i las kyi sbyor ba yang bya zhing / de yang drag tu bskul te gtang bsrungs pa 'dran par
59b1(rgyud 'grel): dere lha dang dpral ba yang bya ste/ 'di ni rjes kyi rnal 'byor ro// slar dbyung ba'i cho ga ni las grub na 'khor lo slar phyung la/ ya mAn ta ka la mchod pa byas la/ ya ma rA dza la yang mchod pa snga ma ltar phul la/ 'khor lo 'o mas bkru zhing sangs 
59b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas spyan gyi sngags bzlas te/ lha rnams la bzod par gsol nas/ rdzas rnams chu klung du bkrus la de nyid du dor bar bya'o// 'di ni 'khor lo'i don rnam par bshad pa las/ drag po'i 'khor lo bstan
59b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ zhi ba la sogs pa ni rtogs sla bas bdag gis ma bshad do// las kyi sngags la dmigs shing / rtsa ba'i sngags ma bsnyen pas ni 'khrul 'khor mi bya ste/ sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa dang 
59b4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma dag gis las rnam pa bcu la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o// ma mo'i gnas la sogs par mar ngo'i nyin phyed na song la/ thab khung gru gsum zabs su sor bcu pa rgyar sor nyi shu pa/ dbus 
59b5(rgyud 'grel): na pad+ma 'a dab brgyad la rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon pos mtshan pa/ mu ran nang la yang mtshon cha/ phyi ma la yang sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha can du drag po'i lha dang / me lha'i zhal du drag po'i sreg rdzas rnams dbul 
59b6(rgyud 'grel): lo// sngags kyang drag po mA ra ya phaT ces pa dang ldan pas so// de yang dang por drag po'i thab khung byas la/ drag po'i bud shing bcer/ ku sha dgram/ mchod rdzas dang / sreg rdzas bkram la rang
59b7(rgyud 'grel): ya mAn ta kar bskyed do// de nas thab khung du drag po'i me sbar la/ me sbar ma thag tu hU~M zhes brjod la tsha ba'i mar khu dgang gzar bdun nam gsum dbul bas me cher sbar ro// de ma thag tu thab kyi 
59b8(rgyud 'grel): dbus su yi ge ruM nag po gyur pa las me lha mthing nag drang srong ral pa can phreng ba dang / spyi blugs dang / dbyug gu gsum dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i lag pa can rlung gi me bsam mo// 
60a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas oM e h+ye hi ma hA b+hU ta/ de ba r-i Shi d+hi dza satwa ma kri hI tA hu tra hA rA smin san+ni hi to b+ha ba zhes lan gsum brjod pas thab 'gram gyi mkha' la byon par bsam/ de la ar+g+ha dang mchod pa 
60a2(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ oM badz+nyA na la ma ha b+hU ta dz+wa la ya/ sarba duSh+paM b+ha sma na ku ru hUM phaT dr-i sh+ya dzaHhUM be hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM a haM zhes brjod pas thab tu bskyed pa la bstim// de nas me lha khros shing kha gdangs pa la dgang blugs la 
60a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa sngags kyi mthar tshig mo mA ra ya phaT dang ldan pas rdzas su ma Na tsam phul la/ me lha'i snying gar lha mchog bskyed de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la bstims la mchod bstod byas nas khros 
60a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhal du rdzas phal cher bsreg go/ de nas 'phrin las zhus la/ yi ge brgya pa brjod la/ de oM AHhUM muHzhes par slar gshegs nas/ dam tshig sems dpa' bdag la bsdu/ rdzas lhag ma me lha la 
60a5(rgyud 'grel): dbul te/ las bcol te/ bzod par gsol la slar yi ge gsum mu'i mtha' can gyis gshegs su gsol la/ thag gam chu nag pos me gsad do// sreg rdzas tha dad pa'i sngags dang hom gzar la 
60a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa ni 'dir ma bshad de/ gzhung gzhan las gsal bas der blta'o// zhi ba la sogs pa'i yang ci rigs su sbyar ro// 'di ni las kyi sngags kyi bya ba mdor bstan pa'o// da ni snying po'i sngags la 
60a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i bya ba bshad de/ sngon bzhin du lha'i sku bskyed ma thag tu/ oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+ha At+ma ko he zhes pas chu zla ltar bsams la/ ye shes sems dpa' bstims pa nas dbang bskur ba'i bar du byas 
60a8(rgyud 'grel): la 'gro ba drug tu 'od zer drug spros pas rang rang lhag par shas che ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal bsal bar yang dang yang du byas la/ skyon gsang sngags bzlas te/ ldang ba na dge ba byang chub 
60b1(rgyud 'grel): chen por dngos la yan lag drug gi bsrung ba byas la ldang ngo // gtor ma dang yi ge brgya pa sngon bzhin no// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i rims dang rtag tu ldan par bya'o// nus pa lta na de kho na yid la byed 
60b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdzogs rims la yang gnas par bya'o// da ni rnam pa gsum char dang 'brel pa'i 'chi ba'i dus su yid la bya ba'i man ngag bstan par bya ste/ des dam tshig dang 'gal ba ci byas pa rnams legs par yid 
60b3(rgyud 'grel): la byas la rab tu 'gyod cing phyis mi bya ba'i bsam pas/ 'gro ba yul du gyur pa rnams dang 'dod pa'i lha dang / chos skyong ba rnams la bshags par bya'o// des dge ba ci byas pa rnams 'gro ba'i don du
60b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu bsngos la shi ma thag tu sangs rgyas dngos su bzhugs pa'i zhing du rdzus te 'byung zhing / rigs dang gzugs dang grogs dang / 'khor dang / longs spyod dang / dad pa dang / shes rab dang / 
60b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyen po dang / dran pa la sogs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ 'jug pa bde ba lam bde bas tshogs rnam pa gnyis bde blag tu bsags te/ myur du byang chub par gyur cig ces bsngo bar bya'o// de nas
60b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar gang rje'i sku mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang sku ched du 'jig cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba rnams kyang ched du lus la yid byung bas spong na/ bdag
60b7(rgyud 'grel): gis lus rnag can mthong ba'i chos la dngos grub kyi snod du ma gyur cing // bsrung ba byas pa sha zang ba 'di la ci zhig chags su yod ces lus dang srog la chags pa spang bar bya'o// de nas yang don dam 
60b8(rgyud 'grel): pa byang chub kyi sems la dmigs nas skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'chi ba nam mkha' lta bug pa dang kun tu sgo ba las grol bzo'i thang dor dang 'jigs pa rnam par spangs shing / 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten sdig 
61a1(rgyud 'grel): rba tsam du shes par bya'o// de nas bdag gi lus dang gnas dang / longs spyod sgyum la bu rnams/ bsam pa zag pa nas sems can thams cad la byin cing / de'i 'og tu rang gi lus 'dod pa'i lha'i 
61a2(rgyud 'grel): skur rnam par bsams te phyogs bcu thams cad rnam par dag pa'i zhing / lha'i rgyal po dang bsnyen bskur gyi gnas ltar yid du 'ong bar bsams la lhag pa'i lha la yang dang yang du yid gtad de/ tshor ba thams cad 
61a3(rgyud 'grel): zil gyis mnan par bya'o// de yi snang ba'i yul du 'ong ba 'am/ mi 'ong ba'i mtshan ma ci byung yang dga' ba dang 'jigs pa mi skyed cing dri za'i grong khyer ltar bsam mo// 'di ni 'chi ba'i dus su yid la bya ba'i man 
61a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag go/ gang zhig bla ma la gus snying rjes rgyud 'jam pas chos kun stong par shes shing yul la 'dod pa spang / gnyen po'i mthu ldan blo gros dri ma rnams dang bral/ 'gro ba skyobs byed gdugs dkar lta bu de 
61a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang / bdag gi yang dag rtogs pas smras pa'i gtan tshul 'di/ myur du bar chad med par nyams len byed bcas phrad gyur cig/ ji srid sa la 'gro ba'i longs spyod rnam 'phel ma 'gags pa/ de srid 
61a6(rgyud 'grel): gtam 'di nyams pa med par 'gro don gnas par shog/ gtam tshul 'di na gsal smras pas/ 'gro ba 'jam dbyangs 'drar gyur cig/ bdag dang chos kun sgyu 'dra bar/ mur rig 'jam dpal nyid gyur 
61a7(rgyud 'grel): cig/ dpal gshin rje'i gshed dgra nag po'i grub pa'i thabs 'khor lo'i don rgyas par bshad pa dang bcas pa slob dpon mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so// 
61a8(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po AtsA r+ya be nA ya tsan+da dang / zed kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bskur cing gtan la phab pa'o// da na pa mas pa zung sa man pa / 
61b1(rgyud 'grel): nA gar skad du/ kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gshin rje'i gshed nag po sgrub pa'i zabs/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed la phyag
61b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// snying rjes sems can phan pa mdzad cing dpag bsam shing dang 'dra ba yi// dpal ldan gshin rje'i gshed kyi mdangs 'bar char ljin gzhon 'dra yid 'ong ba/ rtog pa'i rlabs bral 
61b3(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes pa'i 'o ma las 'phros de la phyag 'tshal nas// 'di yi dkyil 'khor ba sgrub bya dang bcas dpal ldan bla ma'i bka' yis bshad par bya// dang por sngags pas phyi nang gi rnam par g.yo ba ma lus pa yongs
61b4(rgyud 'grel): su btang la// blo dang ldan zhing snying rje dang ldan pas rang gi snying gar thugs kyi sa bon gyi sngags 'od zer gyi rigs kun du 'khrigs pa ltas la/ 'od 'phros pa de las phyogs skyong ba brgyad/ shing brgyad kyis brgyan cing
61b5(rgyud 'grel): drag po'i dur khrod do// de'i dkyil du 'jigs pa dang bral bas stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug la/ sems can la phan pa'i phyir bsam gtan la spyad par bya ste/ sa bon de las rang gi ba spu'i bu ga las phyir byung ba'i kha 
61b6(rgyud 'grel): dog lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od kyis bdag nyid rnam par sbyang bar bya'o// de nyid kyis 'gro ba rigs drug na 'khor ba'i sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la bltas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ngo bo nyid du 'gro ba 
61b7(rgyud 'grel): blta'o// de nas 'od zer des spyan drangs pa'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / dpal gshin rje gshed la sogs pa mdun du zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs par bltas la/ phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod
61b8(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa chen po mchod par bgyi'o// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis phyag bgyi'o// 
62a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags so// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa dang so so'i skye bo
62a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su ye rang ngo // sangs rgyas thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul bar bgyi'o// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bkal ba mang por 
62a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs par gsol ba gdab po// mchod pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa bdun nam/ gzhan yang ngag ji skad gsungs pa'i dge ba ma lus pa de dag thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo'o// de'i rjes la gsum la skyabs 
62a4(rgyud 'grel): su 'gro ba ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la stabs su mchi'o zhes 'di ltar bya'o// de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas thams cad du sems can gyi don 
62a5(rgyud 'grel): yangs pa bgyi'o zhes so// de nas bdag gi lus dpral te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag nyid kyi las dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas la ma gzang bar byaste/ ji ltar yang blan med pa'i lam

62a7(rgyud 'grel): sems tsam gyi rang bzhin pas dngos po ngo bo nyid kyis dag par blta ste/ i sa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarbad+harmAHswab+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swab+hA ba at+ma ko taM/ zhes sngags 'dis stong pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs 
62a8(rgyud 'grel): te/ 'di ni bsrung ba'i mchog go// 'di las lhag pa'i bsrung ba'i don ni/ yi ger yongs su gyur pa'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge hrI las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje las spros pa'i rdo rje ra ba dang / rdo rje gur dang / rdo rje 
62b1(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod dang bcas par rdo rje'i sa gzhi bsgom mo// yang dur khrod rnams 'di ltar 'byung ste// rdo rje'i phyogs su shing sha ste// gnod sbyin lag g.yas spyi blugs dang // g.yon na thod pa thogs pa yi// tsaN+Da zhes
62b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mdog seng gnas// gnod sbyin dpal 'dzin dmar po ste// g.yas pa na ni phreng ba dang // g.yon na thod pa'i snod thogs te// men ka re dza shing la'o// gau shin rje'i gshed ni tsUt+tA la// rnams 'jigs zhes bya'i 
62b3(rgyud 'grel): mdog nag po// g.yas pan ni dbyug pa dang // g.yon pa chu skyes snod yin no// bden bral g.yas na gri gug dang // g.yon na chu skyes snod thogs pa'i// ser po gor an+ta kare// 'khri shing la ma'i shing la'o// 
62b4(rgyud 'grel): rgun mya na med shing la// 'od kyi grong can mag yos rum// dkar ba g.yas na klu zhags dang // g.yonan chu skyes snad thogs pa'o// krung na ki la kir ba// sran po g.yas nigs sngon thogs// g.yon pa na ni chu 
62b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes snod// ardzun yi shing la gnas// ku ber na g+ha ba dang // lag pa g.yas na rdo rje dang // g.yon pa na ni pad+ma'i snod// a shwaN+Da la mnon nas gnas// gnod sbyin gad mo cher grags pa// dkar po g.yas na ru 
62b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa// g.yon pa na ni pad+ma'i snod// dbang ldan shing chen po la gnas// thams cad shing las lus byed bton// drag cing 'bar la skra dang ni// slar smin ma lkog spu dang // rdzi ma'ang ser po khros pa'i zhal//

63a8(rgyud 'grel): bzang po brgyad cus brgyan par rnam par bsams te/ de dag thams cad ro mnyam par byas la/ de gnyis ka'i yang nang du 'dus pa'i hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje sngon po la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gdan la yi ge rnam par

63b4(rgyud 'grel): gsung dang thugs dang ye shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas sa bon gyi lha mo'i mgo dang / mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang ba rnams dang / oM A hUM swAhA zhes bya ba'i yi ge rnams rim

63b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gnyi ga'i mthar rnam par bkod la dga' ba brtsam par bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM zhes bya bas so// de nas 'dod chags chen po nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang

64a1(rgyud 'grel): rgud par bsgoms la/ de yang khu ba'i gzugs su blta bar bya'o// de nas ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba'i phyir/ lha mo bzhis zugs la bstod pa/ snying rjes zos pa'i dad sgrol bzhengs/ khams

64a5(rgyud 'grel): gis bon dang phyag mtshan gyi nang du 'dus pa'i nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / lha mo ma lus pa byon nas/ byang chub kyi sems khu ba'i rnam pa der bzhugs te/ de rnams zhugs nas chos kyi dbyings 
64a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngo bo nyid du bsam par bya ste/ oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba at+ma ko hrI zhes bya'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang ldan pa ste rnal 'byor ro// de'i rjes la rdo rje tsar tsi ka la sogs pa lha mo bzhi po tshangs 
64a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas bzhi'i ngo bos bskul ba'i dbang du byas nas/ de'i khu ba las byung ba'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge hUM yongs su gyur pa in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa'i rigs kyi yi ges byin gyis rlob cing 
64a8(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba/ yi ge yaM las yang dag par byung ba/ in+d+ra nI la lta bu'i 'od can/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ rtsa ba dang / g.yas pa der gzhan la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sngon po dang dkar po dmar ba'i zhal can/ 'bar 
64b1(rgyud 'grel): ba 'phro ba'i rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / gri gug dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma dmar po dang / thod pa 'dzin pa ste/ g.yas pa dang de las gzhan pa la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin no// 'jigs byed kyang 'jigs par byed pa/ thod pa drug 
64b2(rgyud 'grel): gis bskor bas mgo brgyan pa/ phyogs bcur lta ba'i dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa/ dga' bo dang nyer dgas gyen du 'bar ba'i sgru bcings pa/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs shing lce 'dril ba slar dang smin ma ser po 
64b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes brgyan pa/ stag gi pags pa 'dzin pa/ mi thung ltar gsus pa che bor 'dzin pa ba su kis se ral nye bar brgyan pa/ stod du se ng+ge'i pags pa bsnams pa/ lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga thams cad gyen du g.yas su 'khyil

64b5(rgyud 'grel): btung ba'i zhabs kyis mnan pa'i bdag nyid gshin rje gshed du bsgom par bya'o// de'i snying gar nyi ma 'i gnas pa'i yaM las byung ba'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i lteb la nyi ma dang / de la sa bon yaM bsgom zhing phyag mtshan dang / 
64b6(rgyud 'grel): mthon yongs su gyur pa las ye shes sems dpa' gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i nyim la gnas pa'i rang gis bon gyis brlabs pa snying gang bsgom par bya'o// rang gis 
64b7(rgyud 'grel): las kyang 'od zer spros la 'o des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin ye shes sems dpa' bkug la// mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la/ rang gi ye 
64b8(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' bcug la der byin gyis brlab pa yang byaste/ ad+har+m+mad+hA tus b+hA ba At+ma ko ha zhes pa'o// de nas snying ga'i 'og tu zla ba la gnas pa'i rdulas byung ba'i rdo rje'i lte bar zla ba de las sa bon rnam par 
65a1(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ rang gi phyag mtshan dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las zhes sdang gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba zla ba la gnas pa phyag mtshan sa bon gyis brlabs pa/ snying po thugs rdo rje rnam par bsam 
65a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyi thugs rdo rje'i sangs rgyas thams cad bkug la mdun du zla ba la bzhugs te/ yang dag par mchod nas rang gi thugs rdo rje la bcug la byin gyis brlab bar bya ste// oM sarba ta thA ga ta 
65a3(rgyud 'grel): tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes so// de bzhin du sku rdo rje ni gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba'o// gsung rdo rje ni 'dod chags gshin rje gshed dang 'dra bar rnam par bsgoms la/ sku rdo rje dang gsung rdo rje'i 
65a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad bkug la yang dag par mchod te/ nang du bzhugs pa la byas la/ de'i byin gyis brlab pa yang bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tsa oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA gra dzA swab+hA ba At+ma 
65a5(rgyud 'grel): haM zhes so// de'i rjes la mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa blta bar bya ste/ mig la sa'i snying po k+Shi gi sa bon las/ rna ba la dzaM las phyag na rdo rje sna la khaM las nam mkha'i snying po// zhal du gaM las 'jig rten dbang 
65a6(rgyud 'grel): phyug/ mgo la k+ki las sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ snying ga'i 'og tu sa~M las kun tu bzang po ste/ skye mched 'di rnams la/ de rnams kyi pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa/ zla ba'i steng du phyag mtshan dang sa bon yongs//

70a1(rgyud 'grel): bris pa 'di// gzhung lugs sna tshogs dag dang mngon 'gal bas// yang dag gzhan gyi don du 'di ma byas// mthong bzhig tsam 'ba' zhig bstan pa yin// sras bgo bar bya phyir byas las 
70a2(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams gang zhig bsgrubs pa ni// zla ba'i 'od 'dra de yis 'gro ba mtha' dag gshin rje gshed nag por shog/ dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa las/ mkhas pa rnams kyis gsol ba 
70a3(rgyud 'grel): btab pas/ dge slong bsod snyoms pa ka ma la rak+Shi ta zhes bya bas bsdus pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bskur cing zhus 
70a4(rgyud 'grel): te gtan la phab pa'o// @ // / rgya gar skad du/ maN+Dal bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ maN+Dal gyi chog/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// maH 
70a5(rgyud 'grel): par bzhag pas rtag tu yang // bla ma'i maN+Dal byas nas ni// yi dam lha yi maN+Dal dang // klog pa'i maN+Dal mchod sogs bya// da ni bla ma'i maN+Da la bya// de la dbus su ni oM haM su ma hA me ra be na maH/ shar du ni/ 
70a6(rgyud 'grel): oM ye pUrba bi de t+tA ya na maHlhor ni/ au raM dza budwI pa ya na maHnub tA ni/ oM la ya pa go d+hA nI ye nA ma byang du ni/ oM ba mut+tA ra ku ra be na maHme'i mtshumes su ni/ oM yo u 
70a7(rgyud 'grel): dwI pA ya na maHbden bral du ni/ oM rau u ba dI pA ya nA maHrlung gi phyogs su ni/ oM lau I pa d+hI pA ya na maHdbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni/ oM bo u pa dwI pA ya na maHyang 
70a8(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi shar du ni/ oM ya ga dza rat+na ya na maHlhor ni/ o ra pu ru Sha rat+nA ya na maHrub du naM/ oM lA shwa rat+nA ya na maHbyang du ni/ oM bsti rad+d+hA ya na maHme'i mtshams su 
70b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ oM yA kha D+ga rat+nA ya na maHbden bral gyi phyogs su ni/ oM rA tsakra rad+hA ya na maHrlung gi phyogs su ni/ oM la ma hA ma Ni ratrA ya na ma dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni/ oM bA pathA ni d+hi b+h+yo radz+nyA ya na maH'di dag 
70b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni gzugs ji lta bar blta ste/ mchod nas bla ma mdun du blta sa la/ 'di mtha' dag bla mal phul nas/ me tog gi snyim pa sngon du 'grobs phyag bya ste/ oM AHyang dag pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba 
70b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo// b+h+rUM/ gang gi sku drin 'od kyis gsal byas bdag nyid kyi/ de nyid rin chen tshogs kyi 'od kyis mun bcom ste/ mthong ba skyon med bdag 
70b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam rol ba balhag blta ba/ bla ma nyi ma de la gus pas phyag 'di 'tshal// zhes bstod pa bya'o// bla ma'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga'o// dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud chen po las kyang gsungs pa/ rang gi yid dam 
70b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi lha'i steng du klog khri'u la sogs pa 'jog pa ni bkag pa'i yang bI ran/ de nyid las gsungs pa'i maN+Dal gyi dkyil 'khor brjod do// shar du shar gyi lus 'phags te/ lho'i phyogs su 'adz+nyA'i gling 
70b6(rgyud 'grel): nub tu ba lang spyod yin te// byang du byang gi sgra me skar// dbus su ri rab mtshams rnams su// de gling sngar 'i sngags kyis mchod// de yi steng du gnas pa yi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa sogs/ 
70b7(rgyud 'grel): chos la gus pas bklag par bya// de la mchod sogs byas nas ni// 'di kun yang dag nyid du spyad// ces bya ba ni klog pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// oM badz+ra maN+Dal mu/ zhes bya ba ni maN+Dal gnyis 
70b8(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol ba'o// yid ma lha'i maN+Dal na so so'i sgrub thabs kyi gzhung las shes par bya'o// slob dpon chen po dpal rnyog med rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// 
71a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po a du la d+ha sa dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// // 6// maN+Dal gyi tshig bzhugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 
71a2(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ mgon po 'jam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// maN+Dal bsdu na rnam gnyis te/ yid kyis bsams dang dngos byed do// dngos la rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// slob dpon 
71a3(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa'i lha nyid dang // mchod pa dang ni mdzes pa'o// rdo rje slob dpon maN+Dal ni// cung zad bdag gis bshad par bya// sa gzhi cha mnyam yid 'ong la// ba yi rnam lngas byug bya ste// gur 
71a4(rgyud 'grel): kum la sogs dri yi chus// dus gsum dag du byug par bya// oM badz+ra re khe hUM/ rin chen mdzes pa'i 'bru nyid dam// me tog srog chags bral ba yis// rnam pa bco brgyad dgram bya ste// 
71a5(rgyud 'grel): dang po 'og gi ri rab dang // rang gi phyogs nas brtsam bya ste// lus 'phags la sogs gling bzhi dang // dag pa g.yon gyi gling phran bzhi// bkram pa'i tshul gyis gsal bar bya// nang 
71a6(rgyud 'grel): du de bzhin rin chen brgyad// gling brgyad bkang la dbul bar bya// de nas steng gi ri rab ni// gzhal yus gdan dang bcas bsnams te// bla ma sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas// gus 
71a7(rgyud 'grel): pas maN+Da la dbul bur bya// oM AHhUM me r+yA be na maHoM ya purba bi de hA ye na maHoM ra dzaM bu dwI pA ya na maHoM wot+ta ra ku ra be na maHoM lA pa ra go dA nI ya nA maHoM yo pa dwI pA ya nA maH/ oM ro pa 
71a8(rgyud 'grel): dI pA ya na maH/ oM wo ba dwI pa ya na maH/ oM lo pad+d+hi pA ya na maH/ oM yag dza rat+na ya na maH/ au ra pu ru Sha rat+nA ya na maH/ oM lA shwa rat+na ya na maH/ au wa s+thi rat+nA ya na maH/ oM ya kha TA raN+Da/ 
71b1(rgyud 'grel): ya na maH/ oM ra ma Ni rat+nA ya na maH/ oM wa sarba rat+na ni d+hi b+h+yo na maHoM la tsakra rat+na d+ha ni b+h+yon maH/ oM AHhU~M d+ha ra be na maH/ bkod pa shin du mdzes pa maN+Dal mchog/ ba ra ni rol mtsho phyi rol lugs ris

71b3(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis dus gsum dag du ni// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin la dbul bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi gdung 'dzin rnal 'byor pas// mnyes byed maN+Dal bzang po 'di phul bas// mthong dang ma mthong nyes pa kun spangs
71b4(rgyud 'grel): te// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bde mchog rgyud du bshad// de phyir 'bad pas maN+Dal dbul bar bya// bdag gi maN+Dal brtsams pa yis// dge ba gang thob de dag

71b6(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal gyi chog mdzad pa'o// / la ts+tsha ba shrI prad+d+hA d+hA na kId+his bsgyur ba'o// / ga shi dgas pa'i phrub pa'i thangs padrug khya ba brnags pa/ #// rgya gang sa du/ kr-iH ya mA d+hi s+thAnan dran 
71b7(rgyud 'grel): pul+la ku mu ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs ku mu ta kha bye ba zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// 'bar ba'i 'od zer phreng 'khrugs pas// 'gro ba'i mun sel gshin rje'i dgra/ 
71b8(rgyud 'grel): rab snang btsun mo dga' mdzad la// bdud nas de yi sgrub thabs bshad// dang po re zhig sngags pas stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste/ rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsams la/ de'i steng du yi ge yaM 
72a1(rgyud 'grel): sngon po blta'o// de ma thag du byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang btang snyoms rnam par bsgom ste/ de'i 'og tu snying ga'i yi ge yaM las skyes pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis//

72a3(rgyud 'grel): bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / de yongs su bsngo ba dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / smon pa byang chub kyi ses sa bskyed pa dang / rgyal ba'i lam la brten pa dang /

72a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa dang ma'i dbus na gnas pa steng du zla ba la gnas pa bsam mo// mdun du nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM nag po las byung ba'i rdo rje nag po 'bar ba las// rdo rje'i sa dang gur rnams bsgom par bya zhing // 
72a7(rgyud 'grel): bgegs med pa'i sems kyis dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su gyur pa las chos kyi 'byung gnas dbus na paM las byung ba'i pad+ma sna tshogs dang / kham las byung 
72a8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje can bsams te/ de'i zla ba la yi ge b+h+rUM las byung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa yi ge b+h+rU~M gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i rnam par snang mdzad rig 
72b1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang bcas pa'i yan lag las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa dra ba dang dra ba byed pas mdzes pa/ sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gnas pa/ sna tshogs rdo rje la brten 
72b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma la zla ba dang nyi mas mnan pa bcu bdun gyis mdzes pa rnam par bsgom mo// de'i dbus su zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'i yi ge gsum la gzigs nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 
72b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs bcu drug dang yang la wad d+ha lhag pa'i gsal byed bzhi bcu'i gzugs nyis 'gyur du byas pa byon nas/ rim pa bzhin 'og dang steng du zla ba gnyis su gyur par bya ba ni/ me long lta bu'i ye shes so//

72b6(rgyud 'grel): taSh+Tha a haM/ zhes rgyal bya ba ni bya ba grub pa'o// yi ge hUM las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul te/ bruMl zhugs pa dang hUM da 
72b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjer bcas pa yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i/ rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo sgeg pa'i nyams can/ g.yas brkyang ba/ rtsa ba'i zhal dang sku thams cad dkar ba/ zhal g.yas g.yon sngo ba dang 
72b8(rgyud 'grel): dmar ba/ phyag dang po g.yas dang g.yon gyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab mal 'khyud pa/ phyag lhag ma rnams ni rdo rje dang ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang pad+ma bsnams pa 
73a1(rgyud 'grel): dbu rgyan du mi bskyod pas mnan pa/ 'di ltar bdag nyid bsgom pa ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'o// 'di ni dpal gshin rje'i dgra sgo ngar 'jug pa rab tu bsgom pa'o// /

73a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa dri za'i sems can lta bu rang gi kha nas zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam pa rdo rje'i lam nas byung ste/ rang gi rig pa'i pad+mar lhung ba dang / de las byung ba'i 'od zer dmar pos de la
73a4(rgyud 'grel): reg pas rig ma 'dod chags chen pos zhu zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyang zhu bar blta'o// zhu ba'i sgo nga las byung ba'i tsar tsi ka la sogs pa bzhi rang rang gi stan la 'khod pas// bcom ldan 'das/ 
73a5(rgyud 'grel): mi bzhugs par mthong ste/ yid mi dga' bas mgrin pa bshibs te/ slong ba'i glus 'di ltar bskul lo// rje btsun thugs rjes khro ba bzhengs mdzod la// jo bo de ring bdud las rgyal ba'i phyir// / 
73a6(rgyud 'grel): srid gsum kun gyi gti mug mthar mdzad cing // 'jig rten ma lus thugs kyi mgron bos nas// stong pa nyid du ma bzhugs rje btsun bzhengs// 'jig rten bsod nams bya ba'i ched du ni// stong pa/ 
73a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid du ma bzhugs rje btsun bzhengs// byang chub dngos la 'jig rten mgron bos nas// cis na bsam pa mi mnga' rje btsun bzhengs// de ma thag tu tsar tsi ka la sogs pa sgo ngal zhugs shing 
73a8(rgyud 'grel): zhugs mthag tu/ sgong yongs su gyur pa las/ gshin rje'i dgram he'i steng nas sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma la g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ rtsa ba'i zhal dang sku mdog mthing 
73b1(rgyud 'grel): nag/ zhal g.yas dang g.yon dkar ba dang dmar ba/ phyag rnams rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa/ rus pa'i rgyan gyis spras pa/ 'od zer mthing ga'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa/ smin ma 'bar zhing 
73b2(rgyud 'grel): khro gnyer brtsegs pa/ phyag dang zhabs kyi sen mo rno ba/ gsus pa che ba/ mi zung gi gzugs can/ sgra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ glu chen po mthong ba'i drug chen phuHzhes zer ba rnams kyis yan

73b5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i pad+mar gnas pa'i gong bu las/ zhe sdang rdo rje dang / gti mug rdo rje dang / ser sna rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje dang / phrag dog rdo rje rnams yaM dang k+She dang ya dang me dang rnams kyi sa bon la sa spro zhing / de bzhin 
73b6(rgyud 'grel): du gong bu las byung ba'i sa bon ya dang tsa dang ni dang rA dang dza dang sa dang / de dang ru rnams las thob pa dang / be con dang pad+ma dang / ral gri dang tsa ra tsi ka dang / phag mo dang dbyangs can ma dang / mdzod ldan ma rnams 
73b7(rgyud 'grel): dbyung bar bya'o// yang gong bu las byung ba'i sa bon/ na dang yo dang ni dang rwa rnams las grwa bzhir thod pa bzhi dbyung bar bya'o// de ni 'di ltar sa bon las rang rang gi stan gyi steng du rang rang gi rtsa ba'i mtshan ma des mtshan ma

74a1(rgyud 'grel): oM mung+ga ra d+h+wi ka/ oM dat+ta d+hi ka/ oM pad+ma d+hika/ oM khaD+ga d+hi ka/ oM dre Sha ra ti/ oM mo ha ra ti/ oM rA ga ra ti/ oM badz+ra ra ti/ oM AHhUM zhes pa'i sngags rnams kyis sngar bshad pa'i

74a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni rtsa ba'i zhal sku dang 'dra ba/ zhal lhag ma dag 'chad par byed pa lta bu/ phyag dang po gnyis thod pa dang gri gug dang bcas pa/ rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa 'dug stangs dang / rgyan 
74a8(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zhe sdang rdo rje dang 'dra ba/ sna tshogs pad+ma la brten pa'o// shar gyi sgor rdo rje thob mdog dkar ba/ g.yas dag na tho ba dang ral gri/ g.yon dag na nor bu dang pad+ma'o// lhor rdo rje be con mdog 
74b1(rgyud 'grel): ser po// g.yas dag na be con dang ral gri/ g.yon dag na bad+ma dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// nub tu rdo rje pad+ma mdog dmar ba/ g.yas dag na pad+ma dang ral gri/ g.yon dag na nor bu dang 'khor lo can no// byung gi 
74b2(rgyud 'grel): sgong rdo rje ral gri mdog ljang gu// g.yas dag na ral gri dang 'khor lo can// g.yon dag na nor bu dang pad+ma can no// 'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma'i nyi ma la bzhugs pa/ zhal rnams 'chad par byed pa las rtsa ba'i zhal 
74b3(rgyud 'grel): rang rang gi sku dang 'dra ba/ dang po'i phyag na gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas// rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud pa/ gshin du 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs can no// de bzhin du sna tshogs rdo rje'i shar lho'i 
74b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su rdo rje tsar tsi ka sha chung pa mdog dkar ba/ g.yas dag na 'khor lo dang ral gri can/ g.yon dag na rin po che dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// lho nub tu rdo rje phag mo mdog ser ba/ g.yas na rin po che dang ral 
74b5(rgyud 'grel): gri 'dzin pa/ g.yon dgan 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// nub byang du rdo rje dbyangs can ma mdog dmar mo g.yas dgran pad+ma dang ral gri can/ g.yon dag na nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// byang shar du rdo rje mdzod 
74b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan ma mdog ljang khu g.yas dag na ral gri dang 'khor lo can/ g.yon dag na nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// 'di rnams ni shin du gtum pa'i gzugs can ma sna tshogs pad+ma'i zla ba la gnas shing / dang po'i phyag dag 
74b7(rgyud 'grel): gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin cing / rang dang 'dra ba'i thabs rnams la 'khyud pa/ g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/ zhal gsum pa la gang gi rtsa ba'i zhal sngo ba ni g.yas pa dkar ba'o// g.yon pa dmar ba'o//

80a3(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i dga' ba bsam// yod dang med pa las 'das spros bral nam mkha' lta bu'i byang chub sems dran nas// rmi lams dpa'i rnal 'byor phung po khams rnams kun spangs der zhi nas ni ldang ba 
80a4(rgyud 'grel): sa// khams sags pade bachen par mdag zung gzugs brnyan// khung ba rtogs 'dini rdul sus bdag/ snying ban byed// bung bzas pa 'gro ba kun la phan par bya b+hi 'bram du ba/ sa/ 
80a5(rgyud 'grel): nAs 'tha~Md smras gas sa kya 'gyu di rkyen na 'byu bapas byung shA rjeg byab // dran gyika maH d+hi/ pa Ta mthA \u0f7f/ rdeg k+She ba 
80a6(rgyud 'grel): pa// gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// rdo rje mi 'jigs phyag 'tshal bstod// sgrub thabs sangs rgyas la 'jug pa// bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa'i rim// gong
80a7(rgyud 'grel): 'i ba sbyin pay-i// lag pa rnam pa sleb pa nga byung ma na kyi rtags shes byag// nAka sa na gas par thugs pa dpa la mar mam 
80a8(rgyud 'grel): kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// // ga nga shi gi na kyi zugs / 
80b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ rat+na saM b+hA ba ya mA ri sA d+hA naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 
80b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan don yid bzhin 'byung gnas rin pa che// de 'dod stong mdzad rin chen 'byung gnas rgyal// kun rtog bral ba mnyam pa nyid ye shes// sar sna 'jams mdzad de la phyag 'tshal te// nga rgyal 
80b3(rgyud 'grel): rab rgyas sems can de don du// phra ma mthar mdzad rab tu bshad par bya// byang chub sems dang shes rab ni// snyoms 'jug dran pa'i sngags pa yis// skad cig lha yi rnal 'byor pas// spro dang brgya/ 
80b4(rgyud 'grel): b.rab tu bya// bla marjed pa la mgon po dang // sdu gu lha sogs rab dmigs te// phyag 'tshal la sogs byung par ni// ma lus lus pa med par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi lam gyur pa'i// go rims tshangs 
80b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas rnams bsgom// rang bzhin stong pa rkyen gyis te// ye shes tshogs rab bsam par bya// ma yig hU~M gis sna tshogs las// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo 'bar ba'o// chu skyes thabs dang shes rab ste/ 
80b6(rgyud 'grel): ma las rin chen zur brgyad pa// spro bsdu'i nga rgyal gsal bar bya// oM rat+na sa~M b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de las gyur pa'i rdo rje ni// bcom gser gyi mdangs mnyam zhing // rang 'od dang mtshungs rig mar ldan// 
80b7(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum g.yas g.yon sngo dang dkar// spyan dgu mche gtsigs phyag drug pa// gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag/ rin chen ral gri 'khor lo pad// g.yas dang g.yon la rim gyis sbyar// dbu skra ser
80b8(rgyud 'grel): brjes gdug pa'i rgyan// lnga bcu'i phreng dang dur khrod spras// 'od zer rnom nan med pung 'bar// me phyed rab du 'khrud pa'o// sa bon rdzogs dang mig la sogs// k+Shi dza~M khaM ga ka~M so las// rdzogs pa 
81a1(rgyud 'grel): drug ni byang chub sems// oM AHhUM las sku gsung thugs// 'phros pas rin dbang gshin rje gshed// rab gnas rang dzaHhUM baM hoH// rnam 'phrul mchod pa byang 
81a2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems// bstod pa rgyud rgyal ji snyed bzhin// rlung me thod pa sgron me bcu// byin brlabs bdud rtsi myangs nas kyang // spro bsdu byas nas bzlasaM pa brtsam// oM rat+na d+h+r-i ka tre Sha ra ti/ 
81a3(rgyud 'grel): tsItrI b+h+rUM phaT phaT swAd+ha/ stong gi rus pa khyad par rnyed// mkha' 'gro ma'ang de dbang 'gyur// wa yis 'byung po las kun byed// bye bas rgyas dang brlag 'gyur te// bye ba lnga bzlas tshad dang thal/ 
81a4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu rab zhi bsdus pa ni// chu yi snying po de bzhin du// chur 'gyur rang gi rdos dang bral// dngos med mnyam par bsgom par bya// bdag gis rab phye las sbyar ma bshad dang // byang chub/ 
81a5(rgyud 'grel): la mos sgrub po bag tsam las// nga rgyal gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub pa brtsams// 'dir mos rdo rje'i sal thogs med shog/ gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ slong 
81a6(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po dpal mad me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shI dz+nyA na kIrti sa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// 'ad dpag tu med pa'i ting po zhugs so// 
81a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ a mi tA b+hU rbe ut+ta na rA ga ya mA ri sA dz+nyA na nA maM/ bod skad du/ 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po// 'dod chags gshin rje gshed sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ 
81a8(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sku ge sung thugs dbyer med pa yi// 'dod chags che la phyag 'tshal te// gang gi mngon zhen 'jigs byed pa// 'dod chags rdo rje'i sgrub thabs 
81b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad// dad ldan shes rab snying rje yis// don bcas gzhan don gtsor 'dzin pas// sbyin pa la sogs legs sbyangs te// yid skyob sngags 'di brtsam par bya// dang por sngags pas khrus byas nas// 
81b2(rgyud 'grel): nang tshangs can gyi stan bting la// rang gi snying nyid bskul bar bya// phyag 'tshal la sogaso 'dus byas dang // theg chen cho ga bzhi dag dang // stong pa'i rang bzhin de nyid kyis// bdag rgyud yongs su dag 
81b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya// bdud rnams zhi bar bya phyir dang // sangs rgyas zhing rnams dag pa'i phyir// bsrung dang chu skyes bsgom par bya// mtshon cha rgyas dang 'od zer sna// paM dang raM las byung ba yi// nyi ma sa bon me yig 
81b4(rgyud 'grel): las// bcu drug mda' bcas lnga 'od zer// bsdus nas byin gyis brlab par bya// oM a mi tA b+hU hri ut+ta na rA ga ya ma ri At+ma ko haM/ gyur pas rdo rje snang mtha' yas// pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs dang mnyam// 
81b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon zhal ni sngo dang dkar// rang rig yum ni thabs dang mtshungs// stod smad stobs 'jigs pa gse pa gnyis// gri gug thod pa ral gri dang // 'khor lo rini chen shin tu 'khrug/ sbrul dang rus 
81b6(rgyud 'grel): pas rnam brgyan pa// dbu skra brdzes la spyan mig 'khrug/ mche gtsigs 'bar ba'i me dpung bsgom// rdo rje mig dang rna sna lce// lus yid la ni sa snying sogs// rdo rje lus dang ngag yid la// rdo rje sku 
81b7(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs ldan bsam// mi skyod la ni dbang blang ste// dbul gshin rje gshed po bsgom// sgo bzhi'i sngags kyis bcug nas kyang // tsa ra tsi ka sogs rnam 'phrul mchod// gshin rje gshed po rab 
81b8(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa// 'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas brnyed// dbyangs mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal bstod// oM AHhUM gis byin gyis brlab// bdud rtsi myangs la 
82a1(rgyud 'grel): / spro ba sdu bya// sngags pas ji srid mi blo'i bar// bzlas shing spro bsdu rgyas par bya// oM a ro l-i karA ga ra ti ts+tsha dz+dza hUM phaT baTak+shaSh+Ta/ thams cad 'dod chags rjes dran nas// 'dod 
82a2(rgyud 'grel): chags chen por rab dmigs te// tshad med yi ge spangs pa yis// a don bsam mi khyab po bsgom// nying rje sa dpas langs nas kyang // phyag rgya bkrol la spyod lam bya// thams cad du ni nga rgyal bdag

82a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// dam tshig sems can don byed cing // nan tan ye shes phyir maM ldog/ marked ldeng gu'i mdog 'dral// rab du dang bas bdud byas te// brdul zhugs thogs pa med pa yis// las kyi don

82b5(rgyud 'grel): nang na bzhugs pa la// sku gsung thugs la rdo rje gsum// skye mched dru gal byang chub sems// dbang bskur spyi bor gshin rje gshed// sgo bzhi'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs// rnam 'phrul mchod pa bsam mi khyab/

83a1(rgyud 'grel): ka shing rje ga shed rdo rje rnan po zhes bya ba'i sgrub zabs/ slob dpor chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shId+han kri rtimi rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//

85a4(rgyud 'grel): sel lus// sa las kun du bzang po yid// rig pa'i dbang bskur gshin rje gshed// dkrug ga zhug bcing dang dbang du bya// mchod pa b+ha ga'i byang chub sems// rdo rje gsung ni ye shes che// pad+ma shes 
85a5(rgyud 'grel): rab pa rol byed// 'dod chags chen po nyid sbyor ba// rdo rje maze mdzad khyed la bstod// rdo rje sngags bdud rtsi rung // sa bor 'phros pas 'gro basbyang // rdo rje bzlas pa brtsam par bya// yid gsal bani 
85a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gces// oM badz+ra ra gar ti hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ ma ning rdo rje bzlas nas kyang // snying po can dngos bsgom par bya// 'dod chags chen po ster ba bklog pa'i phyir// bde ba sems dran sgrub 
85a7(rgyud 'grel): thabs 'di brtsams pas// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dri ma dganas kyang // dga' ba rnam dag smon lam stobs gyur shog/ rdo rje bde rgyas dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// 
85a8(rgyud 'grel): ga rtsu 'azugasas// @#// rgya gar skad du/ karma brjen gau rI sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ las kyi rdo rje gi rI'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 
85b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// btang snyoms rnam par dag pa phyag rgya che// ye shes pha rol phyin ma la phyag 'tshal// brtson 'grus thogs pa med pas sems can don// 'grub phyir gau rI'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya// 
85b2(rgyud 'grel): khrus dang rgyan dang gos dang byug pa rnams// phyi nang rnam par dag pa shes par bya// rang gi rnal 'byor dam pa mchod nas kyang // bde ba'i 'khor lo bdag la gzhug par bya// tshad med bzhi la rnal 
85b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor sems gnas nas// chos kun snying po 'od gsal bar bsgom// bdag rgyud su gsung thugs kyi yi ge ni// ro gcig theg le'i ngo bor gyur pa las// chad panyi mu'i steng gi rdo rje nyid// 'phros pas 
85b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyeng bas mag nga \u0f7f// pa'i sbed d+hA sa ga// ma / / lanas 'grus shing 'a Ta// ba ga 
85b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgrani mar kata ljang mdog ste// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal ni dkar dang dmar// gri gug ral gri 'khor lo thod pa dang // rin chen du skyes rnams kyis mdzes pa'i byug/ dbu sa rjen 'greng rdzing 
85b6(rgyud 'grel): pa lngas brgyan cing // tshangs pa brgya byin mgo bo lnga bcus sbyangs// glu dang mar kata rus pa'i rgyan 'jigs pas// stag lpags bsnams pa'i zhabs ni g.yas brkyang ste// gzi brjid me yi dkyil na 
85b7(rgyud 'grel): che 'bar ba'i// sugasung thugs dang spyan sogs byin brlabs la// yi ge mtshan ma su ni gang 'dod brtsam// snying ga'i sa bon 'phros pas 'khor lo bzang // gsol btab rig pa'i skyes bu mi 
85b8(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa// rjes su mthun pa'i lha ni spyan drangs nas// mchod bstod panyes par byas nas rang la thim// mchod pa'i rnam grangs nam mkha' rgyas gang ba// b+ha ga'i rnam 'phrul dag gis ci bder mchod// 
86a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa rdo rje dril bur ldan pa yis// snyan pa'i glu dang ldan pas mchod par bya// rdo rje las ni kun grol ba// phrag dog rdo rje dbyer med sku// thams cad rdo rje btang snyoms nyid// 
86a2(rgyud 'grel): rdorje las mthag 'tshal bstod// yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdzas// rgyal ba thams cad mchod phyir myang ba dang // sems can thams cad rdo rje'i skur byas nas// sngags kyi 'khor lo 
86a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'dod pas bzlas// oM badz+ra ra tI hUM hUM b+h+rU~M phaT phaT swAhA/ rgyal mtshan gyi khams su'o ma sgrub// thabs kyi gzugs las rtag tu dang 'gyur bas// rtag pa'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed na ga las/ 
86a4(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba'i sgrub thabs bdag gis 'di byas pas// 'gro kun spros bral zhi ba la gnas te// sangs rgyas ye shes mngon du rtogs par shog/ rdo rje las gau rI'i sgrubs thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// 
86a5(rgyud 'grel): / mau sa dpalag shin rdegashed mchod pa'i tshiga'i ril pa bzhugs sa/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ b+har+tha ka many+dzu shrI ya mA ri pu dza kra ma bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed 
86a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba// bla marje btsun pa rnams la phyag 'a tshal lo// shes rab snying rjer ldan zhing legs brtan dang // sangs rgyas snying po 'dod phyir gang zag dbang thob pas// bsnyen 
86a7(rgyud 'grel): dang sgrub pa'i rim pa khong du chad byas nas// rje btsun rnams la bdud de rgyud 'dis sbyang bar bya// bdag nyid dran pa gcig pa'i 'gro blor ldan bdag med pa las bzlog cing 'byor pa gsum dag pas/ 
86a8(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen dang sbub la rab tu mkhas byas te// nyin dang mtshan mo thams cad g.yeng med tshul gyis 'bad// su gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo rdo rje can bcas dang // dri med snying po mthar mdzad bla ma rdo rje 
86b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// dgra las rgyal ba gshin rje gshed nag lha yi tshegs// thugs rjes thugs chud spyan ras nyid 'tsho dgongs su gsol// chos sku longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul sku'i rang bzhin can// rgyal ba'i// 
86b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin phung pos sems can re 'dod skong // 'byor ldan phun sum tshogs pas nad gsos sman pa'i mchog/ bla ma mgon po de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo// phung po lnga las rgyal zhing nyon mongs lnga 
86b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams dag/ rang gzhan don rdzogs gang zhig bag mo la sogs 'khril// ye shes rigs mtshungs lnga ldan rin chen lnga yi mdog/ rnam thar pa rol byin zhal khyod la 'dud// bdud bzhi las rgyal lta 
86b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i nges grol bcom nas kyang // dad sogs rnam dag khro bo'i rtags su nges 'byung ba// thabs kyi phyag d+ha sgrib pa thams cad mthar spangs pa'i// 'jigs shing rab tu gtum phyag mtshan rtags ldan 
86b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod// sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi ni rnam dag sku// byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms nyid// thabs dang smon lam ye shes rdzogs mdzad pa// tsa ra tsi phag mgau rI dbyangs ldan 
86b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod yon gdan mchog zhabs bkru ldan pa dang // spos dang me tog mar me zhal zas tshogs// rol mo sil sran me tog phreng dang lnga ldi dang // mchod sdong bye bas brgyan pas rab 
86b7(rgyud 'grel): tu mchod par bgyi// gzugs sgra dri ro rig bya'i 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs// du mar spyad kyang tshim pa med cing ngo mtshar ba// yid ldan sems kyis ngal so khyad par gyur pa rnams// mos blo dad pa'i 
86b8(rgyud 'grel): mthu yis bde gshegs 'khor la mchod// 'khor lo rin chen rta dang glang po rab mtshan ldan// rgyal po btsun mo thon po mchog ni zhi zhing mdzes// 'byor ldan phun sum tshogs pa 'khor lo sgyur ba yi/ 
87a1(rgyud 'grel): khyad par rdzas kyi bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod// gdugs dang nyer ldan dung dang pad+mas rab tu mdzes// gun de dpal be'u rgyal mtshan 'khor lo mdzes pa'i mchog 
87a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dgan grags shing snyan par gang brjod pa'i// bla med rnams kyis bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod// dri chen rdo rje chur ldan byang chub sems dkar dmar dang bcas// mi shar+Na 
87a3(rgyud 'grel): dang b.lang glang chen khyi sha dang // sgron mche dang ldan pas dur khrod mdzes byas pas// rnam par rtog bral bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod// bde gshegs khyed la ji snyed gnas pa'i yon 
87a4(rgyud 'grel): tan ni// bdag gis bskal pa'i mtha' bar brjod pas mi lang bas// su gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' tsam mos 'dis// rgyal ba gcig bzhin sangs rgyas 'khor lo thams cad 
87a5(rgyud 'grel): bstod// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug mang gis bskyed cing // lus dgra yid gsum sgo ru smin pa'i mi dge bcu// so so thar drang byang chub sems dang rig pa 'dzin// tshul khrims sdom 
87a6(rgyud 'grel): dang dam tshig nyams pa ji snyed bshags// bdag gis bgyis dang de bzhin bgyid du stsal// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i tshogs// slob dang mi slob sems kyi grogs su gang 
87a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dge la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas zhing la bzhugs pa'i ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// gdul bya'i snang ba rab tu tshim mdzad khro dang zhi// 'gro ba mig 
87a8(rgyud 'grel): ljongs shes rab sman gyis gso ba'i phyir// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bskor bar bskul// rgyal ba bcom ldan mya ngan 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams// khyod mi bzhugs na 'jig rten 'di 
87b1(rgyud 'grel): dag mgon med pas// nam mkhas gar khyab sems can ji srid mchis pa ru// de srid rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa bzhugs su gsol// bdag gis lus ngag yid kyi dge ba'i tshogs ji snyed// 
87b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin dang tshul khrims bsgoms pa nyid du nges bsdus te// bdag gir bzung ba med cing sems can kun don du// dmigs pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo bar bgyi// bdag gis rje btsun 
87b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la shin tu dad sems kyis// sems can kun la phan phyir bsod nams ye shes tshogs// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gsum du bsdus byas te// dpal ldan bla ma rje btsun mchog gi zhabs 
87b4(rgyud 'grel): drung shog/ nyon mongs tshogs rnams dag cing sems rtogs nas// rgyal ba mgon po bcom ldan 'das kyi skur gyur shog/ me tog shu kra len cing spros pa nyid spangs te// nyon mongs mngal du 
87b5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'jug bde ba len par shog/ yid ches sems kyis lhan cig skyes pa rnyed gyur te// 'byor pa'i nus pas rdo rje lta bu'i lus thob shog/ chos rnams ro gcig bsam mi khyab kyi ro thob nas// 
87b6(rgyud 'grel): rig dang tshogs kyi spyod pas sems can 'dul gyur cig/ zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i phrin las nyer thob ste// gdug pa can rnams gshin rje gshed la mngon gzhol shog/ thun mong 
87b7(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thogs pa med par thob nas kyang // blo stobs dman pa'i rnal 'byor de nyid kyis 'tsho shog/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs bde ba chen po'i sa thob nas// bdag dang sems can 
87b8(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed po nyid grub shog/ sgrub po dang ldan lus ngag yid gsum rab sbyang phyir// rje btsun pa rnams mchod pa'i cho ga 'di byas pas// nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib pa
88a1(rgyud 'grel): byang gyur te// rgyun chad med dang phun sum tshogs sku thob par shog/ 'gro ba thibs po nyon mongs lam la rab tu gzhol// sdig pa'i dpa' klong 'khrug pa'i nang du rtag tu 
88a2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs// rnam smin rku srin gdug pa can gyi khar zhugs nas// g.yeng bas ngal ba don med ma byed dge ba skyengs// rje btsun 'jam dpal ga shin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes 
88a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba// slob dpon chen po kreSh+Na paN+Di ta sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// // sangs rgyas gzhin cig seng dag pa rtsub pa'i thabs pazhugs so/ #\u0f7f// rgya gar skad du/ kr-iSh+Na yam+ba ri bud+d+ha sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ 
88a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma rje btsun bla med dang // sku gsum mgon po gshegs nyid las// btud// 
88a5(rgyud 'grel): de de nyid sgrub pa'i thabs// blo dman bdag gis bshad par bya// sngags pa blo dang ldan pa yis// snying rje chen po rab bskyed de// skad cig dran pas gsal bar bya// gnyis pas rdzogs pa
88a6(rgyud 'grel): thig le tshe// bzang po nyid dang dpal gyi mgon// so so las kyang bzhi 'byung bya// rdzogs dang rab tu gnas pa dang // mngon par btud la mchod byas te// ya yig sprul pa'i las bya'o// 
88a7(rgyud 'grel): bshags dang rjes su yi rang dang // bskul dang gsol ba gdab pa dang // skyabs su 'gro dang sems bskyed che// lus dbul yongs su bsngo ba bya'o// smon lam gdab dang gshegs su gsol//

88b1(rgyud 'grel): shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid ni// yi ge gsum gyi ngo bor blta// dag pa'i thig le nam mkha' yis// rgyun gyis gnas pa'i nyi ma hU~M/ gyur pa rdo rje gzhal med/ 
88b2(rgyud 'grel): khang // zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par gnas// sna tshogs pad+ma'i dkyil nyid du// zla ba yi ge bcu drug bcas// ra~M pha las byung gnyis pa las// gsal byed yi ge khor 
88b3(rgyud 'grel): yug blta// ro mnyam pa las sa bon nyid// nor bu rdo rje spro dang bsdu// nga rgyal gyur pas rdo rje sems// dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal// shes rab gnyis med sgeg dang stangs// gdug dang 
88b4(rgyud 'grel): me gyis smras// thikran med parba 'i bya// rdorje sa khrigapas ba snams// seM na ram tu smras sa// sa pa 'du bya bdag cad dpal// rjes su gyur pas thab sa/ 
88b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rdo rje gnas// nyi ma dmar po ya gcig bcas// gyur pas rdo rje sngon po ste// sa bon 'od las gshin rje gshed// char sprin gzhon nu lta bu'i mdog/ g.yas pa zla ba lta bu ste// g.yon pa 
88b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ rang gi yum dang ldan pa'i sku// rtsa ba'i phyag gis 'khyud pa'i stangs// rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo dang // pad+ma 'od zer chen po 'bar// gri gug rdo rje mtshan pa dang // thod pa byang
88b7(rgyud 'grel): chub sems bkang ba// yum dang mtshungs par 'dzin pa ste// gcer bu rgyan bral sgra grol ba'o// snyoms par 'jug pa'i stangs dang ldan// brgya byed mgo bo'i phreng ba can// pad+ma zla ba'i gdan 
88b8(rgyud 'grel): stengs su// ma he nyi ma gnas pa'i stengs// rdo rje gshed po bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa yis// sems dpa'i rdo rje bde bar bsgom// skye mched zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// 
89a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i yi ge gsal bar bya// k+ShiM dzi khaM gaM kaM saM/ spyig tsug mgrin pa snying ga'i steng // zla ba pad+ma nyi ma'i dkyil// dkar dmar gnag pa'i yi ge dgod// oM AHhUM

89a3(rgyud 'grel): pas de nyid don// mnyes par byas la rgyud la bstim// nges dngo gsal dang brtan pa dang // phab la thig le thig le che// byed pa sbyor dang phra ma dang // gor mi nam mkha'i rdo rje'o// 'di ni 'grub med 'grub pa med// rang bzhin 
89a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid nas rdo rje sems// rdo rje nam mkha'i khams sbyor bas// gnyis med ye shes chos kyi sku// 'di ni rnam par dag pa'o// ldong ba sA lu'i 'bras ltar du// gnas brgyal po'i dbang sgyur bzhin// dbying 
89a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje tha mi dad// sbyor ba'i byang chub sems phab pas// sa stengs sa 'ogs bla yi// gnas su sku gsung thugs bsams te// ma yengs don grub bzlas pa bya// oM kA la rA pa hUM/ 'dis ni brgya 
89a6(rgyud 'grel): byin la sogs pa brgyal bar byed pa'o// oM ya ma rA dza/ sa do me ya/ ya me do ru/ Na yod ya/ ya da yo ni/ ra yak+She ya/ yak+She yan+na ni rA ma ya// hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ 'dis ni dngos grub 
89a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po yang thob par 'gyur ro// oM b+hIHSh+TiHwi kr-i twe na na hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ 'dis ni las thams cad 'grub bo// he cang drag min da la ba min// cung zad ring ba ma yin te/ thung dang mi 
89a8(rgyud 'grel): gsal rnam spangs te// tshig gi bar du mchod pa'i// tshon pos bzlas pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni bsgrub pa'i don du byas// las kun bla ma brgyad shes bya// mi shes pa dag dgrol 
89b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir// bdag gis rtogs par gyur pa brtsams// 'di la 'byung ba'i bsod nams kyis// dpal ldan gshin rje gshed 'gyur shog/ sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub 
89b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs// nA da ku be ra las byung ba'i don// kun da na k+She rin bzhugs pa'i mkhas pa chen po rnal 'byor pa nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrti sa rang

89b8(rgyud 'grel): par bsams nas ni// ma yig las byung nyi ma la// sna tshogs hU~M las rgya gram bsam// hU~M las 'od 'bro sar ba'o// de dkyil baM las pad+ma ni// dmar po'i steng du zlo ba ste// de la dbyangs 
90a1(rgyud 'grel): mamamamamamamamamamasasamamamamamamamamamamamam la 
90a2(rgyud 'grel): yig rnam par bsam// de steng raM las nyi ma ste// gsal byed bkod la gsal bar byas// de las gong bu traM du gyur// de las rdo rje hUM ldan bsam// de las rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ 
90a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal gzhan gshin rje gshed dang 'dra// rtsa ba'i zhal ni dkar bar bsgom// thugs kar sa bon gsal pa las// 'od 'phros bkug la zhal zhugs pas// snying gar zhu nas thim byas la// mkha' gsang
90a4(rgyud 'grel): spangs la ho dmar bsam// zhu bas skar mda' la zhugs bzhin// mkha' gsang nang du babs gyur pas// bdag nyid yum dang bcas pa gzhu// de las thig le bzhi 'phros pas// lha mo bzhi yis

90a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// rtsa ba'i zhal ni sngon po la// g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar ba ste// rang gi yum dang ldan pa'i lus// rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo dang // chu skyes gri gug thod pa'i
90a8(rgyud 'grel): phyag/ ma he'i gdan bcas gsus po che// glang po stag gi pags pa mnabs// mche gtsigs sbrul gyi tshad ldan bskyed// sems ldan 'od 'phros ye shes dgug/ dzaHhUM baM hoHdaM nas mig dang 
90a9(rgyud 'grel): rna bsdu// lce dang lus yid rnams la yang // mngon shes bsdub phyir lha bsgom bya// NAM dza~M/ Sha6saM/ de nas sku gsung thugs gsum la// oM AHbruM gsum// bkod pa lhararu dmigs 
90b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de nas gshed lnga spyan drangs te// mchod la gsol btab dbang bskur bas// rdo rje 'dzin pa spyi bor blta// de las sa bon yi ge las// 'bros pas yi ge nyi mar bsdu// de nas rdo rje'i 
90b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa ni// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag tshul du// gtor ma ldan pas bzlas pa bya// de nas ldang bar brtsam pa ni// sems can don la sems pa yi// ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol//

91a5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas ngargyal bas ma// oM sarba bad+ha badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma ko ta/ thur pas tho bag sher rjegashed nga bzhog/ su mdog sngon po 'jigs chen po// rang gi rig mas 'khyud cing mdzes// g.yas g.yo

91a7(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed kyis brgyad// yig 'bru bzhi yis dgug gzhug bya// bug chen po spros pas mchod// rdo rje dril bu ldan pas bstod// hU~M hU~M rdo rje stobs po che// rab 'jigs mi mthun zad padzar 
91b1(rgyud 'grel): pa// rdo rje sku dbyer med pa'i lha// tho ba rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// sgron ma 'o mar ldan pa yis// kha yi bu ga dag par bsam// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs bskul bas// 'gro ba ma lus sbyang bar bya//

95b5(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// gzhal yas khang gi dbus nyid du// skye med sdang ba las byung ba'i// thabs dang shes rab gsal ldan bsam// gyur pas ro mnyam thig le'o// de la thugs kyi yi ge ste// de nas thugs 
95b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog nyid du 'gyur// nga rgyal sku gsung thugs bcug ste// zhu bas chos kyi sku ru gyur// de yi sa bon yi ge las// 'phros pas gshin rje gshed bkug ste// zhal du zhugs nas zhu bar bsam// bdag
95b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid thig le chen por blta// phyogs bcur thig le bzhi spros pas// tsa ra tsi phag mo'i dbyangs ldan ma// gau rI lha mo bzhir gyur te// rje btsun thig le bskul bar bya// rje btsun bzhengs shing snying 
95b8(rgyud 'grel): rje// srid gsum pa yi ma rig sol// rje btsun bzhengs shing rgyal rigs bdud bzhi las ni rgyal ba'i sems ni g.yengs// rje btsun bzhugs shing 'jig rten snyan mnan stong pa nyid la bzhugs 
96a1(rgyud 'grel): sam ci// ci phyir 'jig rten snyan mnar stong pa nyid la sems te bzhugs// bcom ldan rgyal pos bskul nas kyang // lha mo nyid kyang thim par gyur// de la nyi ma sa bon 
96a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas// gyur pas rdo rje mtshan ma can// de la gshin rje gshed mchog sku// rtog pa bzhin du gsal bar bsam// de las mkha' gsang byin brlabs te// ye shes dkyil 'khor bkug nas kyang //

96a4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gser dang pad+ma dmar// ral gri ljang gu tho ba sngo// dbyug pa gar gyi phyag rgyar gyur// de las yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku// dgra lnga yum bzhi bsgom par gyur// mal nas skye ba'i tshul nyid du/

96a8(rgyud 'grel): dzi ka/ oM rat+na d+h+r-i ka/ oM A ro li ka/ oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka/ oM mung+ga rad+h+r-ika/ oM data d+h+r-ika/ oM pad+ma d+h+r-i kaM/ a khaD+ga d+h+r-ika/ oM mo ha ra ti/ oM dre Sha ra ti/ oM rA gar ti/ oM badz+ra ra te/ nyi shu rtsa

97a1(rgyud 'grel): bsras bcas dag/ bsdus te yig 'bul bstims pas// chu la dkar dang mel dmar// rlung la khro ba sngon po bsam// zhu bas 'od kyi phung por gyur// sor por

101a3(rgyud 'grel): nas 'gro ba yis// sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog/ ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang // ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// da lta nyid du rjes brtse bas// rnal 'byor bstan 
101a4(rgyud 'grel): bcos gnas la dgod// ces bya bas bsngo bar byas gshegs su mi gsol// de nas rnal 'byor pho mo kun lha'i dkyil 'khor du bltas la// dngal dri yis mchod// de nas me 
101a5(rgyud 'grel): tog dang bdug pa dang mar me dang // lha bshos kyis tshul bzhin du mchod la// de'i 'og du bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i chang gis mchod de// lag pa g.yon pas chang bzung nas// g.yas// 
101a6(rgyud 'grel): pas rtse gsum pa byas la// tshigs su bcad pa 'dis sbyin te/ ltos shig mdzes pa dam pa'i chos// 'di la the tshom yod ma yin// bram ze khyi dang gdol pa gsum// rang bzhin
101a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig du rtogs par bza'// zhes bya bas drang ngo // len pa pos brjod pa/ 'dod chags dri ma bral ba yi// rin thang med las legs 'ongs chos// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam
101a8(rgyud 'grel): par spangs// de kho na nyid bdag phyag 'tshal// zhes pas pad+ma'i skor ba dang bcas pas blang ngo // 'og ma rnams la drang ba la 'di skad brjod// sbyor ba'i dus na dngos grub ni/ 
101b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod kun de nyid de bzhin du// rnal 'byor pas ni kun du spyad// ji ltar bde bar spyad par bya// zhes bya ba brjod la brim mo// de'i 'og du shA khu dang bur mar gyis mchod// de nas lha 
101b2(rgyud 'grel): bai shos so sor drangs la// dri nas kun gyis phud bsdus la// slob dpon la phul nas// slob dpon gyis cha gnyis su dgos te// cha gcig g.yon gyi phyogs su bgos la byin gyis 
101b3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs la// dkyil 'khor gyi lha la dbul// cha gcig g.yas su bzhag la// byin gyis brlabs la phyogs skyong la dbul te// oM a kA ro mu kham zhes pa'i sngags kyis mchod// de nas 
101b4(rgyud 'grel): ci bder rol cing longs spyod// skabs der bkra shis bya'o// de nyid yang dag spyod pa yis// rnal 'byor pa ni kun nas bdag/ ji ltar bde bar brjod par bya// sgyu ma lta bur mdzes pa 
101b5(rgyud 'grel): yis// gnyis sprod kun 'khrud sogs sbyor ba// lus can don du yang dag spyad// dngos po bral la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas lha dang phyogs skyong la gnang ba nod pa dang // bzod par 
101b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba byas te// badz+ra satwas bzod gsol byas te// badz+ra muHzhes pas gshegs su gsol// dam tshig gi la snying gar bsdus la// oM pad+ma ko shi hUM/ zhes bsdu'o// 
101b7(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra du paM gr-ih+Na gats+tsha d+d+haM/ zhes bya bas phyi rol gyi lha gshegs su gsol lo// de nas lhag ma bsdus te/ de la yang gnyis te/ rnal 'byor po mo'i lhag ma ni phyi rol gyi sha zla 
101b8(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa mi ma yin pa rnams la btang ste/ byi skor bton la btang ngo // khyim pa'i lhag pa ni khyim pa de nyid kyi mi ma yin pa la bsngo'o// lhag ma de lta bu'i skal ba med pa la/ slob 
102a1(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyi kha nas bdud rtsir byas la sbyin no// de nas yon bdag dang 'khor la bkra shis dang smon lam gdab po// de nas gtor skyel de log pa dang // tshogs 
102a2(rgyud 'grel): kyikhang skor me long dang dung bud pa dkrol// chu can gyi zan ni mchod// de nas nang du log nas rnal 'byor po mo la yang de bzhin mchod pa bya'o// ma 'ongs skye bo'i tshogs rnams bsags
102a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod pa dang // bslab pa'i lam la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// don du dri med lung dag bla ma'i man ngag ltar// ma nor bzung ste bdag dang gzhan la phan phyir bris pa yin// tshogs 
102a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// gshi gagadas mkhas pa pa dpa ma pa bzugs so// 
102a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri a b+hi sa ma ya kra ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la 
102a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tsha' lo// gus pas bla ma dang ni gshin rje gshed nag rdo rje ni/ nyid mtshungs dang 'dus bde bas yongs gang gzhan gyi don 'jug pa// rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo chu skyes gri gu gzod pa 
102a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag na bsnams// zhal gsum pa la 'jigs pa sel mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo// dus dgra nag po sgrub pa nyid// gang zhig 'dod nas de nyid rig/ dbang bskur la sogs thob pa dag 
102a8(rgyud 'grel): de yi bsgom pa'i rim pa 'di// byis pas bde bar rtogs phyir dang // mtshungs pa rnams kyis dran phyir dang // gong ma byis pa'i tshig dag la// mgu ba bskyed phyir bri bar bya// sbyin dang / 
102b1(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims la sogs ldan// sems can don dga' blo dang ldan// byams pa la sogs yon tan rdzogs// dad dang thos pas rnam brgyan pas// dang por gdong la sogs bkrub// snying rje'i bdag nyid sngon du bya/ 
102b2(rgyud 'grel): dben pa'i gnas su brtsub bya ste// dur khrod la sogs bde gnas la// 'dug nas snying gang pad+ma dang // shin tu 'od gsal zla ba blta// ya yig sngon po'od mdzes pa// sems can 'byor pa'i don byed bas// nam 
102b3(rgyud 'grel): khams ni kun gang ba'i// bla ma dang ni rdzogs sangs bsgom// lus kyi bkod pa byas nas ni// de rnams dmigs nas phyag kyang bya// tsa ra tsi ka sogs kyis mchod pa// byas la sdig pa 
102b4(rgyud 'grel): bshags pa'ang bya// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sdig/ bgyis dang bgyid du yul pa dang // gang yang rjes su yi rang ba// de ni mgon la dus gsum bshags// rdzogs sangs rgyas 
102b5(rgyud 'grel): dang de yi sras// 'phags pa rnams kyis bsags pa yi// bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang // dam pa'i chos dang tshogs mchog bcas// rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi// yon 
102b6(rgyud 'grel): tan rgya mtsho khyed rnams la// bdag gis lus ni dbul bar bgyis// dam pa'i tshes kun ston mdzad pa'i// sgra yis mdzes pas khyed bzhugs gsol// yang dag rdzogs sangs sras 
102b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i// sbyin pa la sogs ngo bo la// sku gsum ye shes thob bya'i phyir// rab tu dga' bas gnas par bgyi// sems can don phyir yang dag rdzogs// byang chub sems ni bskyed//

103a1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// de nas blo yis gshegs su gsol// snying rjes cho ga bzhin bltas nas// sna tshogs stong par rnam par bsam// ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir// rgyu nyid// 
103a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi ni mtshan ma med// rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir// smon pa nyid kyang rnam par spangs// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sems de brtan par byas nas ni// raM las byung ba'i nyi 
103a3(rgyud 'grel): ma la// hUM las byung ba'i mdog sngon po// 'od zer 'phro bas kun bskor ba'i// rdo rje kun nas rtse lnga po// bsrung ba'i don du bsgom par bya// rdo rjes yi dkyil 'khor dang // rabagur yang de
103a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyang phyir// yang dag bsgom pa yang brtsam bya// de la sna tshogs pad zla bas// rdo rje bzang po'i lus byung ba'i// chos 'byung dkar po gru gsum
